  5799                                  
  5800                                  ; Following are subroutines to support resident device driver initialization
  5801                                  ;
  5802                                  ;M011 -- note:  deleted setup_bdsms and reset_bdsms here
  5803                                  
  5804                                  ;	M035 -- begin changed section
  5805                                  
  5806                                  ;******************************************************************************
  5807                                  ; module name: remap
  5808                                  ;
  5809                                  ; descriptive name: all the code for himem that could be separated from msbio
  5810                                  ;
  5811                                  ; function:  remap the bds chain to adjusted logical drive numbers (drive
  5812                                  ;	     letters) if more than two diskette drives on the system.
  5813                                  ;
  5814                                  ;     scheme:  if more than 2 diskette drives, first map the bds structure
  5815                                  ;	       as usual and then rescan the bds chain to adjust the drive
  5816                                  ;	       letters. to do this, scan for disk drives and assign logical
  5817                                  ;	       drive number starting from 2 and then rescan diskette drives
  5818                                  ;	       and assign next to the last logical drive number of last disk
  5819                                  ;	       drive to the 3rd and 4th diskette drives.
  5820                                  
  5821                                  ; input:       none
  5822                                  ; exit:	drive letters have been remapped in bds chain
  5823                                  ; exit error:  none
  5824                                  ; called from: msinit
  5825                                  ;
  5826                                  ; notes:  this function  will be called only if more than 2 diskettes are
  5827                                  ;	  found in the system
  5828                                  ;	  this function assumes that there are no more than 26 drives assigned
  5829                                  ;	    this is guaranteed by the code that creates bdss for partitions
  5830                                  ;	  this function assumes that the first entries in the chain are
  5831                                  ;	   floppy drives, and all the rest are hard drives
  5832                                  ;	  will alter the boot drive if necessary to reflect remapping
  5833                                  ;
  5834                                  ;******************************************************************************
  5835                                  
  5836                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5837                                  ; 02/10/2022
  5838                                  
  5839                                  remap:		; proc near		
  5840 00001C77 2E8B3E[1901]            		mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; get first bds
  5841                                  
  5842                                  ; search for 1st fixed disk physical drive num
  5843                                  
  5844                                  drive_loop:				
  5845 00001C7C 807D0480                		cmp	byte [di+4], 80h ; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  5846                                  					; first	hard disk??
  5847 00001C80 7409                    		jz	short fdrv_found ; yes,	continue
  5848 00001C82 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5849                                  					; get next bds,	assume segment
  5850 00001C84 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, -1		; last bds?
  5851 00001C87 75F3                    		jnz	short drive_loop ; loop	if not
  5852 00001C89 EB4F                    		jmp	short rmap_exit	; yes, no hard drive on	system
  5853                                  
  5854                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5855                                  ;first disk drive bds, now change the logical drive num to 2 and the subsequent
  5856                                  ;logical drive nums to 3, 4, 5 etc.
  5857                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5858                                  
  5859                                  fdrv_found:				
  5860 00001C8B B002                    		mov	al, 2		; start	with logical drv num=2
  5861                                  fdrv_loop:				
  5862 00001C8D 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  5863                                  					; found	??
  5864 00001C90 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5865                                  					; ds:di--> next	bds
  5866                                  		;inc	al		; set num for next drive
  5867                                  		; 18/12/2022
  5868 00001C92 40                      		inc	ax
  5869 00001C93 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; last hard drive ??
  5870 00001C96 75F5                    		jnz	short fdrv_loop	; no - assign more disk	drives
  5871                                  
  5872                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5873                                  ; now, rescan and find bds of 3rd floppy drive and assign next drive letter
  5874                                  ; in al to 3rd. if the current drive letter is past z, then do not allocate
  5875                                  ; any more.
  5876                                  ;------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5877                                  
  5878 00001C98 2E8B3E[1901]            		mov	di, [cs:start_bds] ; [start_bds]
  5879                                  					; get first bds
  5880 00001C9D 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5881                                  					; ds:di-->bds2
  5882 00001C9F 2E8A26[2501]            		mov	ah, [cs:dsktnum] ; get number of floppies to remap
  5883 00001CA4 80EC02                  		sub	ah, 2		; adjust for a:	& b:
  5884                                  remap_loop1:				
  5885 00001CA7 8B3D                    		mov	di, [di]	; [di+BDS.link]
  5886                                  					; set new num to next floppy
  5887 00001CA9 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  5888 00001CAC FEC0                    		inc	al		; new number for next floppy
  5889 00001CAE FECC                    		dec	ah		; count	down extra floppies
  5890 00001CB0 75F5                    		jnz	short remap_loop1
  5891                                  
  5892                                  ; now we've got to adjust the boot drive if we reassigned it
  5893                                  
  5894 00001CB2 2EA0[CA16]              		mov	al, [cs:drvfat]
  5895 00001CB6 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; is it	a: or b: ?
  5896 00001CB8 7220                    		jb	short rmap_exit
  5897 00001CBA 2E2A06[2501]            		sub	al, [cs:dsktnum] ; is it one of the other floppies?
  5898 00001CBF 7204                    		jb	short remap_boot_flop ;	brif so
  5899                                  
  5900                                  ; we've got to remap the boot hard drive
  5901                                  ; subtract the number of EXTRA floppies from it
  5902                                  
  5903 00001CC1 0402                    		add	al, 2		; bootdrv -= (dsktnum-2)
  5904 00001CC3 EB05                    		jmp	short remap_change_boot_drv
  5905                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  5906                                  
  5907                                  ; we've got to remap the boot floppy.
  5908                                  ; add the number of hard drive partitions to it
  5909                                  
  5910                                  remap_boot_flop:			
  5911 00001CC5 2E0206[7500]            		add	al, [cs:drvmax]	; bootdrv += (drvmax-dsktnum)
  5912                                  remap_change_boot_drv:			
  5913 00001CCA 2EA2[CA16]              		mov	[cs:drvfat], al ; alter msdos.sys load drive
  5914 00001CCE FEC0                    		inc	al
  5915 00001CD0 1E                      		push	ds
  5916 00001CD1 BF5804                  		mov	di, SYSINITSEG	; 46Dh
  5917                                  		;mov	di, 46Dh	; SYSINIT segment
  5918 00001CD4 8EDF                    		mov	ds, di
  5919 00001CD6 A2[9602]                		mov	[DEFAULTDRIVE], al
  5920                                  		;mov	ds:296h, al	; [SYSINIT+DEFAULT_DRIVE]
  5921                                  					; pass it to sysinit as	well
  5922 00001CD9 1F                      		pop	ds
  5923                                  rmap_exit:				
  5924 00001CDA C3                      		retn
  5925                                  
  5926                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  5927                                  
  5928                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5929                                  ; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 5.0 -actual-)
  5930                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21 -draft-)
  5931                                  ; 02/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0 (MSDOS 3.3)	
  5932                                  ; 19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0 (MSDOS 2.11)
  5933                                  ;**************************************************
  5934                                  ; getboot - get the boot sector for a hard disk
  5935                                  ;
  5936                                  ; Reads the boot sector from a specified drive into
  5937                                  ; a buffer at the top of memory.
  5938                                  ;
  5939                                  ; dl = int13 drive number to read boot sector for
  5940                                  ;**************************************************
  5941                                  
  5942                                  ; 17/10/2022
  5943                                  bootbias equ 200h
  5944                                  
  5945                                  getboot:	; proc near		
  5946                                  		
  5947                                  		; 08/04/2018
  5948                                  		; Retro DOS v2.0 (IBMBIO.COM, IBMDOS 2.1)
  5949                                  		; 28/03/2018 - MSDOS 6.0 - MSINIT.ASM, 1991
  5950                                  		; 02/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0
  5951                                  		;	      (disassembled IO.SYS code of MSDOS 5.0)
  5952                                  
  5953 00001CDB 2EA1[D516]              		mov	ax, [cs:init_bootseg] ; 17/10/2022
  5954 00001CDF 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
  5955                                  		; 17/10/2022
  5956 00001CE1 BB0002                  		mov	bx, bootbias ; 200h
  5957                                  		;mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  5958                                  					; load BX, ES:BX is where sector goes
  5959 00001CE4 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  5960 00001CE7 30F6                    		xor	dh, dh
  5961 00001CE9 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
  5962 00001CEC CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  5963                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  5964                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  5965                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  5966 00001CEE 7209                    		jb	short erret
  5967                                  		; 17/10/2022
  5968 00001CF0 26813EFE0355AA          		cmp	word [es:bootbias+1FEh], 0AA55h
  5969                                  		;cmp	word ptr es:3FEh, 0AA55h ; [es:bootbias+1FEh]
  5970                                  					; Dave Litton magic word?
  5971 00001CF7 7401                    		jz	short norm_ret	; yes
  5972                                  erret:					
  5973 00001CF9 F9                      		stc
  5974                                  norm_ret:				
  5975 00001CFA C3                      		retn
  5976                                  
  5977                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  5978                                  
  5979                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 
  5980                                  
  5981                                  ;***************************************************************************
  5982                                  ;   sethard - generate bpb for a variable sized hard file. ibm has a
  5983                                  ;   partitioned hard file; we must read physical sector 0 to determine where
  5984                                  ;   our own logical sectors start. we also read in our boot sector to
  5985                                  ;   determine version number
  5986                                  ;
  5987                                  ;   inputs:	dl is rom drive number (80...)
  5988                                  ;		bh is partition number (0....) 
  5989                                  ;		ds:di points to bds
  5990                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear -> bpb is filled in
  5991                                  ;		carry set   -> bpb is left uninitialized due to error
  5992                                  ;	trashes (at least) si, cx
  5993                                  ;	MUST PRESERVE ES:!!!!
  5994                                  ;***************************************************************************
  5995                                  
  5996                                  sethard:	; proc near		
  5997 00001CFB 57                      		push	di
  5998 00001CFC 53                      		push	bx
  5999 00001CFD 1E                      		push	ds
  6000 00001CFE 06                      		push	es
  6001 00001CFF 885D05                  		mov	[di+5],	bl	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  6002 00001D02 885504                  		mov	[di+4],	dl	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  6003 00001D05 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  6004                                  					; fnon_removable
  6005 00001D09 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  6006                                  					; ffHardFile
  6007 00001D0D C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit FAT
  6008 00001D12 88FE                    		mov	dh, bh		; partition number
  6009 00001D14 52                      		push	dx
  6010 00001D15 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  6011 00001D17 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  6012                                  					; DL = drive number
  6013                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  6014                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  6015                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  6016 00001D19 FEC6                    		inc	dh
  6017 00001D1B 887515                  		mov	[di+15h], dh	; [di+BDS.heads] ; get number of heads
  6018 00001D1E 5A                      		pop	dx
  6019 00001D1F 7263                    		jb	short setret	; error	if no hard disk
  6020 00001D21 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  6021 00001D24 884D13                  		mov	[di+13h], cl	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6022 00001D27 52                      		push	dx		; save partition number
  6023 00001D28 E8B0FF                  		call	getboot
  6024 00001D2B 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore partition number
  6025 00001D2C 7256                    		jb	short setret
  6026 00001D2E BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  6027                                  
  6028                                  ; The first 'active' partition is 00, the second is 01....
  6029                                  ;   then the remainder of the 'primary' but non-active partitions
  6030                                  
  6031                                  act_part:				
  6032 00001D31 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h ; is the partition active?
  6033 00001D36 7418                    		jz	short no_act	; no
  6034 00001D38 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; reject if partitiontype != 1, 4 or 6
  6035 00001D3C 740C                    		jz	short got_good_act
  6036 00001D3E 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4
  6037 00001D42 7406                    		jz	short got_good_act
  6038 00001D44 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6
  6039 00001D48 7506                    		jnz	short no_act
  6040                                  got_good_act:				
  6041 00001D4A 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition #?
  6042 00001D4C 743A                    		jz	short set2	; WE GOT THE ONE WANTED!!
  6043 00001D4E FECE                    		dec	dh		; count	down
  6044                                  no_act:					
  6045 00001D50 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  6046 00001D53 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  6047                                  					; last entry done?
  6048 00001D57 75D8                    		jnz	short act_part	; no, process next entry
  6049 00001D59 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  6050                                  					; restore original value of bx
  6051                                  
  6052                                  ; Now scan the non-active partitions
  6053                                  
  6054                                  get_primary:				
  6055 00001D5C 26F647FC80              		test	byte [es:bx-4], 80h
  6056 00001D61 7518                    		jnz	short not_prim	; we've already scanned
  6057                                  					; the ACTIVE ones

  6059 00001D67 740C                    		jz	short got_prim
  6060 00001D69 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4
  6061 00001D6D 7406                    		jz	short got_prim
  6062 00001D6F 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6
  6063 00001D73 7506                    		jnz	short not_prim
  6064                                  got_prim:				
  6065 00001D75 08F6                    		or	dh, dh		; is this our target partition?
  6066 00001D77 740F                    		jz	short set2
  6067 00001D79 FECE                    		dec	dh

  6070 00001D7E 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias

  6072                                  setret:

  6074 00001D85 E9DC02                  		jmp	ret_hard_err
  6075                                  
  6076                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6077                                  
  6078                                  ;  until we get the real logical boot record and get the bpb,
  6079                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be used instead of BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS
  6080                                  ;  for the convenience of the computation.
  6081                                  ;
  6082                                  ;  at the end of this procedure, if a bpb information is gotten from
  6083                                  ;  the valid boot record, then we are going to use those bpb information
  6084                                  ;  without change.
  6085                                  ;
  6086                                  ;  otherwise, if (hidden sectors + total sectors) <= a word, then we will move
  6087                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS (low) to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and zero out
  6088                                  ;  BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS entry to make it a conventional bpb format.
  6089

  6094 00001D91 268B5706                		mov	dx, [es:bx+6]

  6097                                  ; sectors should be allowed

  6100 00001D98 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0

  6102 00001D9F 2613570A                		adc	dx, [es:bx+10]
  6103 00001DA3 7305                    		jnb	short okdrive

  6105                                  okdrive:

  6107 00001DAE 894517                  		mov	[di+17h], ax	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  6108                                  					; BPB_HIDDENSECTORS = p->partitionbegin
  6109 00001DB1 268B4706                		mov	ax, [es:bx+6]

  6112 00001DBC 268B4708                		mov	ax, [es:bx+8]	; # of sectors (low)

  6115                                  					; bpb->maxsec =	p->partitionlength

  6120                                  okdrive_1:

  6122 00001DD3 8B4517                  		mov	ax, [di+17h]	; [di+BDS.hiddensecs]
  6123 00001DD6 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; boot sector number - for mini	disk
  6124                                  					; usually equal	to the # of sec/trk.
  6125 00001DD8 8A5D13                  		mov	bl, [di+13h]	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6126 00001DDB 50                      		push	ax

  6128 00001DDE 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx

  6130                                  					; (track)temp_h:ax + (sector)dx
  6131                                  		; 17/10/2022

  6133 00001DE6 58                      		pop	ax

  6138 00001DEF 8A5D15                  		mov	bl, [di+15h]	; [di+BDS.heads]
  6139 00001DF2 50                      		push	ax
  6140 00001DF3 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx

  6146 00001E02 2E833E[2905]00          		cmp	word [cs:temp_h], 0

  6148 00001E0A 3D0004                  		cmp	ax, 1024
  6149 00001E0D 7777                    		ja	short setret_brdg ; exceeds the	limit of int 13h
  6150                                  			; Retro DOS v3.2 note by Erdogan Tan - 28/07/2019
  6151                                  			; **MSDOS code accepts if ax = 1024 but it is nonsense here
  6152                                  			; ('ja' must be 'jnb')
  6153                                  okdrive_2:
  6154                                   		; 28/07/2019
  6155                                  ; dl is head.
  6156                                  ; ax is cylinder
  6157                                  ; cl is sector number (assume less than 2**6 = 64 for int 13h)
  6158

  6162                                  					; check	for mini disk

  6167                                  ;*** end of added logic for mini disk

  6170 00001E1A D0CC                    		ror	ah, 1		; two bits of upper byte

  6172 00001E1F 08E1                    		or	cl, ah		; move two bits	to correct spot
  6173 00001E21 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; ch is	cylinder (low 8	bits)
  6174                                  					; cl is	sector + 2 high	bits of	cylinder

  6176 00001E25 2E8A16[D716]            		mov	dl, [cs:rom_drv_num] ; dl is drive number
  6177                                  
  6178                                  ; cl is sector + 2 high bits of cylinder
  6179                                  ; ch is low 8 bits of cylinder
  6180                                  ; dh is head
  6181                                  ; dl is drive
  6182                                  
  6183                                  ; for convenience, we are going to read the logical boot sector
  6184                                  ; into cs:disksector area.
  6185                                  
  6186                                  ; read in boot sector using bios disk interrupt. the buffer where it
  6187                                  ; is to be read in is cs:disksector.
  6188                                  
  6189 00001E2A 0E                      		push	cs
  6190 00001E2B 07                      		pop	es
  6191 00001E2C BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; for convenience,
  6192                                  					; we are going to read the logical boot	sector
  6193                                  					; into cs:disksector area.
  6194 00001E2F B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  6195 00001E32 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  6196                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  6197                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  6198                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  6199                                  
  6200                                  ; cs:disksec contains the boot sector. in theory, (ha ha) the bpb in this thing
  6201                                  ; is correct. we can, therefore, suck out all the relevant statistics on the
  6202                                  ; media if we recognize the version number.
  6203                                  
  6204 00001E34 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector
  6205 00001E37 53                      		push	bx
  6206 00001E38 50                      		push	ax
  6207 00001E39 2E803FE9                		cmp	byte [cs:bx], 0E9h ; is it a near jump?
  6208 00001E3D 740D                    		jz	short check_1_ok ; yes
  6209 00001E3F 2E803FEB                		cmp	byte [cs:bx], 0EBh ; is it a short jump?
  6210 00001E43 7529                    		jnz	short invalid_boot_record ; no
  6211 00001E45 2E807F0290              		cmp	byte [cs:bx+2], 90h ; yes, is the next one a nop?
  6212 00001E4A 7522                    		jnz	short invalid_boot_record
  6213                                  check_1_ok:
  6214                                  		; 14/08/2023			
  6215 00001E4C BB[5901]                		mov	bx, disksector+11 ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB				
  6216                                  		;mov	bx, 159h	; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB
  6217                                  					; point	to the bpb in the boot record
  6218 00001E4F 2E8A470A                		mov	al, [cs:bx+10]	; [bx+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
  6219                                  					; get the mediadescriptor byte
  6220 00001E53 24F0                    		and	al, 0F0h	; mask off low nibble
  6221 00001E55 3CF0                    		cmp	al, 0F0h	; is high nibble = 0Fh?
  6222 00001E57 7515                    		jnz	short invalid_boot_record ; no,	invalid	boot record
  6223 00001E59 2E813F0002              		cmp	word [cs:bx], 512 ; [bx+EBPB.BYTESPERSECTOR]
  6224 00001E5E 750E                    		jnz	short invalid_boot_record ; invalidate non 512 byte sectors
  6225                                  
  6226                                  check2_ok:				; yes, mediadescriptor ok.
  6227 00001E60 2E8A4702                		mov	al, [cs:bx+2]	; now make sure	that
  6228                                  					; the sectorspercluster	is
  6229                                  					; a power of 2
  6230                                  					;
  6231                                  					; [bx+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
  6232                                  					; get the sectorspercluster
  6233 00001E64 08C0                    		or	al, al		; is it	zero?
  6234 00001E66 7406                    		jz	short invalid_boot_record ; yes, invalid boot record
  6235                                  
  6236                                  ck_power_of_two:			
  6237 00001E68 D0E8                    		shr	al, 1		; shift	until first bit	emerges
  6238 00001E6A 73FC                    		jnb	short ck_power_of_two

  6245                                  					; unformatted or illegal media.

  6301                                  
  6302                                  ; 03/10/2022
  6303                                  
  6304                                  ; we have a valid boot sector. use the bpb in it to build the
  6305                                  ; bpb in bios. it is assumed that only
  6306                                  ;	BDS_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERCLUSTER
  6307                                  ;	BDS_BPB.BPB_ROOTENTRIES, and
  6308                                  ;	BDS_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERFAT
  6309                                  ; need to be set (all other values in already). fbigfat is also set.
  6310                                  
  6311                                  ; if it is non fat based system, then just copy the bpb from the boot sector
  6312                                  ; into the bpb in bds table, and also set the boot serial number, volume id,
  6313                                  ; and system id according to the boot record.
  6314                                  ; for the non_fat system, don't need to set the other value. so just do goodret.
  6315

  6424                                  ; ****** cas ---

  6427                                  ; happens with some frequency -- perhaps through some OS/2 setup
  6428                                  ; program. We haven't actually been COPYING the TOTAL_SECTORS
  6429                                  ; from the boot sector into the DPB anyway, we've just been using
  6430                                  ; it for calculating the fat size. Pretty scary, huh? For now,
  6431                                  ; we'll go ahead and copy it into the DPB, except in the case
  6432                                  ; that it equals zero, in which case we just use the values in
  6433                                  ; the DPB from the partition table.
  6434                                  
  6435                                  ; 17/10/2022
  6436                                  ;MOVMEDIAIDS equ mov_media_ids - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h ; (751h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  6437                                  ;CLEARIDS equ clear_ids - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h ; (5D9h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)		    		
  6438                                  ; 09/12/2022
  6439                                  MOVMEDIAIDS equ mov_media_ids
  6440                                  CLEARIDS equ clear_ids
  6441                                  ; 11/09/2023
  6442                                  CLEARIDS_X equ clear_ids_x
  6443                                  
  6444                                  copybpb_fat:
  6445                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6446                                  		; (number of FATs optimization)
  6447                                  		; SI = disksector+11				
  6448                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6449                                  		;mov	si, disksector+11
  6450                                  		;;mov	si, 159h	; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB
  6451                                  					; cs:si	-> bpb in boot
  6452 00001F11 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6453 00001F13 2E8B4408                		mov	ax, [cs:si+8]	; [cs:si+EBPB.TOTALSECTORS]
  6454                                  					; get totsec from boot sec
  6455 00001F17 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  6456 00001F19 7516                    		jnz	short copy_totsec ; if non zero, use that
  6457 00001F1B 2E8B4415                		mov	ax, [cs:si+15h]	; [cs:si+EBPB.BIGTOTALSECTORS]
  6458                                  					; get the big version
  6459                                  					; (32 bit total	sectors)
  6460 00001F1F 2E8B5417                		mov	dx, [cs:si+17h]	; [cs:si+EBPB.BIGTOTALSECTORS+2]
  6461                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6462                                  		; (number of FATs optimization)
  6463                                  		; CL = number of FATs (2 or 1) 
  6464 00001F23 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; see if it is a big zero
  6465 00001F25 09C3                    		or	bx, ax
  6466 00001F27 7508                    		jnz	short copy_totsec
  6467                                  			; screw it. it	was bogus.
  6468 00001F29 8B451B                  		mov	ax, [di+1Bh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6469 00001F2C 8B551D                  		mov	dx, [di+1Dh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6470 00001F2F EB06                    		jmp	short fat_big_small
  6471                                  
  6472                                  		;mov	cx, dx
  6473                                  		;or	cx, ax		; see if it is a big zero
  6474                                  		;jz	short totsec_already_set ; screw it. it	was bogus.
  6475                                  copy_totsec:				
  6476 00001F31 89451B                  		mov	[di+1Bh], ax	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6477                                  					; make DPB match boot sec
  6478 00001F34 89551D                  		mov	[di+1Dh], dx	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6479                                  
  6480                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6481                                  ;totsec_already_set:			
  6482                                  		;mov	ax, [di+1Bh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6483                                  		;mov	dx, [di+1Dh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6484                                  
  6485                                  ; determine fat entry size.
  6486                                  
  6487                                  fat_big_small:
  6488                                  
  6489                                  ;at this moment dx;ax = total sector number
  6490                                  
  6491                                  ;Do not assume 1 reserved sector. Update the reserved sector field in BDS 
  6492                                  ;from the BPB on the disk
  6493                                  				
  6494 00001F37 2E8B5C03                		mov	bx, [cs:si+3]	; [cs:si+EBPB.RESERVEDSECTORS]
  6495                                  					; get #reserved_sectors	from BPB
  6496 00001F3B 895D09                  		mov	[di+9],	bx	; [di+BDS.resectors]
  6497                                  					; update BDS field
  6498 00001F3E 29D8                    		sub	ax, bx
  6499 00001F40 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; update the count
  6500 00001F43 2E8B5C0B                		mov	bx, [cs:si+0Bh]	; [cs:si+EBPB.SECTORSPERFAT]
  6501                                  					; bx = sectors/fat
  6502 00001F47 895D11                  		mov	[di+11h], bx	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  6503                                  					; set in bds bpb
  6504                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6505                                  		; (number of FATs optimization)
  6506                                  		; CL = number of FATs (2 or 1) 
  6507                                  		;dec	cl ; *
  6508                                  		; 18/12/2022
  6509 00001F4A 49                      		dec	cx ; *
  6510 00001F4B D3E3                    		shl	bx, cl			
  6511                                  		;shl	bx, 1	; =*?=	; always 2 fats
  6512                                  		
  6513 00001F4D 29D8                    		sub	ax, bx		; sub #	fat sectors
  6514 00001F4F 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0
  6515 00001F52 2E8B5C06                		mov	bx, [cs:si+6]	; [cs:si+EBPB.ROOTENTRIES]
  6516                                  					; # root entries
  6517 00001F56 895D0C                  		mov	[di+0Ch], bx	; [di+BDS.direntries]
  6518                                  					; set in bds bpb
  6519 00001F59 B104                    		mov	cl, 4
  6520 00001F5B D3EB                    		shr	bx, cl		; div by 16 ents/sector
  6521 00001F5D 29D8                    		sub	ax, bx		; sub #	dir sectors
  6522 00001F5F 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		;
  6523                                  					; dx:ax	now contains the
  6524                                  					; # of data sectors
  6525 00001F62 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx ; *
  6526 00001F64 2E8A4C02                		mov	cl, [cs:si+2]	; [cs:si+EBPB.SECTORSPERCLUSTER]
  6527                                  					; sectors per cluster
  6528 00001F68 884D08                  		mov	[di+8],	cl	; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  6529                                  					; set in bios bpb
  6530 00001F6B 50                      		push	ax
  6531 00001F6C 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  6532 00001F6E 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6533 00001F70 F7F1                    		div	cx		; cx = sectors per cluster
  6534 00001F72 2EA3[2905]              		mov	[cs:temp_h], ax	; [temp_h]:ax now contains the
  6535                                  					; # clusters.
  6536 00001F76 58                      		pop	ax
  6537 00001F77 F7F1                    		div	cx
  6538 00001F79 2E833E[2905]00          		cmp	word [cs:temp_h], 0
  6539 00001F7F 771C                    		ja	short toobig_ret ; too big cluster number
  6540 00001F81 3DF60F                  		cmp	ax, 0FF6h	; 4096-10
  6541                                  					; is this 16-bit fat?
  6542 00001F84 7205                    		jb	short copymediaid ; no,	small fat
  6543                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6544 00001F86 800E[D216]40            		or	byte [fbigfat], 40h
  6545                                  		;or	ds:fbigfat, 40h	; fbig
  6546                                  					; 16 bit fat
  6547                                  copymediaid:				
  6548 00001F8B 06                      		push	es
  6549 00001F8C 1E                      		push	ds
  6550 00001F8D 07                      		pop	es
  6551 00001F8E 0E                      		push	cs
  6552 00001F8F 1F                      		pop	ds
  6553                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6554 00001F90 BD[3807]                		mov	bp, MOVMEDIAIDS
  6555                                  		;mov	bp, 751h	; mov_media_ids
  6556                                  					; at 2C7h:751h = 70h:2CC1h
  6557                                  					; copy filesys_id, volume label
  6558 00001F93 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  6559 00001F94 E8CEF7                  		call	call_bios_code
  6560 00001F97 06                      		push	es
  6561 00001F98 1F                      		pop	ds
  6562 00001F99 07                      		pop	es
  6563 00001F9A E9A100                  		jmp	massage_bpb	; now final check for bpb info
  6564                                  					; and return.
  6565                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6566                                  
  6567                                  toobig_ret:

  6569 00001FA3 E9B600                  		jmp	goodret		; still	drive letter is	assigned
  6570                                  					; but useless. to big for
  6571                                  					; current pc dos fat file system
  6572                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  6574                                  unknown:	
  6575                                  		; 12/12/2022
  6576 00001FA6 804D2402                		or	byte [di+24h], 02h

  6578                                  					; unformatted_media
  6579                                  					; Set unformatted media	flag.

  6590                                  scan:

  6598 00001FC0 83C60A                  		add	si, 10		; 5*2
  6599 00001FC3 EBEE                    		jmp	short scan	; covers upto 512 mb media
  6600                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6601                                  
  6602                                  gotparm:				
  6603 00001FC5 8A4C08                  		mov	cl, [si+8]	; fat size for fbigfat flag
  6604                                  		;or	ds:fbigfat, cl
  6605                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6606 00001FC8 080E[D216]              		or	[fbigfat], cl
  6607 00001FCC 2E8B4C04                		mov	cx, [cs:si+4]	; ch = number of sectors per cluster
  6608                                  					; cl = log base	2 of ch
  6609 00001FD0 2E8B5406                		mov	dx, [cs:si+6]	; dx = number of root dir entries
  6610                                  
  6611                                  ; now calculate size of fat table
  6612                                  
  6613 00001FD4 89550C                  		mov	[di+0Ch], dx	; [di+BDS.direntries]
  6614                                  					; save number of (root)	dir entries
  6615 00001FD7 8B551D                  		mov	dx, [di+1Dh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6616 00001FDA 8B451B                  		mov	ax, [di+1Bh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6617 00001FDD 886D08                  		mov	[di+8],	ch	; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  6618                                  					; save sectors per cluster
  6619                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6620 00001FE0 F606[D216]40            		test	byte [fbigfat], 40h
  6621                                  		;test	ds:fbigfat, 40h	; fbig
  6622                                  					; if (fbigfat)
  6623 00001FE5 751E                    		jnz	short dobig	; goto dobig; (16 bit fat)
  6624                                  
  6625                                  ; we don't need to change "small fat" logic since it is gauranteed
  6626                                  ; that double word total sector will not use 12 bit fat (unless
  6627                                  ; it's sectors/cluster >= 16 which will never be in this case.)
  6628                                  ; so in this case we assume dx = 0 !!
  6629                                  
  6630 00001FE7 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx		; (12 bit fat)
  6631 00001FE9 88EB                    		mov	bl, ch
  6632 00001FEB 4B                      		dec	bx
  6633 00001FEC 01C3                    		add	bx, ax		; dx=0
  6634 00001FEE D3EB                    		shr	bx, cl		; bx = 1+(bpb->maxsec+BDS.secperclus-1)/
  6635 00001FF0 43                      		inc	bx		; BDS.secperclus
  6636 00001FF1 80E3FE                  		and	bl, 0FEh	; bx &= ~1; (=number of clusters)
  6637 00001FF4 89DE                    		mov	si, bx
  6638 00001FF6 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1
  6639 00001FF8 01F3                    		add	bx, si
  6640 00001FFA 81C3FF01                		add	bx, 511		; bx +=	511 + bx/2
  6641 00001FFE D0EF                    		shr	bh, 1		; bh >>= 1; (=bx/512)
  6642 00002000 887D11                  		mov	[di+11h], bh	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  6643                                  					; save number of fat sectors
  6644 00002003 EB39                    		jmp	short massage_bpb
  6645                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6646                                  
  6647                                  ; for bigfat we do need to extend this logic to 32 bit sector calculation.
  6648                                  
  6649                                  dobig:					
  6650 00002005 B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 (2^4) directory entries per sector
  6651 00002007 52                      		push	dx		; save total sectors (high)
  6652 00002008 8B550C                  		mov	dx, [di+0Ch]	; [di+BDS.direntries]
  6653 0000200B D3EA                    		shr	dx, cl		; root dir sectors = BDS.direntries / 16;
  6654 0000200D 29D0                    		sub	ax, dx
  6655 0000200F 5A                      		pop	dx
  6656 00002010 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= total	sectors	- root dir sectors
  6657 00002013 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1
  6658 00002016 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0		; dx:ax	= t - r	- d
  6659                                  					; total	secs - reserved	secs - root dir	secs
  6660 00002019 B302                    		mov	bl, 2
  6661 0000201B 8A7D08                  		mov	bh, [di+8]	; [di+BDS.secperclus]
  6662                                  					; bx = 256 * BDS.secperclus + 2
  6663                                  
  6664                                  ; I don't understand why to add bx here!!!
  6665                                  
  6666                                  		; 29/12/2018 - Erdogan Tan (Retro DOS v4.0)
  6667                                  		; 27/09/2022
  6668                                  		; (Microsoft FAT32 File	System Specification,
  6669                                  		; December 2000, Page 21)
  6670                                  		; TmpVal1 = DskSize - (BPB_ResvdSecCnt+RootrDirSectors)
  6671                                  		; TmpVal2 = (256*BPB_SecPerClus)+BPB_NumFATs
  6672                                  		; FATsz	= (TmpVal1+(TmpVal2-1))/TmpVal2
  6673                                  		; (If FATType == FAT16,	BPB_FATSz16 = LOWORD(FATSz))
  6674                                  		
  6675 0000201E 01D8                    		add	ax, bx		; ax = t-r-d+256*spc+2
  6676 00002020 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  6677 00002023 83E801                  		sub	ax, 1		; ax = t-r-d+256*spc+1
  6678 00002026 83DA00                  		sbb	dx, 0
  6679                                  
  6680                                  ; assuming dx in the table will never be bigger than bx.
  6681                                  
  6682 00002029 F7F3                    		div	bx		; BDS.fatsecs =
  6683                                  					; ceil((total-dir-res)/(256*BDS.secperclus+2))
  6684 0000202B 894511                  		mov	[di+11h], ax	; [di+BDS.fatsecs]
  6685                                  					; number of fat	sectors
  6686                                  
  6687                                  ; now, set the default filesys_id, volume label, serial number
  6688                                  
  6689                                  		;;mov	bl, ds:fbigfat
  6690                                  		; 11/09/2023
  6691                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6692                                  		;mov	bl, [fbigfat]
  6693                                  		;mov	[di+1Fh], bl	; [di+BDS.fatsiz] ; fat	size flag
  6694                                  
  6695 0000202E 1E                      		push	ds
  6696 0000202F 1E                      		push	ds
  6697 00002030 07                      		pop	es
  6698 00002031 0E                      		push	cs
  6699 00002032 1F                      		pop	ds
  6700                                  		; 11/09/2023
  6701 00002033 A0[D216]                		mov	al, [fbigfat]
  6702 00002036 BD[D005]                		mov	bp, CLEARIDS_X	; clear_ids_x (uses AL value here)
  6703                                  		; 17/10/2022
  6704                                  		;mov	bp, CLEARIDS
  6705                                  		;;mov	bp, 5D9h	; clear_ids
  6706                                  					; at 2C7h:5D9h = 70h:2B49h
  6707 00002039 0E                      		push	cs
  6708 0000203A E828F7                  		call	call_bios_code
  6709 0000203D 1F                      		pop	ds
  6710                                  
  6711                                  ; at this point, in bpb of bds table, BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS which is
  6712                                  ; set according to the partition information. we are going to
  6713                                  ; see if (hidden sectors + total sectors) > a word. if it is true,
  6714                                  ; then no change. otherwise, BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be moved
  6715                                  ; to BDS_BPB.BPB_TOTALSECTORS and BDS_BPB.BPB_BIGTOTALSECTORS will be set to 0.
  6716                                  ; we don't do this for the bpb information from the boot record. we
  6717                                  ; are not going to change the bpb information from the boot record.
  6718                                  
  6719                                  massage_bpb:
  6720                                  		; 11/09/2023
  6721                                  		;; 12/12/2022
  6722                                  		;mov	bl, [fbigfat]
  6723                                  		;mov	[di+1Fh], bl	; [di+BDS.fatsiz]
  6724                                  		;;			; set size of fat on media

  6726 0000203E 8B551D                  		mov	dx, [di+1Dh]	; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]

  6729                                  		;ja	short goodret	; don't have to change it.

  6768                                  ;fdisk of pc dos 3.3 and below, os2 1.0 has a bug. the maximum number of
  6769                                  ;sector that can be handled by pc dos 3.3 ibmbio should be 0ffffh.
  6770                                  ;instead, sometimes fdisk use 10000h to calculate the maximum number.

  6781                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
  6782 00002072 7431                    		jz	short cfb_retit	; if extended bpb, then	>= pc dos 4.00

  6785 0000207C 2E807F0A30              		cmp	byte [cs:bx+10], '0'

  6790                                  		;mov	si, 159h	; disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB

  6795 00002091 2E034411                		add	ax, [cs:si+11h]	; [cs:si+EBPB.HIDDENSECTORS]
  6796 00002095 730E                    		jnb	short cfb_retit
  6797 00002097 750C                    		jnz	short cfb_retit	; if carry set and ax=0
  6798 00002099 2EFF4C08                		dec	word [cs:si+8]	; 0 -> 0FFFFh
  6799                                  					; then decrease	BPB_TOTALSECTORS by 1
  6800 0000209D 836D1B01                		sub	word [di+1Bh], 1 ; [di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6801 000020A1 835D1D00                		sbb	word [di+1Dh], 0 ; [di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6802                                  cfb_retit:				
  6803 000020A5 5E                      		pop	si
  6804 000020A6 5A                      		pop	dx
  6805 000020A7 58                      		pop	ax
  6806 000020A8 C3                      		retn
  6807                                  
  6808                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6809                                  
  6810 000020A9 0200                    word2		dw 2			
  6811 000020AB 0300                    word3		dw 3			
  6812 000020AD 0002                    word512		dw 512			
  6813                                  
  6814                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  6815                                  
  6816                                  ; 15/10/2022
  6817                                  
  6818                                  ; setdrvparms sets up the recommended bpb in each bds in the system based on
  6819                                  ; the form factor. it is assumed that the bpbs for the various form factors
  6820                                  ; are present in the bpbtable. for hard files, the recommended bpb is the same
  6821                                  ; as the bpb on the drive.
  6822                                  ;
  6823                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers since we are going to jump to
  6824                                  ; sysinit straight after this routine.
  6825                                  
  6826                                  setdrvparms:
  6827 000020AF 31DB                    		xor	bx, bx
  6828                                  		; 18/10/2022
  6829 000020B1 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds in list
  6830                                  _next_bds:				
  6831 000020B5 06                      		push	es
  6832 000020B6 57                      		push	di
  6833 000020B7 268A5D22                		mov	bl, [es:di+22h]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
  6834 000020BB 80FB05                  		cmp	bl, 5		; ffHardFile
  6835 000020BE 753E                    		jnz	short nothardff
  6836 000020C0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6837 000020C2 268B450E                		mov	ax, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
  6838 000020C6 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  6839 000020C8 7508                    		jnz	short get_ccyl
  6840 000020CA 268B551D                		mov	dx, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
  6841 000020CE 268B451B                		mov	ax, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
  6842                                  
  6843                                  get_ccyl:				
  6844 000020D2 52                      		push	dx
  6845 000020D3 50                      		push	ax
  6846 000020D4 268B4515                		mov	ax, [es:di+15h]	; [es:di+BDS.heads]
  6847 000020D8 26F76513                		mul	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
  6848                                  					; assume sectors per cyl. < 64k.
  6849 000020DC 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx has # sectors per cylinder
  6850 000020DE 58                      		pop	ax
  6851 000020DF 5A                      		pop	dx		; dx:ax	= total	sectors
  6852 000020E0 50                      		push	ax
  6853 000020E1 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
  6854 000020E3 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6855 000020E5 F7F1                    		div	cx
  6856 000020E7 2EA3[2905]              		mov	[cs:temp_h], ax	; ax be	0 here.
  6857 000020EB 58                      		pop	ax
  6858 000020EC F7F1                    		div	cx		; div #sec by sec/cyl to get # cyl.
  6859 000020EE 09D2                    		or	dx, dx
  6860 000020F0 7401                    		jz	short no_cyl_rnd ; came out even
  6861 000020F2 40                      		inc	ax		; round	up
  6862                                  
  6863                                  no_cyl_rnd:				
  6864 000020F3 26894525                		mov	[es:di+25h], ax	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
  6865 000020F7 06                      		push	es
  6866 000020F8 1F                      		pop	ds
  6867 000020F9 8D7506                  		lea	si, [di+6]	; [di+BDS.bytespersec]
  6868                                  					; ds:si	-> bpb for hard	file
  6869 000020FC EB55                    		jmp	short set_recbpb
  6870                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6871                                  
  6872                                  nothardff:				
  6873 000020FE 0E                      		push	cs
  6874 000020FF 1F                      		pop	ds
  6875                                  
  6876                                  ; if fake floppy drive variable is set then we don't have to handle this bds.
  6877                                  ; we can just go and deal with the next bds at label go_to_next_bds.
  6878                                  
  6879                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6880                                  		; ds = cs
  6881                                  		; 17/10/2022 (ds=cs)
  6882 00002100 803E[E116]01            		cmp	byte [fakefloppydrv], 1
  6883                                  		;cmp	byte [cs:fakefloppydrv], 1
  6884 00002105 7454                    		jz	short go_to_next_bds
  6885 00002107 80FB07                  		cmp	bl, 7		; ffother
  6886                                  					; special case "other" type of medium
  6887 0000210A 753D                    		jnz	short not_process_other
  6888                                  process_other:
  6889 0000210C 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6890 0000210E 8B4525                  		mov	ax, [di+25h]	; [di+BDS.cylinders]
  6891 00002111 F76536                  		mul	word [di+36h]	; [di+BDS.rheads]
  6892 00002114 F76534                  		mul	word [di+34h]	; [di+BDS.rsecpertrack]
  6893 00002117 89452F                  		mov	[di+2Fh], ax	; [di+BDS.rtotalsecs16]
  6894                                  					; have the total number of sectors
  6895 0000211A 48                      		dec	ax
  6896 0000211B B201                    		mov	dl, 1
  6897                                  _again:					
  6898 0000211D 3DF60F                  		cmp	ax, 0FF6h	; 4096-10
  6899 00002120 7206                    		jb	short _@@
  6900 00002122 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  6901 00002124 D0E2                    		shl	dl, 1
  6902 00002126 EBF5                    		jmp	short _again
  6903                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6904                                  
  6905                                  _@@:					
  6906 00002128 80FA01                  		cmp	dl, 1		; is it	a small	disk ?
  6907 0000212B 7405                    		jz	short __@@	; yes, 224 root	entries	is enuf
  6908 0000212D C7452DF000              		mov	word [di+2Dh], 240 ; [di+BDS.rdirentries]
  6909                                  __@@:					
  6910 00002132 885529                  		mov	[di+29h], dl	; [di+BDS.rsecperclus]
  6911                                  
  6912                                  ; logic to get the sectors/fat area.
  6913                                  ; fat entry is assumed to be 1.5 bytes!!!
  6914                                  
  6915                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6916                                  		; ds = cs
  6917                                  		; 17/10/2022 (ds=cs)
  6918 00002135 F726[AB20]              		mul	word [word3]
  6919 00002139 F736[A920]              		div	word [word2]
  6920 0000213D 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  6921 0000213F F736[AD20]              		div	word [word512]
  6922                                  		;
  6923                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6924                                  		;mul	word [cs:word3]	; * 3 ; mul word [cs:word3]
  6925                                  		;div	word [cs:word2]	; / 2 ; div word [cs:word2]
  6926                                  		;xor	dx, dx
  6927                                  		;div	word [cs:word512] ; / 512 ; div word [cs:word512]
  6928                                  		;
  6929 00002143 40                      		inc	ax		; + 1
  6930                                  no_round_up:
  6931 00002144 894532                  		mov	[di+32h], ax	; [di+BDS.rfatsecs]
  6932 00002147 EB12                    		jmp	short go_to_next_bds
  6933                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6934                                  
  6935                                  not_process_other:			
  6936 00002149 D1E3                    		shl	bx, 1		; bx is	word index into	table of bpbs
  6937                                  		;mov	si, bpbtable
  6938                                  		;mov	si, [bpbtable+bx] ; 15/10/2022
  6939                                  		; 09/12/2022
  6940                                  		;mov	si, BPBTABLE
  6941                                  		;mov	si, [bx+si]	; get address of bpb
  6942                                  		; 10/12/2022
  6943                                  		;mov	si, [BPBTABLE+bx]
  6944                                  		; 13/12/2022
  6945                                  		;mov	si, [SYSINITOFFSET+bpbtable+bx] ; wrong ! 14/08/2023
  6946                                  		; 14/08/2023
  6947                                  		SYSINIT_OFFSET equ ((SYSINITSEG-DOSBIODATASEG)<<4)
  6948                                  							; correct offset
  6949                                  		
  6950 0000214B 8BB7[0E76]              		mov	si, [bx+SYSINIT_OFFSET+bpbtable]
  6951                                  
  6952                                  		; 28/08/2023
  6953 0000214F 81C6803E                		add	si, SYSINIT_OFFSET
  6954                                  set_recbpb:				
  6955 00002153 8D7D27                  		lea	di, [di+27h]	; [di+BDS.R_BPB]
  6956                                  					; es:di	-> recbpb
  6957 00002156 B91900                  		mov	cx, 25		; bpbx.size
  6958 00002159 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; move (size bpbx) bytes	
  6959                                  go_to_next_bds:				
  6960 0000215B 5F                      		pop	di
  6961 0000215C 07                      		pop	es		; restore pointer to bds
  6962 0000215D 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
  6963 00002160 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; -1
  6964 00002163 740A                    		jz	short got_end_of_bds_chain
  6965 00002165 E94DFF                  		jmp	_next_bds
  6966                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  6967                                  
  6968                                  		; 18/12/2022
  6969                                  ;got_end_of_bds_chain:			
  6970                                  		;retn
  6971

  6973                                  
  6974                                  ; 15/10/2022
  6975                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  6976                                  
  6977                                  ; al = device number
  6978                                  
  6979                                  print_init:	
  6980 00002168 98                      		cbw
  6981 00002169 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  6982 0000216B B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  6983 0000216D CD17                    		int	17h		; PRINTER - INITIALIZE
  6984                                  					; DX = printer port (0-3)
  6985                                  					; Return: AH = status
  6986                                  got_end_of_bds_chain:	; 18/12/2022
  6987 0000216F C3                      		retn

  7002                                  					; 	AL = initializing parameters,
  7003                                  					;	DX = port number (0-3)
  7004                                  					; Return: AH = RS-232 status code bits,
  7005                                  					;	  AL = modem status bits
  7006 00002178 C3                      		retn

  7010                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7011                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7012                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7013                                  ; (19/03/2018 - Retro DOS v2.0)
  7014                                  
  7015                                  ; domini **********************************************************************
  7016                                  ;
  7017                                  ;mini disk initialization routine. called right after dohard
  7018                                  ;modified for >2 hardfile support
  7019                                  ;
  7020                                  ; **cs=ds=es=datagrp
  7021                                  ;
  7022                                  ; **domini will search for every extended partition in the system, and
  7023                                  ;   initialize it.
  7024                                  ;
  7025                                  ; **bdsm stands for bds table for mini disk and located right after the label
  7026                                  ;   end96tpi. end_of_bdsm will have the offset value of the ending
  7027                                  ;   address of bdsm table.
  7028                                  ;
  7029                                  ; **bdsm is the same as usual bds structure except that tim_lo, tim_hi entries
  7030                                  ;   are overlapped and used to identify mini disk and the number of hidden_trks.
  7031                                  ;   right now, they are called as ismini, hidden_trks respectively.
  7032                                  ;
  7033                                  ; **domini will use the same routine in sethard routine after label set2 to
  7034                                  ;   save coding.
  7035                                  ;
  7036                                  ; **drvmax determined in dohard routine will be used for the next
  7037                                  ;   available logical mini disk drive number.
  7038                                  ;
  7039                                  ; input: drvmax, dskdrvs
  7040                                  ;
  7041                                  ; output: minidisk installed. bdsm table established and installed to bds.
  7042                                  ;	  end_of_bdsm - ending offset address of bdsm.
  7043                                  ;
  7044                                  ; called modules:
  7045                                  ;		  getboot
  7046                                  ;		  find_mini_partition (new), xinstall_bds (new), M038
  7047                                  ;
  7048                                  ;		  setmini (new, it will use set2 routine)
  7049                                  ;
  7050                                  ; variables used: end_of_bdsm
  7051                                  ;		  rom_minidisk_num
  7052                                  ;		  mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7053                                  ;		  BDS_STRUC, start_bds
  7054                                  ;
  7055                                  ;******************************************************************************
  7056                                  
  7057                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7058                                  domini:	
  7059 00002179 8A36[5117]              		mov	dh, [hnum]	; get number of hardfiles
  7060                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7061 0000217D 20F6                    		and	dh, dh
  7062                                  		;cmp	dh, 0
  7063 0000217F 7431                    		jz	short dominiret	; no hard file?	then exit.
  7064 00002181 B280                    		mov	dl, 80h		; start	with hardfile 80h
  7065                                  domini_loop:				
  7066 00002183 52                      		push	dx
  7067 00002184 8816[5017]              		mov	[rom_minidisk_num], dl
  7068 00002188 B408                    		mov	ah, 8
  7069 0000218A CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	GET CURRENT DRIVE PARAMETERS (XT,AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7070                                  					; DL = drive number
  7071                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status code, BL	= drive	type
  7072                                  					; DL = number of consecutive drives
  7073                                  					; DH = maximum value for head number, ES:DI -> drive parameter
  7074 0000218C FEC6                    		inc	dh
  7075 0000218E 31C0                    		xor	ax, ax
  7076 00002190 88F0                    		mov	al, dh
  7077 00002192 A3[5617]                		mov	[mini_hdlim], ax ; # of heads
  7078 00002195 80E13F                  		and	cl, 3Fh
  7079 00002198 88C8                    		mov	al, cl
  7080 0000219A A3[5817]                		mov	[mini_seclim], ax ; # of sectors/track
  7081 0000219D 06                      		push	es
  7082 0000219E 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7083 000021A2 E836FB                  		call	getboot		; read master boot record into
  7084                                  					; initbootsegment:bootbias
  7085 000021A5 7203                    		jb	short domininext
  7086 000021A7 E80900                  		call	find_mini_partition
  7087                                  domininext:				
  7088 000021AA 07                      		pop	es
  7089 000021AB 5A                      		pop	dx
  7090 000021AC FEC2                    		inc	dl		; next hard file
  7091 000021AE FECE                    		dec	dh
  7092 000021B0 75D1                    		jnz	short domini_loop
  7093                                  dominiret:				
  7094 000021B2 C3                      		retn
  7095                                  
  7096                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7097                                  
  7098                                  ; 15/10/2022 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7099                                  ; 30/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7100                                  
  7101                                  ;find_mini_partition tries to find every extended partition on a disk.
  7102                                  ;at entry:	di -> bdsm entry
  7103                                  ;		es:bx -> 07c0:bootbias - master boot record
  7104                                  ;		rom_minidisk_num - rom drive number
  7105                                  ;		drvmax - logical drive number
  7106                                  ;		mini_hdlim, mini_seclim
  7107                                  ;
  7108                                  ;called routine: setmini which uses set2 (in sethard routine)
  7109                                  ;variables & equates used from original bios - flags, fnon_removable, fbigfat
  7110                                  
  7111                                  
  7112                                  find_mini_partition:	
  7113 000021B3 81C3C201                		add	bx, 1C2h	; bx ->	file system id
  7114                                  fmpnext:				
  7115 000021B7 26803F05                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 5 ; 5 = extended partition id.
  7116 000021BB 740A                    		jz	short fmpgot
  7117 000021BD 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7118 000021C0 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7119 000021C4 75F1                    		jnz	short fmpnext
  7120                                  		;jmp	short fmpnextfound ; extended partition	not found
  7121                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7122                                  fmpnextfound:
  7123 000021C6 C3                      		retn
  7124                                  
  7125                                  ;		; 30/07/2019 - Retro DOS v3.2
  7126                                  ;		jb	short fmpnext
  7127                                  ;fmpret:
  7128                                  ;		retn	; 29/05/2019
  7129                                  
  7130                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7131                                  
  7132                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7133                                  fmpgot:					; found my partition.				
  7134 000021C7 E8A100                  		call	dmax_check	; check	for drvmax already 26
  7135 000021CA 73FA                    		jnb	short fmpnextfound ; done if too many
  7136 000021CC 8B3E[5417]              		mov	di, [end_of_bdss] ; get next free	bds
  7137 000021D0 C745470100              		mov	word [di+47h], 1 ; [di+BDS.bdsm_ismini]
  7138                                  		; 10/12/2022
  7139 000021D5 804D2301                		or	byte [di+23h], 1
  7140                                  		;or	word [di+23h], 1 ; [di+BDS.flags]
  7141                                  					; fNon_Removable
  7142 000021D9 C6452205                		mov	byte [di+22h], 5 ; [di+BDS.formfactor]
  7143                                  					; ffHardFile
  7144 000021DD C606[D216]00            		mov	byte [fbigfat], 0 ; assume 12 bit fat.
  7145 000021E2 A1[5617]                		mov	ax, [mini_hdlim]
  7146 000021E5 894515                  		mov	[di+15h], ax	; [di+BDS.heads]
  7147 000021E8 A1[5817]                		mov	ax, [mini_seclim]
  7148 000021EB 894513                  		mov	[di+13h], ax	; [di+BDS.secpertrack]
  7149 000021EE A0[5017]                		mov	al, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7150 000021F1 884504                  		mov	[di+4],	al	; [di+BDS.drivenum]
  7151                                  					; set physical number
  7152 000021F4 A0[7500]                		mov	al, [drvmax]
  7153 000021F7 884505                  		mov	[di+5],	al	; [di+BDS.drivelet]
  7154                                  					; set logical number
  7155 000021FA 26837F0A00              		cmp	word [es:bx+10], 0
  7156 000021FF 7707                    		ja	short fmpgot_cont
  7157 00002201 26837F0840              		cmp	word [es:bx+8], 64 ; with current bpb,
  7158                                  					; only lower word is meaningful.
  7159 00002206 72BE                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7160                                  					; should be bigger than 64 sectors at least
  7161                                  fmpgot_cont:				
  7162 00002208 83EB04                  		sub	bx, 4		; let bx point to the start of the entry
  7163 0000220B 268A7702                		mov	dh, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder
  7164 0000220F 80E6C0                  		and	dh, 0C0h	; get higher bits of cyl
  7165 00002212 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7166 00002214 D0C6                    		rol	dh, 1
  7167 00002216 268A5703                		mov	dl, [es:bx+3]	; cyl byte
  7168 0000221A 895549                  		mov	[di+49h], dx	; [di+BDS.bdsm_hidden_trks]
  7169                                  					; set hidden trks
  7170 0000221D 268B4F02                		mov	cx, [es:bx+2]	; cylinder,cylinder/sector
  7171 00002221 268A7701                		mov	dh, [es:bx+1]	; head
  7172 00002225 8A16[5017]              		mov	dl, [rom_minidisk_num]
  7173 00002229 BB0002                  		mov	bx, 200h	; bootbias
  7174 0000222C B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
  7175 0000222F CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
  7176                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
  7177                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
  7178                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
  7179 00002231 7293                    		jb	short fmpnextfound
  7180 00002233 BBC203                  		mov	bx, 3C2h	; 1C2h+bootbias
  7181 00002236 06                      		push	es
  7182 00002237 E80900                  		call	setmini		; install a mini disk.
  7183                                  					; bx value saved.
  7184 0000223A 07                      		pop	es
  7185 0000223B 7203                    		jb	short fmpnextchain
  7186 0000223D E84000                  		call	xinstall_bds	; -- install the bdsm into table
  7187                                  fmpnextchain:				
  7188 00002240 E974FF                  		jmp	fmpnext		; let's find out
  7189                                  					; if we	have any chained partition
  7190                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7191                                  
  7192                                  		; 18/12/2022
  7193                                  ;fmpnextfound:				
  7194                                  		;retn
  7195                                  
  7196                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7197                                  
  7198                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7199                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0 (MSDOS 6.21)
  7200                                  
  7201                                  setmini:	; 'setmini' is called from 'find_mini_partition' procedure
  7202                                  	
  7203 00002243 57                      		push	di
  7204 00002244 53                      		push	bx
  7205 00002245 1E                      		push	ds
  7206 00002246 06                      		push	es
  7207                                  setmini_1:				
  7208 00002247 26803F01                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 1 ; FAT12 partition
  7209 0000224B 741B                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7210 0000224D 26803F04                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 4 ; FAT16 partition
  7211 00002251 7415                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7212 00002253 26803F06                		cmp	byte [es:bx], 6 ; FAT16 BIG	partition
  7213 00002257 740F                    		jz	short setmini_2
  7214 00002259 83C310                  		add	bx, 16
  7215 0000225C 81FB0204                		cmp	bx, 402h	; 202h+bootbias
  7216 00002260 75E5                    		jnz	short setmini_1
  7217 00002262 F9                      		stc
  7218 00002263 07                      		pop	es
  7219 00002264 1F                      		pop	ds
  7220 00002265 5B                      		pop	bx
  7221 00002266 5F                      		pop	di
  7222 00002267 C3                      		retn
  7223                                  
  7224                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7225                                  setmini_2:				
  7226 00002268 E91DFB                  		jmp	set2		; branch into middle of sethard
  7227                                  
  7228                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7229                                  
  7230                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7231                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7232                                  ;
  7233                                  ; dmax_check --- call this when we want to install a new drive.
  7234                                  ;		it checks for drvmax < 26 to see if there is
  7235                                  ;		a drive letter left.
  7236                                  ;
  7237                                  ;	drvmax < 26 : carry SET!
  7238                                  ;	drvmax >=26 : carry RESET!, error flag set for message later
  7239                                  ;			trash ax
  7240                                  
  7241                                  dmax_check:	
  7242 0000226B 803E[7500]1A            		cmp	byte [drvmax], 26 ; checks for drvmax < 26
  7243 00002270 720D                    		jb	short dmax_ok	; return with carry if okay
  7244 00002272 06                      		push	es
  7245                                  		;mov	ax, 46Dh	; SYSINIT_SEG (SYSINIT segment)
  7246 00002273 B85804                  		mov	ax, SYSINITSEG	; 17/10/2022	
  7247 00002276 8EC0                    		mov	es, ax
