  7249 00002278 26C606[FF03]01          		mov	byte [es:TOOMANYDRIVESFLAG], 1 ; 09/12/2022 
  7250                                  		;mov	byte ptr es:3FFh, 1 ; [es:toomanydrivesflag]
  7251                                  					; set message flag

  7253 0000227E 07                      		pop	es
  7254                                  
  7255                                  		;;push	es
  7256                                  		;;mov	ax,SYSINIT_SEG
  7257                                  		;;mov	es,ax
  7258                                  		;;mov	byte [es:toomanydrivesflag],1
  7259                                  					; set message flag
  7260                                  		;;pop	es
  7261                                  		;
  7262                                  		;mov	byte [SYSINIT+toomanydrivesflag],1
  7263                                  dmax_ok:				
  7264 0000227F C3                      		retn
  7265                                  
  7266                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7267                                  
  7268                                  ; 18/10/2022
  7269                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7270                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0						
  7271                                  ;								 
  7272                                  ;	link next bds (at ds:di) into the chain. assume that the
  7273                                  ;	  chain is entirely within ds == datagrp. also update drvmax,
  7274                                  ;	  dskdrv_table, and end_of_bdss.	
  7275                                  
  7276                                  xinstall_bds:		
  7277 00002280 56                      		push	si
  7278 00002281 53                      		push	bx
  7279 00002282 8B36[1901]              		mov	si, [start_bds]	; get first bds
  7280                                  xinstall_bds_1:				
  7281 00002286 833CFF                  		cmp	word [si], 0FFFFh ; is this the last one?
  7282 00002289 7404                    		jz	short xinstall_bds_2 ;	skip ahead if so
  7283                                  		;mov	si, [si+BDS.link]
  7284 0000228B 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; chain	through	list
  7285 0000228D EBF7                    		jmp	short xinstall_bds_1
  7286                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7287                                  
  7288                                  xinstall_bds_2:				
  7289                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link], di
  7290 0000228F 893C                    		mov	[si], di
  7291                                  		;mov	[si+BDS.link+2], ds
  7292 00002291 8C5C02                  		mov	[si+2], ds
  7293                                  		;mov	word [di+BDS.link], -1
  7294 00002294 C705FFFF                		mov	word [di], 0FFFFh ; make sure it is a null ptr.
  7295                                  		;mov	[di+BDS.link+2], ds
  7296 00002298 8C5D02                  		mov	[di+2], ds ; might as well plug segment
  7297                                  		; 20/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7298                                  		;lea	bx, [di+BDS.BPB]
  7299 0000229B 8D5D06                  		lea	bx, [di+6]
  7300 0000229E 8B36[5217]              		mov	si, [last_dskdrv_table]
  7301 000022A2 891C                    		mov	[si], bx
  7302 000022A4 8306[5217]02            		add	word [last_dskdrv_table], 2
  7303 000022A9 FE06[7500]              		inc	byte [drvmax]
  7304 000022AD 8306[5417]64            		add	word [end_of_bdss], 100 ; BDS.size = 100
  7305 000022B2 5B                      		pop	bx
  7306 000022B3 5E                      		pop	si
  7307 000022B4 C3                      		retn
  7308                                  
  7309                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7310                                  
  7311                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7312                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7313                                  ; 28/12/2018 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7314                                  ; 03/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7315                                  
  7316                                  cmos_clock_read:	
  7317 000022B5 50                      		push	ax
  7318 000022B6 51                      		push	cx
  7319 000022B7 52                      		push	dx
  7320 000022B8 55                      		push	bp
  7321 000022B9 31ED                    		xor	bp, bp
  7322                                  loop_clock:				
  7323 000022BB 31C9                    		xor	cx, cx
  7324 000022BD 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7325 000022BF B402                    		mov	ah, 2
  7326 000022C1 CD1A                    		int	1Ah		; CLOCK	- READ REAL TIME CLOCK (AT,XT286,CONV,PS)
  7327                                  					; Return: CH = hours in	BCD
  7328                                  					; CL = minutes in BCD
  7329                                  					; DH = seconds in BCD
  7330 000022C3 83F900                  		cmp	cx, 0
  7331 000022C6 7512                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7332 000022C8 83FA00                  		cmp	dx, 0
  7333 000022CB 750D                    		jnz	short clock_present
  7334 000022CD 83FD01                  		cmp	bp, 1		; read again after a slight delay, in case clock
  7335 000022D0 741C                    		jz	short no_readdate ; was	at zero	setting.
  7336 000022D2 45                      		inc	bp		; only perform delay once.
  7337 000022D3 B90040                  		mov	cx, 4000h	; 16384
  7338                                  delay:					
  7339 000022D6 E2FE                    		loop	delay
  7340 000022D8 EBE1                    		jmp	short loop_clock
  7341                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7342                                  
  7343                                  clock_present:				
  7344 000022DA 2EC606[F304]01          		mov	byte [cs:havecmosclock], 1 ; set the flag for cmos clock
  7345 000022E0 E81000                  		call	cmosck		; reset	cmos clock rate	that may be
  7346                                  					; possibly destroyed by	cp dos and
  7347                                  					; post routine did not restore that.
  7348 000022E3 56                      		push	si
  7349 000022E4 E842F2                  		call	read_real_date	; read real-time clock for date
  7350 000022E7 FA                      		cli
  7351                                  		;mov	ds:daycnt, si	; set system date
  7352 000022E8 8936[F004]              		mov	[daycnt], si
  7353 000022EC FB                      		sti
  7354 000022ED 5E                      		pop	si
  7355                                  
  7356                                  no_readdate:				
  7357 000022EE 5D                      		pop	bp
  7358 000022EF 5A                      		pop	dx
  7359 000022F0 59                      		pop	cx
  7360 000022F1 58                      		pop	ax
  7361 000022F2 C3                      		retn
  7362                                  
  7363                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7364                                  
  7365                                  ; the following code is written by jack gulley in engineering group.
  7366                                  ; cp dos (CP/DOS, OS/2) is changing cmos clock rate for its own purposes
  7367                                  ; and if the use cold boot the system to use pc dos while running cp dos,
  7368                                  ; the cmos clock rate are still slow which slow down disk operations
  7369                                  ; of pc dos which uses cmos clock. pc dos is put this code in msinit
  7370                                  ; to fix this problem at the request of cp dos.
  7371                                  ;
  7372                                  ; the program is modified to be run on msinit. equates are defined
  7373                                  ; in cmosequ.inc. this program will be called by cmos_clock_read procedure.
  7374                                  ;
  7375                                  ;  the following code cmosck is used to insure that the cmos has not
  7376                                  ;	had its rate controls left in an invalid state on older at's.
  7377                                  ;
  7378                                  ;	it checks for an at model byte "fc" with a submodel type of
  7379                                  ;	00, 01, 02, 03 or 06 and resets the periodic interrupt rate
  7380                                  ;	bits in case post has not done it. this initilization routine
  7381                                  ;	is only needed once when dos loads. it should be run as soon
  7382                                  ;	as possible to prevent slow diskette access.
  7383                                  ;
  7384                                  ;	this code exposes one to dos clearing cmos setup done by a
  7385                                  ;	resident program that hides and re-boots the system.
  7386                                  
  7387                                  cmosck:					; check and reset rtc rate bits	
  7388                                  
  7389                                  ;model byte and submodel byte were already determined in msinit.
  7390                                  
  7391                                  	; 16/06/2018 - Retro DOS v3.0
  7392                                  	; 19/03/2018 (Model: 0FCh, Sub Model: 01h, REF: AMIBIOS Prog. Guide)
  7393                                  			
  7394 000022F3 50                      		push	ax
  7395 000022F4 2E803E[3E06]FC          		cmp	byte [cs:model_byte], 0FCh
  7396 000022FA 7525                    		jnz	short cmosck9	; Exit if not an AT model
  7397 000022FC 2E803E[3F06]06          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 6
  7398                                  					; Is it 06 for the industral AT ?
  7399 00002302 7408                    		jz	short cmosck4	; Go reset CMOS	periodic rate if 06
  7400 00002304 2E803E[3F06]04          		cmp	byte [cs:secondary_model_byte], 4
  7401                                  					; Is it 00, 01, 02, or 03 ?
  7402 0000230A 7315                    		jnb	short cmosck9	; EXIT if problem fixed by POST  
  7403                                  					; Also,Secondary_model_byte = 0 
  7404                                  					;   when AH=0C0h, int 15h failed.
  7405                                  					;	RESET THE CMOS PERIODIC RATE 
  7406                                  					;  Model=FC submodel=00,01,02,03 or 06 
  7407                                  cmosck4:				
  7408 0000230C B08A                    		mov	al, 8Ah		; cmos_reg_a|nmi
  7409                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7410 0000230E B426                    		mov	ah, 26h		; 00100110b
  7411                                  					; Set divider &	rate selection
  7412 00002310 E83000                  		call	cmos_write
  7413 00002313 B08B                    		mov	al, 8Bh		; cmos_reg_b|nmi
  7414                                  					; NMI disabled on return
  7415 00002315 E80B00                  		call	cmos_read
  7416 00002318 2407                    		and	al, 7		; 00000111b
  7417                                  					; clear	SET,PIE,AIE,UIE,SQWE
  7418 0000231A 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
  7419 0000231C B00B                    		mov	al, 0Bh		; cmos_reg_b
  7420                                  					; NMI enabled on return
  7421 0000231E E82200                  		call	cmos_write
  7422                                  cmosck9:				
  7423 00002321 58                      		pop	ax
  7424 00002322 C3                      		retn
  7425                                  
  7426                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7427                                  
  7428                                  ;--- CMOS_READ -----------------------------------------------------------------
  7429                                  ;		read byte from cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7430                                  ;									       :
  7431                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be read				       :
  7432                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7433                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to read		       :
  7434                                  ;									       :
  7435                                  ; output: (al)	value at location (al) moved into (al). if bit 7 of (al) was   :
  7436                                  ;		on then nmi left disabled.  during the cmos read both nmi and  :
  7437                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7438                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7439                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7440                                  ;		only the (al) register and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7441                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7442                                  
  7443                                  cmos_read:				; read location (al) into (al)	
  7444 00002323 9C                      		pushf
  7445 00002324 FA                      		cli
  7446 00002325 53                      		push	bx
  7447 00002326 50                      		push	ax		; AL = cmos table address to be	read
  7448 00002327 0C80                    		or	al, 80h
  7449 00002329 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7450                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7451 0000232B 90                      		nop			; (undocumented	delay needed)
  7452 0000232C E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7453 0000232E 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax
  7454 00002330 58                      		pop	ax
  7455 00002331 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7456 00002333 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7457 00002335 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7458                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7459 00002337 90                      		nop
  7460 00002338 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7461 0000233A 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7462 0000233C 5B                      		pop	bx
  7463 0000233D 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7464 0000233E E80100                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7465 00002341 C3                      		retn			; return with flags restored
  7466                                  
  7467                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7468                                  
  7469                                  cmos_popf:				
  7470 00002342 CF                      		iret			; popf for level b- parts
  7471                                  					; return far and restore flags
  7472                                  
  7473                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7474                                  
  7475                                  ;--- cmos_write ----------------------------------------------------------------
  7476                                  ;		write byte to cmos system clock configuration table	       :
  7477                                  ;									       :
  7478                                  ; input: (al)=	cmos table address to be written to			       :
  7479                                  ;		bit    7 = 0 for nmi enabled and 1 for nmi disabled on exit    :
  7480                                  ;		bits 6-0 = address of table location to write		       :
  7481                                  ;	 (ah)=	new value to be placed in the addressed table location	       :
  7482                                  ;									       :
  7483                                  ; output:	value in (ah) placed in location (al) with nmi left disabled   :
  7484                                  ;		if bit 7 of (al) is on. during the cmos update both nmi and    :
  7485                                  ;		normal interrupts are disabled to protect cmos data integrity. :
  7486                                  ;		the cmos address register is pointed to a default value and    :
  7487                                  ;		the interrupt flag restored to the entry state on return.      :
  7488                                  ;		only the cmos location and the nmi state is changed.	       :
  7489                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7490                                  
  7491                                  cmos_write:				; write (ah) to location (al)	
  7492 00002343 9C                      		pushf			; write (ah) to location (al)
  7493 00002344 50                      		push	ax		; save work register values
  7494 00002345 FA                      		cli
  7495 00002346 50                      		push	ax		; save user nmi	state
  7496 00002347 0C80                    		or	al, 80h		; disable nmi for us
  7497 00002349 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7498                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7499 0000234B 90                      		nop
  7500 0000234C 88E0                    		mov	al, ah
  7501 0000234E E671                    		out	71h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7502 00002350 58                      		pop	ax		; get user nmi
  7503 00002351 2480                    		and	al, 80h
  7504 00002353 0C0F                    		or	al, 0Fh
  7505 00002355 E670                    		out	70h, al		; CMOS Memory/RTC Index	Register:
  7506                                  					; RTC Seconds
  7507 00002357 90                      		nop
  7508 00002358 E471                    		in	al, 71h		; CMOS Memory/RTC Data Register
  7509 0000235A 58                      		pop	ax		; restore work registers
  7510 0000235B 0E                      		push	cs		; *place code segment in stack and
  7511 0000235C E8E3FF                  		call	cmos_popf	; *handle popf for b- level 80286
  7512 0000235F C3                      		retn
  7513                                  
  7514                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7515                                  ; MSINIT.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7516                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7517                                  ; The following routines provide support for reading in the file MSDOS.SYS.
  7518                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7519                                  
  7520                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7521                                  ;
  7522                                  ; (For Retro DOS, 'IO.SYS' and 'MSDOS.SYS' are already loaded together
  7523                                  ;  at once -as single kernel file- by the Retro DOS boot sector code.
  7524                                  ;  So, following disk reads -MSDOS.SYS loading- is not needed!
  7525                                  ;  Only needing is to move MSDOS Kernel to it's final memory location.) 
  7526                                  
  7527                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7528                                  
  7529                                  ; GetClus, read in a cluster at a specified address
  7530                                  ;
  7531                                  ;  bx = cluster to read
  7532                                  ;  cx = sectors per cluster
  7533                                  ;  es:di = load location
  7534                                  
  7535                                  ; 17/10/2022
  7536                                  ;DISKRD equ diskrd - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h	; (8E5h for MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7537                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7538                                  DISKRD equ diskrd
  7539                                  
  7540                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7541                                  getclus:				
  7542 00002360 51                      		push	cx
  7543 00002361 57                      		push	di
  7544 00002362 2E890E[D016]            		mov	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7545 00002367 89D8                    		mov	ax, bx
  7546 00002369 48                      		dec	ax
  7547 0000236A 48                      		dec	ax
  7548 0000236B F7E1                    		mul	cx		; convert to logical sector
  7549                                  					; dx:ax	= matching logical sector number
  7550                                  					;	  starting from the data sector
  7551 0000236D 2E0306[CC16]            		add	ax, [cs:bios_l]
  7552 00002372 2E1316[CE16]            		adc	dx, [cs:bios_h]	; dx:ax	= first	logical	sector to read
  7553                                  unpack:					
  7554 00002377 1E                      		push	ds
  7555 00002378 50                      		push	ax
  7556 00002379 53                      		push	bx
  7557 0000237A 2E8B36[D316]            		mov	si, [cs:fatloc]
  7558 0000237F 8EDE                    		mov	ds, si
  7559 00002381 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; next cluster
  7560 00002383 2EF606[D216]40          		test	byte [cs:fbigfat], 40h	; fbig
  7561                                  					; 16 bit fat?
  7562 00002389 753C                    		jnz	short unpack16	; yes
  7563 0000238B D1EE                    		shr	si, 1		; 12 bit fat. si=si/2
  7564                                  					; si = clus + clus/2
  7565 0000238D 01DE                    		add	si, bx		;
  7566                                  					; (si =	byte offset of the cluster in the FAT)
  7567 0000238F 52                      		push	dx
  7568 00002390 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7569 00002392 E87C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7570 00002395 5A                      		pop	dx
  7571 00002396 8B07                    		mov	ax, [bx]	; save it into ax
  7572 00002398 7517                    		jnz	short even_odd	; if not a splitted fat, check even-odd.
  7573                                  		; 25/06/2023
  7574                                  		;mov	al, [bx]	; splitted fat
  7575 0000239A 2EA2[DA16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster], al
  7576 0000239E 46                      		inc	si		; (next	byte)
  7577 0000239F 52                      		push	dx
  7578 000023A0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7579 000023A2 E86C00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7580 000023A5 5A                      		pop	dx
  7581                                  		;mov	al, ds:0
  7582 000023A6 A00000                  		mov	al, [0] ; 19/10/2022
  7583 000023A9 2EA2[DB16]              		mov	[cs:temp_cluster+1], al
  7584 000023AD 2EA1[DA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:temp_cluster]
  7585                                  even_odd:				
  7586 000023B1 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore old fat entry	value
  7587 000023B2 53                      		push	bx		; save it right	away.
  7588 000023B3 D1EB                    		shr	bx, 1		; was it even or odd?
  7589 000023B5 7308                    		jnb	short havclus	; it was even.
  7590 000023B7 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1		; odd. massage fat value and keep
  7591                                  					; the highest 12 bits.
  7592 000023B9 D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7593 000023BB D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7594 000023BD D1E8                    		shr	ax, 1
  7595                                  havclus:				
  7596 000023BF 89C3                    		mov	bx, ax		; now bx = new fat entry.
  7597 000023C1 81E3FF0F                		and	bx, 0FFFh	; keep low 12 bits.
  7598 000023C5 EB0E                    		jmp	short unpackx
  7599                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7600                                  
  7601                                  unpack16:				
  7602 000023C7 52                      		push	dx
  7603 000023C8 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
  7604 000023CA D1E6                    		shl	si, 1		; extend to 32 bit offset
  7605 000023CC 83D200                  		adc	dx, 0
  7606 000023CF E83F00                  		call	get_fat_sector
  7607 000023D2 5A                      		pop	dx
  7608 000023D3 8B1F                    		mov	bx, [bx]	;
  7609                                  					; bx = new fat entry.
  7610                                  unpackx:				
  7611 000023D5 5E                      		pop	si		; restore old bx value into si
  7612 000023D6 58                      		pop	ax		; restore logical sector (low)
  7613 000023D7 1F                      		pop	ds
  7614 000023D8 29DE                    		sub	si, bx
  7615 000023DA 83FEFF                  		cmp	si, -1		; one apart?
  7616 000023DD 7507                    		jnz	short getcl2
  7617 000023DF 2E010E[D016]            		add	[cs:doscnt], cx
  7618 000023E4 EB91                    		jmp	short unpack
  7619                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7620                                  
  7621                                  getcl2:					
  7622 000023E6 53                      		push	bx
  7623 000023E7 52                      		push	dx		; sector to read (high)
  7624 000023E8 50                      		push	ax		; sector to read (low)
  7625 000023E9 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive and	fat spec
  7626 000023ED 2E8B0E[D016]            		mov	cx, [cs:doscnt]
  7627 000023F2 5A                      		pop	dx		; sector to read for diskrd (low)
  7628 000023F3 2E8F06[2B05]            		pop	word [cs:start_sec_h]
  7629                                  					; sector to read for diskrd (high)
  7630 000023F8 1E                      		push	ds
  7631 000023F9 0E                      		push	cs
  7632 000023FA 1F                      		pop	ds
  7633 000023FB 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7634                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7635 000023FC BD[C508]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7636                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7637                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7638 000023FF E863F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; read the clusters
  7639 00002402 1F                      		pop	ds
  7640 00002403 5B                      		pop	bx
  7641 00002404 5F                      		pop	di
  7642 00002405 2EA1[D016]              		mov	ax, [cs:doscnt]	; get number of	sectors	read
  7643 00002409 86E0                    		xchg	ah, al		; multiply by 256
  7644 0000240B D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1		; times	2 equal	512
  7645 0000240D 01C7                    		add	di, ax		; update load location
  7646 0000240F 59                      		pop	cx		; restore sectors/cluster
  7647 00002410 C3                      		retn
  7648                                  
  7649                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7650                                  
  7651                                  
  7652                                  ;function: find and read the corresponding fat sector into ds:0
  7653                                  ;
  7654                                  ;in). dx:si - offset value (starting from fat entry 0) of fat entry to find. M054
  7655                                  ;     ds - fatloc segment
  7656                                  ;     cs:drvfat - logical drive number, fat id
  7657                                  ;     cs:md_sectorsize
  7658                                  ;     cs:last_fat_secnum - last fat sector number read in.
  7659                                  ;
  7660                                  ;out). corresponding fat sector read in.
  7661                                  ;      bx = offset value from fatlog segment.
  7662                                  ;      other registera saved.
  7663                                  ;      zero flag set if the fat entry is splitted, i.e., when 12 bit fat entry
  7664                                  ;      starts at the last byte of the fat sector. in this case, the caller
  7665                                  ;      should save this byte, and read the next fat sector to get the rest
  7666                                  ;      of the fat entry value. (this will only happen with the 12 bit fat.)
  7667                                  
  7668                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7669                                  get_fat_sector:	
  7670 00002411 50                      		push	ax
  7671 00002412 51                      		push	cx
  7672 00002413 57                      		push	di
  7673 00002414 56                      		push	si
  7674 00002415 06                      		push	es
  7675 00002416 1E                      		push	ds
  7676 00002417 89F0                    		mov	ax, si
  7677 00002419 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7678 0000241E F7F1                    		div	cx		; ax = sector number, dx = offset
  7679 00002420 90                      		nop
  7680                                  
  7681                                  		; Get rid of the assumption that
  7682                                  		; there	is only	one reserved sector
  7683                                  
  7684 00002421 06                      		push	es
  7685 00002422 1E                      		push	ds
  7686 00002423 57                      		push	di
  7687 00002424 50                      		push	ax
  7688 00002425 0E                      		push	cs
  7689 00002426 1F                      		pop	ds
  7690                                  
  7691 00002427 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]	; get drive # and FAT id
  7692 0000242B BD[CB04]                		mov	bp, SETDRIVE
  7693                                  		;mov	bp, 4D7h	; setdrive
  7694                                  					; at 2C7h:4D7h = 70h:2A47h
  7695 0000242E 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7696 0000242F E833F3                  		call	call_bios_code	; get bds for drive
  7697 00002432 58                      		pop	ax		; (sector number -without reserved and hidden sectors-)
  7698 00002433 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
  7699                                  					; add #reserved_sectors
  7700 00002437 5F                      		pop	di
  7701 00002438 1F                      		pop	ds
  7702 00002439 07                      		pop	es
  7703 0000243A 2E3B06[DC16]            		cmp	ax, [cs:last_fat_sec_num]
  7704 0000243F 742A                    		jz	short gfs_split_chk ; don't need to read it again.
  7705 00002441 2EA3[DC16]              		mov	[cs:last_fat_sec_num], ax 
  7706                                  					; sector number
  7707                                  					; (in the partition, without hidden sectors)
  7708 00002445 52                      		push	dx
  7709 00002446 2EC706[2B05]0000        		mov	word [cs:start_sec_h], 0 
  7710                                  					; prepare to read the fat sector
  7711                                  					; start_sec_h is always	0 for fat sector.
  7712 0000244D 89C2                    		mov	dx, ax
  7713 0000244F B90100                  		mov	cx, 1		; 1 sector read
  7714 00002452 2EA1[CA16]              		mov	ax, [cs:drvfat]
  7715 00002456 1E                      		push	ds
  7716 00002457 07                      		pop	es
  7717 00002458 31FF                    		xor	di, di		; es:di	-> fatloc segment:0
  7718 0000245A 1E                      		push	ds
  7719 0000245B 0E                      		push	cs
  7720 0000245C 1F                      		pop	ds
  7721 0000245D 0E                      		push	cs		; simulate far call
  7722 0000245E BD[C508]                		mov	bp, DISKRD	; 8E5h
  7723                                  		;mov	bp, 8E5h	; offset diskrd
  7724                                  					; 2C7h:8E5h = 70h:2E55h
  7725 00002461 E801F3                  		call	call_bios_code
  7726 00002464 1F                      		pop	ds
  7727 00002465 5A                      		pop	dx
  7728 00002466 2E8B0E[D816]            		mov	cx, [cs:md_sectorsize] ; 512
  7729                                  
  7730                                  gfs_split_chk:				
  7731 0000246B 49                      		dec	cx		; 511
  7732 0000246C 39CA                    		cmp	dx, cx		; if offset points to the
  7733                                  					; last byte of this sector,
  7734                                  					; then splitted	entry.
  7735 0000246E 89D3                    		mov	bx, dx		; set bx to dx
  7736 00002470 1F                      		pop	ds
  7737 00002471 07                      		pop	es
  7738 00002472 5E                      		pop	si
  7739 00002473 5F                      		pop	di
  7740 00002474 59                      		pop	cx
  7741 00002475 58                      		pop	ax
  7742 00002476 C3                      		retn
  7743                                  
  7744                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7745                                  ;Bios_Data_Init	ends
  7746                                  
  7747                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7748                                  
  7749                                  		; 09/12/2022
  7750                                  		;db 0
  7751                                  
  7752                                  numbertodiv	equ ($-BData_start)
  7753                                  numbertomod	equ (numbertodiv % 16)
  7754                                  
  7755                                  %if numbertomod>0 & numbertomod<16
  7756 00002477 00<rep 9h>              		times (16-numbertomod) db 0
  7757                                  %endif
  7758                                  
  7759                                  ;align 16
  7760                                  
  7761                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7762                                  IOSYSCODESEGOFF	equ $ - BData_start
  7763                                  IOSYSCODESEG	equ (IOSYSCODESEGOFF>>4)+(700h>>4)
  7764                                  
  7765                                  ;--- End of DOSBIOS data segment --------------------------------------------
  7766                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------

  7772                                  ;============================================================================
  7773                                  ; DOS BIOS (IO.SYS) CODE SEGMENT

  7776                                  
  7777                                  section .BIOSCODE vstart=0  
  7778                                  
  7779                                  BCode_start:	 ; 09/12/2022
  7780                                   
  7781                                  ; 02/10/2022
  7782                                  
  7783                                  ;--- DOSBIOS code segment ---------------------------------------------------
  7784                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7785                                  ; MSBIO1.ASM (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
  7786                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7787                                  
  7788                                  DOSBIOSEG_2C7h:	;db 30h dup(0)		; SEGMENT 2C7h (2C70h-700h=2570h)
  7789 00000000 00<rep 30h>             		times 48 db 0		; 19/10/2022	
  7790 00000030 7000                    BiosDataWord:	dw 70h
  7791                                  
  7792                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7793                                  ;BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h
  7794                                  ; 09/12/2022
  7795                                  BIOSDATAWORD	equ BiosDataWord
  7796                                  
  7797                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7798                                  
  7799                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) 
  7800                                  
  7801                                  ;************************************************************************
  7802                                  ;*									*
  7803                                  ;*	seg_reinit is called with ax = our new code segment value,	*
  7804                                  ;*	  trashes di, cx, es						*
  7805                                  ;*									*
  7806                                  ;*	cas -- should be made disposable!				*
  7807                                  ;*									*
  7808                                  ;************************************************************************
  7809                                  
  7810                                  _seg_reinit:
  7811 00000032 2E8E06[3000]            		mov	es, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
  7812                                  					; at 2C7h:30h or 70h:25A0h
  7813                                  		;mov	di, (offset cdev+2)
  7814 00000037 BF[E006]                		mov	di, cdev+2	; 19/10/2022
  7815 0000003A B90400                  		mov	cx, 4		; (end_BC_entries - cdev)/4
  7816                                  
  7817                                  _seg_reinit_1:				
  7818 0000003D AB                      		stosw			; modify Bios_Code entry points
  7819 0000003E 47                      		inc	di
  7820 0000003F 47                      		inc	di
  7821 00000040 E2FB                    		loop	_seg_reinit_1
  7822 00000042 CB                      		retf
  7823                                  
  7824                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7825                                  
  7826                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7827                                  
  7828                                  ;************************************************************************
  7829                                  ;*									*
  7830                                  ;*	chardev_entry - main device driver dispatch routine		*
  7831                                  ;*	   called with a dummy parameter block on the stack		*
  7832                                  ;*	   dw dispatch_table, dw prn/aux numbers (optional)		*
  7833                                  ;*									*
  7834                                  ;*	will eventually take care of doing the transitions in		*
  7835                                  ;*	   out of Bios_Code						*
  7836                                  ;*									*
  7837                                  ;************************************************************************
  7838                                  
  7839                                  chardev_entry:				; 0070h:25B3h =	02C7h:0043h
  7840 00000043 56                      		push	si
  7841 00000044 50                      		push	ax
  7842 00000045 51                      		push	cx
  7843 00000046 52                      		push	dx
  7844 00000047 57                      		push	di
  7845 00000048 55                      		push	bp
  7846 00000049 1E                      		push	ds
  7847 0000004A 06                      		push	es
  7848 0000004B 53                      		push	bx
  7849 0000004C 89E5                    		mov	bp, sp
  7850 0000004E 8B7612                  		mov	si, [bp+18]	; get return address (dispatch table)
  7851                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h]
  7852                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7853 00000051 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7854 00000056 8B4402                  		mov	ax, [si+2]	; get the device number	if present
  7855 00000059 A2[2100]                		mov	[auxnum], al
  7856 0000005C 8826[E704]              		mov	[printdev], ah
  7857 00000060 8B34                    		mov	si, [si]	; point	to the device dispatch table
  7858 00000062 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; get pointer to i/o packet
  7859 00000066 268A4701                		mov	al, [es:bx+1]	; [es:bx+unit]	; al = unit code
  7860 0000006A 268A670D                		mov	ah, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+media]	; ah = media descrip
  7861 0000006E 268B4F12                		mov	cx, [es:bx+18]	; [es:bx+count]	; cx = count
  7862 00000072 268B5714                		mov	dx, [es:bx+20]	; [es:bx+start]	; dx = start sector
  7863                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7864 00000076 81FE[9604]              		cmp	si, DSKTBL
  7865                                  		;cmp	si, 4A2h	; dsktbl
  7866                                  					; at 2C7h:4A2h = 70h:2A12h
  7867 0000007A 7517                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7868                                  
  7869                                  ; Special case for 32-bit start sector number:
  7870                                  ;   if (si==dsktbl) /* if this is a disk device call */
  7871                                  ;      set high 16 bits of secnum to 0
  7872                                  ;      if (secnum == 0xffff) fetch 32 bit sector number
  7873                                  ;
  7874                                  ; pass high word of sector number in start_sec_h, low word in dx
  7875                                  ;
  7876                                  ; note: start_l and start_h are the offsets within the io_request packet
  7877                                  ;	  which contain the low and hi words of the 32 bit start sector if
  7878                                  ;	  it has been used.
  7879                                  ;
  7880                                  ; note: remember not to destroy the registers which have been set up before
  7881                                  
  7882                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	0 ; initialize to 0
  7883 0000007C C706[2B05]0000          		mov	word [start_sec_h], 0
  7884 00000082 83FAFF                  		cmp	dx, 0FFFFh
  7885 00000085 750C                    		jnz	short no_sector32_mapping
  7886 00000087 268B571C                		mov	dx, [es:bx+28]	; [es:bx+start_h]
  7887                                  					; 32 bits dsk req
  7888                                  		;mov	ds:start_sec_h,	dx ; start_sec_h = packet.start_h
  7889 0000008B 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx
  7890 0000008F 268B571A                		mov	dx, [es:bx+26]	; [es:bx+start_l]
  7891                                  					; dx = packet.start_l
  7892                                  no_sector32_mapping:			
  7893 00000093 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7894 00000094 268A4702                		mov	al, [es:bx+2]	; [es:bx+cmd]
  7895 00000098 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, cs:[si]
  7896 0000009B 732C                    		jnb	short command_error
  7897 0000009D 98                      		cbw			; note that al <= 15 means ok
  7898 0000009E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
  7899 000000A0 01C6                    		add	si, ax
  7900 000000A2 97                      		xchg	ax, di
  7901 000000A3 26C47F0E                		les	di, [es:bx+14]	; [es:bx+trans]
  7902 000000A7 FC                      		cld
  7903                                  		; 17/10/2022
  7904 000000A8 2EFF5401                		call	near [cs:si+1]
  7905                                  		;call	word ptr cs:si+1
  7906 000000AC 7202                    		jb	short already_got_ah_status
  7907 000000AE B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  7908                                  already_got_ah_status:
  7909                                  		;;mov	ds, [cs:0030h]	; 15/10/2022			
  7910                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
  7911                                  					; cas note: shouldn't be needed!
  7912 000000B0 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
  7913                                  		;lds	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7914 000000B5 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
  7915 000000B9 894703                  		mov	[bx+3],	ax	; [bx+status]
  7916                                  					; mark operation complete
  7917 000000BC 5B                      		pop	bx
  7918 000000BD 07                      		pop	es
  7919 000000BE 1F                      		pop	ds
  7920 000000BF 5D                      		pop	bp
  7921 000000C0 5F                      		pop	di
  7922 000000C1 5A                      		pop	dx
  7923 000000C2 59                      		pop	cx
  7924 000000C3 58                      		pop	ax
  7925 000000C4 5E                      		pop	si
  7926 000000C5 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; get rid of fake return address
  7927                                  	
  7928                                  		; fall through into bc_retf
  7929                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------	
  7930                                  bc_retf:
  7931 000000C8 CB                      		retf
  7932                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7933                                  
  7934                                  command_error:				
  7935 000000C9 E80900                  		call	bc_cmderr
  7936 000000CC EBE2                    		jmp	short already_got_ah_status
  7937                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7938                                  ; 01/05/2019
  7939                                  
  7940                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7941                                  ; The following piece of hack is for supporting CP/M compatibility
  7942                                  ; Basically at offset 5 we have a far call into 0:c0. But this does not call
  7943                                  ; 0:c0 directly instead it call f01d:fef0, because it needs to support 'lhld 6'
  7944                                  ; The following hack has to reside at ffff:d0 (= f01d:fef0) if BIOS is loaded
  7945                                  ; high.
  7946                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7947                                  
  7948                                  		;db 7 dup(0)
  7949                                  
  7950                                  		; 15/10/2022
  7951                                  
  7952 000000CE 0000                    		dw 0		; pad to bring offset to 0D0h
  7953                                  
  7954 000000D0 00<rep 5h>              off_d0: 	times 5 db 0	; 5 bytes from 0:c0 will be copied onto here
  7955                                  				;  which is the CP/M call 5 entry point
  7956                                  		
  7957                                  
  7958                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7959                                  
  7960                                  ;	exit - all routines return through this path
  7961                                  
  7962                                  bc_cmderr:				
  7963 000000D5 B003                    		mov	al, 3		; 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  7964                                  					; unknown command error
  7965                                  
  7966                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  7967                                  
  7968                                  ;	now zero the count field by subtracting its current value,
  7969                                  ;	  which is still in cx, from itself.
  7970                                  
  7971                                  ;	subtract the number of i/o's NOT YET COMPLETED from total
  7972                                  ;	  in order to return the number actually complete
  7973                                  
  7974                                  bc_err_cnt:	
  7975                                  		;les	bx, ds:ptrsav
  7976                                  		; 19/10/2022
  7977 000000D7 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  7978 000000DB 26294F12                		sub	[es:bx+18], cx	; [es:bx+count]
  7979                                  					; # of successful i/o's
  7980 000000DF B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; mark error return
  7981 000000E1 F9                      		stc			; indicate abnormal end
  7982 000000E2 C3                      		retn
  7983                                  
  7984                                  ; 15/10/2022
  7985                                  
  7986                                  ;Bios_Code ends
  7987

  7989                                  ; MSCHAR.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
  7990                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
  7991                                  ; 15/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
  7992                                  ; 10/01/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
  7993                                  
  7994                                  ; 30/04/2019
  7995                                  
  7996                                  ;title	mschar - character and clock devices
  7997                                  
  7998                                  ;MODE_CTRLBRK	equ	0FFh
  7999                                  
  8000                                  ; BIOSCODE:00E4h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
  8001                                  
  8002                                  ;************************************************************************
  8003                                  ;*									*
  8004                                  ;*	device driver dispatch tables					*
  8005                                  ;*									*
  8006                                  ;*	each table starts with a byte which lists the number of		*
  8007                                  ;*	legal functions, followed by that number of words. Each		*
  8008                                  ;*	word represents an offset of a routine in Bios_Code which	*
  8009                                  ;*	handles the function. The functions are terminated with		*
  8010                                  ;*	a near return. If carry is reset, a 'done' code is returned	*
  8011                                  ;*	to the caller. If carry is set, the ah/al registers are		*
  8012                                  ;*	returned as abnormal completion status. Notice that ds		*
  8013                                  ;*	is assumed to point to the Bios_Data segment throughout.	*
  8014                                  ;*									*
  8015                                  ;************************************************************************
  8016                                  
  8017                                  		; 13/12/2022
  8018                                  		;db 0
  8019                                  
  8020                                  		; 13/12/202
  8021 000000E3 0B                      con_table:	db ((con_table_end - con_table)-1)/2 ; 11
  8022                                  					; 2C7h:0E4h = 70h:2654h
  8023 000000E4 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8024                                  					; 00 init
  8025 000000E6 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 01
  8026 000000E8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 02
  8027 000000EA [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr ; 0D5h	; bc_exvec at 2C7h:D5h = 70h:2645h
  8028                                  					; 03
  8029 000000EC [5B01]                  		dw con_read  ; 15Ch	; con_read at 2C7h:15Ch	= 70h:26CCh
  8030                                  					; 04
  8031 000000EE [9E01]                  		dw con_rdnd  ; 19Fh	; con_rdnd at 2C7h:19Fh	= 70h:270Fh
  8032                                  					; 05
  8033 000000F0 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 06
  8034 000000F2 [0702]                  		dw con_flush ; 209h	; con_flush at 2C7h:209h = 70h:2779h
  8035                                  					; 07
  8036 000000F4 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; con_writ at 2C7h:1FDh	= 70h:276Dh
  8037                                  					; 08
  8038 000000F6 [FB01]                  		dw con_writ  ; 1FDh	; 09
  8039 000000F8 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec  ; 1FBh	; 0A
  8040                                  con_table_end:
  8041 000000FA 1A                      prn_table:	db ((prn_table_end - prn_table)-1)/2 ; 26			
  8042                                  					; 2C7h:0FBh = 70h:266Bh
  8043 000000FB [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; bc_exvec
  8044 000000FD [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8045 000000FF [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8046 00000101 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; bc_cmderr
  8047 00000103 [1802]                  		dw prn_input  ;	21Ah	; prn_input
  8048                                  					; 04 indicate zero chars read
  8049 00000105 [C601]                  		dw z_bus_exit ; 1C8h	; z_bus_exit
  8050                                  					; 05 read non-destructive
  8051 00000107 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8052 00000109 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 07
  8053 0000010B [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ;	21Fh	; prn_writ
  8054 0000010D [1D02]                  		dw prn_writ   ; 21Fh	; 09
  8055 0000010F [4E02]                  		dw prn_stat   ; 251h	; prn_stat
  8056 00000111 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0B
  8057 00000113 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0C
  8058 00000115 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0D
  8059 00000117 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0E
  8060 00000119 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 0F
  8061 0000011B [8802]                  		dw prn_tilbusy ; 28Bh	; prn_tilbusy
  8062 0000011D [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 11
  8063 0000011F [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 12
  8064 00000121 [B602]                  		dw prn_genioctl ; 2BAh	; prn_genioctl
  8065 00000123 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 14
  8066 00000125 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 15
  8067 00000127 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 16
  8068 00000129 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 17
  8069 0000012B [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 18
  8070 0000012D [EB02]                  		dw prn_ioctl_query ; 2F0h ; prn_ioctl_query
  8071                                  prn_table_end:
  8072 0000012F 0B                      aux_table:	db ((aux_table_end - aux_table)-1)/2 ; 11			
  8073                                  					; 2C7h:130h = 70h:26A0h
  8074 00000130 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00 - init
  8075 00000132 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01
  8076 00000134 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 02
  8077 00000136 [D500]                  		dw bc_cmderr  ;	0D5h	; 03
  8078 00000138 [0603]                  		dw aux_read   ; 30Dh	; aux_read ; 04	- read
  8079 0000013A [2D03]                  		dw aux_rdnd   ; 335h	; aux_rdnd - 05	- read non-destructive
  8080 0000013C [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06
  8081 0000013E [6303]                  		dw aux_flsh   ;	36Ch	; aux_flsh
  8082 00000140 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; aux_writ
  8083 00000142 [6A03]                  		dw aux_writ   ;	374h	; 09
  8084 00000144 [4D03]                  		dw aux_wrst   ;	355h	; aux_wrst
  8085                                  aux_table_end:
  8086 00000146 0A                      tim_table	db ((tim_table_end - tim_table)-1)/2 ; 10
  8087                                  					; 2C7h:147h = 70h:26B7h
  8088 00000147 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 00
  8089 00000149 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 01

  8094 00000153 [F901]                  		dw bc_exvec   ; 1FBh	; 06

  8097 00000159 [D003]                  		dw tim_writ   ; 3DBh	; 09
  8098                                  tim_table_end:

  8100                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8101                                  
  8102                                  ;************************************************************************
  8103                                  ;*									*
  8104                                  ;*	con_read - read cx bytes from keyboard into buffer at es:di	*
  8105                                  ;*									*
  8106                                  ;************************************************************************
  8107                                  
  8108                                  con_read:				; 2C7h:15Ch = 70h:26CCh
  8109                                  		;jcxz	short con_exit	; read cx bytes	from keyboard into buffer
  8110 0000015B E306                    		jcxz	con_exit	; 19/10/2022
  8111                                  con_loop:				
  8112 0000015D E80500                  		call	chrin		; get char in al
  8113 00000160 AA                      		stosb			; store	char at	es:di
  8114 00000161 E2FA                    		loop	con_loop
  8115                                  con_exit:				
  8116 00000163 F8                      		clc
  8117 00000164 C3                      		retn
  8118                                  
  8119                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8120                                  
  8121                                  ;************************************************************************
  8122                                  ;*									*
  8123                                  ;*	chrin - input single char from keyboard into al			*
  8124                                  ;*									*
  8125                                  ;*	  we are going to issue extended keyboard function, if		*
  8126                                  ;*	  supported. the returning value of the extended keystroke	*
  8127                                  ;*	  of the extended keyboard function uses 0E0h in al		*
  8128                                  ;*	  instead of 00h as in the conventional keyboard function.	*
  8129                                  ;*	  this creates a conflict when the user entered real		*
  8130                                  ;*	  greek alpha charater (= 0E0h) to  distinguish the extended	*
  8131                                  ;*	  keystroke and the greek alpha. this case will be handled	*
  8132                                  ;*	  in the following manner:					*
  8133                                  ;*									*
  8134                                  ;*	      ah = 16h							*
  8135                                  ;*	      int 16h							*
  8136                                  ;*	      if al == 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8137                                  ;*	      else if al == 0E0h, then					*
  8138                                  ;*	      if ah <> 0, then extended code (in ah)			*
  8139                                  ;*		else greek_alpha character.				*
  8140                                  ;*									*
  8141                                  ;*	also, for compatibility reason, if an extended code is		*
  8142                                  ;*	  detected, then we are going to change the value in al		*
  8143                                  ;*	  from 0E0h to 00h.						*
  8144                                  ;*									*
  8145                                  ;************************************************************************
  8146                                  
  8147                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8148                                  chrin:		
  8149 00000165 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; set by msinit. 0 or 10h
  8150 00000169 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8151 0000016B 8606[0C00]              		xchg	al, [altah]	; get character	& zero altah
  8152 0000016F 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8153 00000171 752A                    		jnz	short keyret
  8154 00000173 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8155 00000175 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8156 00000177 74EC                    		jz	short chrin
  8157 00000179 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8158 0000017C 7504                    		jnz	short alt_ext_chk
  8159 0000017E B010                    		mov	al, 10h
  8160 00000180 EB1B                    		jmp	short keyret
  8161                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8162                                  
  8163                                  ;  if operation was extended function (i.e. keyrd_func != 0) then
  8164                                  ;    if character read was 0E0h then
  8165                                  ;      if extended byte was zero (i.e. ah == 0) then
  8166                                  ;	 goto keyret
  8167                                  ;      else
  8168                                  ;	 set al to zero
  8169                                  ;	 goto alt_save
  8170                                  ;      endif
  8171                                  ;    endif
  8172                                  ;  endif
  8173                                  
  8174                                  alt_ext_chk:
  8175 00000182 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0
  8176 00000187 740C                    		jz	short not_ext
  8177 00000189 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h
  8178 0000018B 7508                    		jnz	short not_ext
  8179 0000018D 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
  8180 0000018F 740C                    		jz	short keyret
  8181 00000191 30C0                    		xor	al, al
  8182 00000193 EB04                    		jmp	short alt_save
  8183                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8184                                  
  8185                                  not_ext:				
  8186 00000195 08C0                    		or	al, al		; special case?
  8187 00000197 7504                    		jnz	short keyret
  8188                                  alt_save:				
  8189 00000199 8826[0C00]              		mov	[altah], ah	; store	special	key
  8190                                  keyret:					
  8191 0000019D C3                      		retn
  8192                                  
  8193                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8194                                  
  8195                                  ;************************************************************************
  8196                                  ;*									*
  8197                                  ;*	con_rdnd - keyboard non destructive read, no wait		*
  8198                                  ;*									*
  8199                                  ;*	pc-convertible-type machine: if bit 10 is set by the dos	*
  8200                                  ;*	in the status word of the request packet, and there is no	*
  8201                                  ;*	character in the input buffer, the driver issues a system	*
  8202                                  ;*	wait request to the rom. on return from the rom, it returns	*
  8203                                  ;*	a 'char-not-found' to the dos.					*
  8204                                  ;*									*
  8205                                  ;************************************************************************
  8206                                  
  8207                                  		; 19/10/2022
  8208                                  con_rdnd:				
  8209 0000019E A0[0C00]                		mov	al, [altah]
  8210 000001A1 08C0                    		or	al, al
  8211 000001A3 754C                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8212 000001A5 8A26[E604]              		mov	ah, [keysts_func]
  8213 000001A9 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8214 000001AB 751D                    		jnz	short gotchr
  8215 000001AD 803E[7900]00            		cmp	byte [fhavek09], 0
  8216 000001B2 7412                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8217 000001B4 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8218                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8219 000001B8 26F6470404              		test	byte [es:bx+4], 04h
  8220                                  		;test	word [es:bx+3], 400h ; [es:bx+status]
  8221 000001BD 7407                    		jz	short z_bus_exit
  8222 000001BF B80041                  		mov	ax, 4100h
  8223 000001C2 30DB                    		xor	bl, bl
  8224 000001C4 CD15                    		int	15h		; SYSTEM - WAIT	ON EXTERNAL EVENT (CONVERTIBLE)
  8225                                  					; AL = condition type, BH = condition compare or mask value
  8226                                  					; BL = timeout value times 55 milliseconds, 00h	means no timeout
  8227                                  					; DX = I/O port	address	if AL bit 4 set
  8228                                  z_bus_exit:				
  8229 000001C6 F9                      		stc			; 2C7h:1C8h = 70h:2738h
  8230 000001C7 B403                    		mov	ah, 3		; indicate busy	status
  8231 000001C9 C3                      		retn
  8232                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8233                                  
  8234                                  gotchr:					
  8235 000001CA 09C0                    		or	ax, ax
  8236 000001CC 7508                    		jnz	short notbrk	; check	for null after break
  8237 000001CE 8A26[E504]              		mov	ah, [keyrd_func] ; issue keyboard read function
  8238 000001D2 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD -
  8239 000001D4 EBC8                    		jmp	short con_rdnd	; get a	real status
  8240                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8241                                  
  8242                                  notbrk:					
  8243 000001D6 3D0072                  		cmp	ax, 7200h	; check	for ctrl-prtsc
  8244 000001D9 7504                    		jnz	short rd_ext_chk
  8245 000001DB B010                    		mov	al, 10h		; ('P' & 1Fh) ; return control p
  8246 000001DD EB12                    		jmp	short rdexit
  8247                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8248                                  
  8249                                  rd_ext_chk:				
  8250 000001DF 803E[E504]00            		cmp	byte [keyrd_func], 0 ; extended keyboard function?
  8251 000001E4 740B                    		jz	short rdexit
  8252 000001E6 3CE0                    		cmp	al, 0E0h	; extended key value or	greek alpha?
  8253 000001E8 7507                    		jnz	short rdexit
  8254 000001EA 80FC00                  		cmp	ah, 0		; scan code exist?
  8255 000001ED 7402                    		jz	short rdexit	; yes. greek alpha char.
  8256 000001EF B000                    		mov	al, 0		; no. extended key stroke.
  8257                                  					; change it for	compatibility
  8258                                  rdexit:					
  8259 000001F1 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]
  8260 000001F5 2688470D                		mov	[es:bx+13], al	; [es:bx+media]
  8261                                  					; return keyboard character here
  8262                                  bc_exvec:				
  8263 000001F9 F8                      		clc			; bc_exvec at 2C7h:1FBh	= 70h:276Bh
  8264                                  					; indicate normal termination
  8265 000001FA C3                      		retn
  8266                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
  8267                                  
  8268                                  ;************************************************************************
  8269                                  ;*									*
  8270                                  ;*	con_write - console write routine				*
  8271                                  ;*									*
  8272                                  ;*	entry:	es:di -> buffer						*
  8273                                  ;*		cx    =  count						*
  8274                                  ;*									*
  8275                                  ;************************************************************************
  8276                                  
  8277                                  con_writ:
  8278                                  		;jcxz	short bc_exvec
  8279 000001FB E3FC                    		jcxz	bc_exvec	; 19/10/2022
  8280                                  		; 12/12/2022
  8281                                  		;jcxz	cc_ret
  8282                                  con_lp:					
  8283 000001FD 268A05                  		mov	al, [es:di]
  8284 00000200 47                      		inc	di
  8285 00000201 CD29                    		int	29h		; DOS 2+ internal - FAST PUTCHAR
  8286                                  					; AL = character to display
  8287 00000203 E2F8                    		loop	con_lp
  8288                                  cc_ret:					
  8289 00000205 F8                      		clc
  8290 00000206 C3                      		retn
  8291                                  
  8292                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
  8293                                  
  8294                                  ;************************************************************************
  8295                                  ;*									*
  8296                                  ;*	con_flush - flush out keyboard queue				*
  8297                                  ;*									*
  8298                                  ;************************************************************************
  8299                                  
  8300                                  con_flush:
  8301 00000207 C606[0C00]00            		mov	byte [altah], 0	; clear	out holding buffer
  8302                                  flloop:					; while	(charavail()) charread();	
  8303 0000020C B401                    		mov	ah, 1
  8304 0000020E CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - CHECK BUFFER, DO NOT CLEAR
  8305                                  					; Return: ZF clear if character	in buffer
  8306                                  					; AH = scan code, AL = character
  8307                                  					; ZF set if no character in buffer
  8308 00000210 74F3                    		jz	short cc_ret
  8309 00000212 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah
  8310 00000214 CD16                    		int	16h		; KEYBOARD - READ CHAR FROM BUFFER, WAIT IF EMPTY
  8311                                  					; Return: AH = scan code, AL = character
  8312 00000216 EBF4                    		jmp	short flloop
  8313
