 10096                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10097                                  
 10098                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10099                                  
 10100                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10101                                  ; read a single sector into the temp buffer.
 10102                                  ; perform three retries in case of error.
 10103                                  ;   inputs:	es:[di].bds_drivenum has physical drive to use
 10104                                  ;		cx has sector and cylinder
 10105                                  ;		dh has head
 10106                                  ;		es:di has bds
 10107                                  ;		ds has Bios_Data
 10108                                  ;
 10109                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 10110                                  ;		    Bios_Data:bx point to sector
 10111                                  ;		       (note: some callers assume location of buffer)
 10112                                  ;
 10113                                  ;		carry set
 10114                                  ;		    ax has rom error code
 10115                                  ;
 10116                                  ; register bp is preserved.
 10117                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10118                                  
 10119                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10120                                  
 10121                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10122                                  read_sector:	
 10123 0000077A 55                      		push	bp
 10124 0000077B BD0300                  		mov	bp, 3		; make 3 attempts
 10125 0000077E 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10126 00000782 BB[4E01]                		mov	bx, disksector	; get es:bx to point to	buffer
 10127                                  rd_ret:					
 10128 00000785 06                      		push	es
 10129 00000786 1E                      		push	ds
 10130 00000787 07                      		pop	es
 10131 00000788 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10132 0000078B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10133                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10134                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10135                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read
 10136 0000078D 07                      		pop	es
 10137 0000078E 734A                    		jnb	short okret2
 10138                                  rd_rty:					
 10139 00000790 E87604                  		call	again		; reset	disk, decrement	bp, preserve ax
 10140 00000793 7442                    		jz	short err_rd_ret
 10141 00000795 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 10142                                  		;test	byte ptr [es:di+23h], 1	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10143                                  					; fnon_removable
 10144 0000079A 75E9                    		jnz	short rd_ret
 10145 0000079C 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10146 000007A1 7510                    		jnz	short rd_skip1_dpt
 10147 000007A3 50                      		push	ax
 10148 000007A4 1E                      		push	ds		; for retry, set the head settle time to 0Fh
 10149 000007A5 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 10150                                  		;mov	al, [si+9]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10151                                  		;mov	byte [si+9], 15 ; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 10152                                  		;			; NORMSETTLE
 10153                                  		; 12/12/2022
 10154 000007A9 B00F                    		mov	al, 15
 10155 000007AB 864409                  		xchg	al, [si+9]
 10156                                  		; 
 10157 000007AE 1F                      		pop	ds
 10158 000007AF A2[2A01]                		mov	[save_head_sttl], al
 10159 000007B2 58                      		pop	ax
 10160                                  rd_skip1_dpt:				
 10161 000007B3 06                      		push	es
 10162 000007B4 1E                      		push	ds
 10163 000007B5 07                      		pop	es
 10164 000007B6 B80102                  		mov	ax, 201h
 10165 000007B9 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - READ SECTORS INTO MEMORY
 10166                                  					; AL = number of sectors to read, CH = track, CL = sector
 10167                                  					; DH = head, DL	= drive, ES:BX -> buffer to fill
 10168                                  					; Return: CF set on error, AH =	status,	AL = number of sectors read

 10175 000007C8 1E                      		push	ds

 10182 000007D3 7305                    		jnb	short okret2
 10183 000007D5 EBB9                    		jmp	short rd_rty

 10186                                  err_rd_ret:

 10192                                  ; track accessed in that drive.

 10294                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10295                                  
 10296                                  ; 15/10/2022
 10297                                  ; 10/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 10298                                  
 10299                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10300                                  ; miscellaneous odd jump routines. 
 10301                                  ; moved out of mainline for speed.
 10302                                  
 10303                                  ; if we have a system where we have virtual drives, we need 
 10304                                  ; to prompt the user to place the correct disk in the drive.
 10305                                  ;
 10306                                  ;	assume es:di -> bds, ds:->Bios_Data
 10307                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------
 10308                                  
 10309                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10310                                  checksingle:		
 10311 0000083C 50                      		push	ax
 10312 0000083D 53                      		push	bx
 10313 0000083E 268B5D23                		mov	bx, [es:di+23h]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10314                                  
 10315                                  ; if hard drive, cannot change disk.
 10316                                  ; if current owner of physical drive, no need to change diskette.
 10317                                  
 10318 00000842 F6C321                  		test	bl, 21h		; fnon_removable|fi_own_physical
 10319 00000845 7573                    		jnz	short singleret
 10320 00000847 F6C310                  		test	bl, 10h		; fi_am_mult
 10321                                  					; is there a drive sharing this	physical drive?
 10322 0000084A 746E                    		jz	short singleret
 10323                                  
 10324                                  
 10325                                  ; look for the previous owner of this physical drive
 10326                                  ; and reset its ownership flag.
 10327                                  
 10328 0000084C 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10329                                  					; get physical drive number
 10330 00000850 06                      		push	es		; preserve pointer to current bds
 10331 00000851 57                      		push	di
 10332 00000852 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; get first bds
 10333                                  scan_list:				
 10334 00000856 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al
 10335 0000085A 7553                    		jnz	short scan_skip	; Not our drive. Try next bds.
 10336 0000085C B320                    		mov	bl, 20h	; ' '   ; fi_own_physical ; test ownership flag
 10337 0000085E 26845D23                		test	[es:di+23h], bl
 10338 00000862 744B                    		jz	short scan_skip	; he doesn't own it either. continue
 10339 00000864 26305D23                		xor	[es:di+23h], bl	; reset	ownership flag
 10340 00000868 5F                      		pop	di		; restore pointer to current bds
 10341 00000869 07                      		pop	es
 10342 0000086A 26085D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bl	; ; set	ownership flag
 10343                                  
 10344                                  ; we examine the fsetowner flag. if it is set, then we are using the code in
 10345                                  ; checksingle to just set the owner of a drive. we must not issue the prompt
 10346                                  ; in this case.
 10347 0000086E 803E[7A00]01            		cmp	byte [fsetowner], 1
 10348 00000873 7517                    		jnz	short not_fsetowner
 10349                                  		;cmp	byte ptr es:[di+4], 0 ;	are we handling	drive number 0 ?
 10350 00000875 26807D0400              		cmp	byte [es:di+4], 0
 10351 0000087A 753E                    		jnz	short singleret
 10352 0000087C 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]
 10353                                  		;mov	al, es:[di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 10354                                  					; get the DOS drive letter
 10355 00000880 06                      		push	es
 10356 00000881 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10357 00000885 26A20405                		mov	[es:LSTDRV], al
 10358                                  		;mov	es:504h, al	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10359                                  					; set up sdsb
 10360 00000889 07                      		pop	es		; restore bds pointer
 10361 0000088A EB2E                    		jmp	short singleret
 10362                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10363                                  
 10364                                  ; to support "backward" compatibility with ibm's "single drive status byte"
 10365                                  ; we now check to see if we are in a single drive system and the application
 10366                                  ; has "cleverly" diddled the sdsb
 10367                                  
 10368                                  not_fsetowner:				
 10369 0000088C 803E[7800]02            		cmp	byte [single], 2 ; if (single_drive_system)
 10370 00000891 7517                    		jnz	short ignore_sdsb
 10371 00000893 50                      		push	ax
 10372 00000894 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; if (curr_drv == req_drv)
 10373 00000898 88C4                    		mov	ah, al
 10374 0000089A 06                      		push	es
 10375 0000089B 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10376 0000089F 2686060405              		xchg	al, [es:LSTDRV]
 10377                                  		;xchg	al, es:504h	; [es:LSTDRV]
 10378                                  					; then swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10379 000008A4 07                      		pop	es
 10380 000008A5 38C4                    		cmp	ah, al		; else
 10381 000008A7 58                      		pop	ax		; swap(curr_drv,req_drv)
 10382 000008A8 7410                    		jz	short singleret	; issue	swap_dsk_msg
 10383                                  ignore_sdsb:				
 10384 000008AA E8800E                  		call	swpdsk
 10385 000008AD EB0B                    		jmp	short singleret
 10386                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10387                                  
 10388                                  scan_skip:	
 10389 000008AF 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]			
 10390                                  		;les	di, es:[di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 10391                                  					; go to	next bds
 10392 000008B2 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh	; end of list?
 10393 000008B5 759F                    		jnz	short scan_list	; ontinue until	hit end	of list
 10394 000008B7 F9                      		stc
 10395 000008B8 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 10396 000008B9 07                      		pop	es
 10397                                  
 10398                                  singleret:				
 10399 000008BA 5B                      		pop	bx
 10400 000008BB 58                      		pop	ax
 10401 000008BC C3                      		retn
 10402                                  
 10403                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10404                                  
 10405                                  baddrive:				
 10406 000008BD B008                    		mov	al, 8		; sector not found
 10407 000008BF EB02                    		jmp	short baddrive_ret
 10408                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10409                                  
 10410                                  unformatteddrive:				
 10411 000008C1 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; unknown media
 10412                                  baddrive_ret:

 10415                                  
 10416                                  ioret:		
 10417 000008C4 C3                      		retn
 10418                                  
 10419                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10420                                  
 10421                                  ; 15/10/52022
 10422                                  
 10423                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10424                                  ;	disk i/o handler
 10425                                  ;
 10426                                  ;	al = drive number (0-6)
 10427                                  ;	ah = media descriptor
 10428                                  ;	cx = sector count
 10429                                  ;	dx = first sector (low)
 10430                                  ;	[start_sec_h] = first sector (high)  32 bit calculation.
 10431                                  ;	ds = cs
 10432                                  ;	es:di = transfer address
 10433                                  ;	[rflag]=operation (2=read, 3=write)
 10434                                  ;	[verify]=1 for verify after write
 10435                                  ;
 10436                                  ;	if successful carry flag = 0
 10437                                  ;	  else cf=1 and al contains error code
 10438                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10439                                  
 10440                                  diskrd:	
 10441                                  		;mov	ds:rflag, 2	; romread
 10442                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10443 000008C5 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2 ; romread
 10444                                  
 10445                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10446                                  
 10447                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10448                                  diskio:
 10449 000008CA 89FB                    		mov	bx, di		; es:bx	= transfer address
 10450 000008CC 8C06[3705]              		mov	[xfer_seg], es	; save transfer	segment
 10451 000008D0 E8F8FB                  		call	SetDrive
 10452 000008D3 268A4510                		mov	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 10453 000008D7 A2[1F01]                		mov	[medbyt], al
 10454                                  		;jcxz	short ioret
 10455 000008DA E3E8                    		jcxz	ioret
 10456                                  
 10457                                  ; see if the media is formatted or not by checking the flags field in
 10458                                  ; in the bds. if it is unformatted we cannot allow i/o, so we should
 10459                                  ; go to the error exit at label unformatteddrive.
 10460                                  
 10461 000008DC 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+24h], 2
 10462                                  		;test	byte ptr es:[di+24h], 2	; [es:di+BDS.flags+1]
 10463                                  					; unformatted_media
 10464 000008E1 75DE                    		jnz	short unformatteddrive
 10465 000008E3 890E[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], cx	; save sector count
 10466 000008E7 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; save sp
 10467                                  
 10468                                  ; ensure that we are trying to access valid sectors on the drive
 10469                                  
 10470 000008EB 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10471 000008ED 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 10472 000008EF 01CA                    		add	dx, cx
 10473 000008F1 83D600                  		adc	si, 0
 10474 000008F4 26837D0E00              		cmp	word [es:di+0Eh], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10475                                  					; > 32 bit sector ?
 10476 000008F9 740D                    		jz	short sanity32
 10477 000008FB 83FE00                  		cmp	si, 0
 10478 000008FE 75BD                    		jnz	short baddrive
 10479 00000900 263B550E                		cmp	dx, [es:di+0Eh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs16]
 10480 00000904 77B7                    		ja	short baddrive
 10481 00000906 EB12                    		jmp	short sanityok
 10482                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10483                                  
 10484                                  sanity32:				
 10485 00000908 0336[2B05]              		add	si, [start_sec_h]
 10486 0000090C 263B751D                		cmp	si, [es:di+1Dh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32+2]
 10487 00000910 7208                    		jb	short sanityok
 10488 00000912 77A9                    		ja	short baddrive
 10489 00000914 263B551B                		cmp	dx, [es:di+1Bh]	; [es:di+BDS.totalsecs32]
 10490 00000918 77A3                    		ja	short baddrive
 10491                                  
 10492                                  sanityok:				
 10493 0000091A 8B16[2B05]              		mov	dx, [start_sec_h]
 10494 0000091E 26034517                		add	ax, [es:di+17h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs]
 10495 00000922 26135519                		adc	dx, [es:di+19h]	; [es:di+BDS.hiddensecs+2]
 10496                                  
 10497                                  ; now dx;ax have the physical first sector.
 10498                                  ; since the following procedures is going to destroy ax, let's
 10499                                  ; save it temporarily to saved_word.
 10500                                  
 10501 00000926 A3[2D05]                		mov	[saved_word], ax ; save the sector number (low)
 10502                                  
 10503                                  ; set up pointer to disk base table in [dpt]. we cannot assume that iosetup
 10504                                  ; will do it because we will skip the set up stuff with hard disks.
 10505                                  
 10506 00000929 06                      		push	es
 10507 0000092A 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 10508 0000092E 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 10509                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 10510                                  					; current disk parm table
 10511 00000933 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 10512 00000937 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es
 10513 0000093B 07                      		pop	es
 10514 0000093C 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 10515                                  					; fnon_removable
 10516 00000941 7510                    		jnz	short skip_setup
 10517 00000943 E8F6FE                  		call	checksingle
 10518                                  
 10519                                  ; check to see if we have previously noted a change line. the routine
 10520                                  ; returns if everything is ok. otherwise, it pops off the stack and returns
 10521                                  ; the proper error code.
 10522                                  
 10523 00000946 803E[7700]00            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 0 ; do we have changeline support?
 10524 0000094B 7403                    		jz	short diskio_nochangeline ; brif not
 10525 0000094D E8AB0E                  		call	checklatchio	; will do a sneaky pop stack return
 10526                                  					; if a disk error occurs
 10527                                  diskio_nochangeline:			
 10528 00000950 E84700                  		call	iosetup		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 10529                                  
 10530                                  ; now the settle values are correct for the following code
 10531                                  
 10532                                  skip_setup:
 10533                                  
 10534                                  ; 32 bit sector calculation.
 10535                                  ; dx:[saved_word] = starting sector number.
 10536                                  				
 10537 00000953 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 10538 00000955 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10539 00000957 26F77513                		div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10540                                  					 ; divide by sec per track
 10541 0000095B A3[2905]                		mov	[temp_h], ax
 10542 0000095E A1[2D05]                		mov	ax, [saved_word]
 10543 00000961 26F77513                		div	word [es:di+13h] ; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 10544                                  					; now, [temp_h]:ax = track #, dx = sector
 10545                                  		;inc	dl		; sector number	is 1 based.
 10546                                  		; 18/12/2022
 10547 00000965 42                      		inc	dx
 10548 00000966 8816[3101]              		mov	[cursec], dl	; save current sector
 10549 0000096A 268B4D15                		mov	cx, [es:di+15h]	; es:di+BDS.heads]
 10550                                  					; get number of	heads
 10551 0000096E 50                      		push	ax
 10552 0000096F 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 10553 00000971 A1[2905]                		mov	ax, [temp_h]	; divide tracks	by heads per cylinder
 10554 00000974 F7F1                    		div	cx
 10555 00000976 A3[2905]                		mov	[temp_h], ax
 10556 00000979 58                      		pop	ax
 10557 0000097A F7F1                    		div	cx		; now, [temp_h]:ax = cylinder #, dx = head
 10558 0000097C 833E[2905]00            		cmp	word [temp_h], 0
 10559 00000981 7714                    		ja	short baddrive_brdg
 10560 00000983 3D0004                  		cmp	ax, 1024	; 2^10 currently maxium	for track #.
 10561 00000986 770F                    		ja	short baddrive_brdg
 10562 00000988 8816[3201]              		mov	[curhd], dl	; save current head
 10563 0000098C A3[3301]                		mov	[curtrk], ax	; save current track
 10564                                  
 10565                                  ; we are now set up for the i/o. normally, we consider the dma boundary
 10566                                  ; violations here. not true. we perform the operation as if everything is
 10567                                  ; symmetric; let the int 13 handler worry about the dma violations.
 10568                                  
 10569 0000098F A1[2201]                		mov	ax, [seccnt]
 10570 00000992 E88400                  		call	block		; (cas - call/ret)
 10571                                  		;call	done
 10572                                  		;retn
 10573                                  		; 18/12/2022
 10574 00000995 EB4B                    		jmp	done
 10575                                  
 10576                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 10577                                  
 10578                                  baddrive_brdg:				
 10579 00000997 E923FF                  		jmp	baddrive
 10580                                  
 10581                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 10582                                  
 10583                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10584                                  ; set the drive-last-accessed flag for diskette only. 
 10585                                  ; we know that the hard disk will not be removed.
 10586                                  ; es:di -> current bds.
 10587                                  ; ds -> Bios_Data
 10588                                  ; ax,cx,si are destroyed.
 10589                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 10590                                  
 10591                                  		; 19/10/2022
 10592                                  iosetup:	
 10593 0000099A 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 10594 0000099E A2[1E01]                		mov	[tim_drv], al	; save drive letter
 10595                                  
 10596                                  ; determine proper head settle values
 10597                                  
 10598 000009A1 803E[3806]00            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 0
 10599 000009A6 7539                    		jnz	short skip_dpt_setting
 10600 000009A8 A0[2C01]                		mov	al, [eot]	; fetch	up eot before changing ds
 10601 000009AB 1E                      		push	ds
 10602 000009AC C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]	; get pointer to disk base table
 10603 000009B0 884404                  		mov	[si+4],	al
 10604 000009B3 8A440A                  		mov	al, [si+10]	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]

 10790                                  					; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]

 10793                                  
 10794                                  ; if we have [step_drv] set to -1, we use the slow settle time.

 10890                                  
 10891                                  ; check the error returned in ah to see if it is a soft ecc error.
 10892                                  ; if it is not we needn't do anything special. if it is a soft
 10893                                  ; ecc error then decrement the soft_ecc_cnt error retry count. if
 10894                                  ; this retry count becomes 0 then we just ignore the error and go to

 10896                                  ; the disk and go to dskerr1 to retry the operation.

 11035                                  					; get translation

 11039 00000BE6 59                      		pop	cx
 11040 00000BE7 F9                      		stc			; flag error condition
 11041 00000BE8 C3                      		retn
 11042                                  
 11043                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11044                                  
 11045                                  ; set the time of last access for this drive.
 11046                                  ; this is done only for removable media. es:di -> bds
 11047                                  
 11048                                  set_tim:		
 11049 00000BE9 50                      		push	ax
 11050 00000BEA E88DF8                  		call	GetTickCnt	; Does INT 1A ah=0 & updates daycnt
 11051                                  
 11052                                  ; we have the new time. if we see that the time has passed,
 11053                                  ; then we reset the threshold counter...
 11054                                  
 11055 00000BED 263B5547                		cmp	dx, [es:di+47h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11056 00000BF1 7506                    		jnz	short setaccess
 11057 00000BF3 263B4D49                		cmp	cx, [es:di+49h]	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11058                                  		;jz	short done_set
 11059                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11060 00000BF7 740E                    		je	short done_set2
 11061                                  setaccess:				
 11062 00000BF9 C606[1D01]00            		mov	byte [accesscount], 0
 11063 00000BFE 26895547                		mov	[es:di+47h], dx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_lo]
 11064 00000C02 26894D49                		mov	[es:di+49h], cx	; [es:di+BDS.tim_hi]
 11065                                  done_set:				
 11066 00000C06 F8                      		clc
 11067                                  done_set2:		; 12/12/2022
 11068 00000C07 58                      		pop	ax
 11069 00000C08 C3                      		retn
 11070                                  
 11071                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11072                                  
 11073                                  ; this routine is called if an error occurs while formatting or verifying.
 11074                                  ; it resets the drive,and decrements the retry count.
 11075                                  ; on entry - ds:di - points to bds for the drive
 11076                                  ;	     bp    - contains retry count
 11077                                  ; on exit    flags indicate result of decrementing retry count
 11078                                  
 11079                                  again:	
 11080 00000C09 E87004                  		call	ResetDisk
 11081 00000C0C 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 11082 00000C0F 7402                    		jz	short dont_dec_retry_count ; If	it is a	media change error
 11083                                  					; do not decrement retry count.
 11084 00000C11 4D                      		dec	bp		; decrement retry count
 11085 00000C12 C3                      		retn
 11086                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11087                                  
 11088                                  dont_dec_retry_count:			
 11089 00000C13 08E4                    		or	ah, ah
 11090 00000C15 C3                      		retn

 11196                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11197                                  ; Do_Generic_IOCtl: perform generic ioctl request
 11198                                  ;
 11199                                  ;    input: AL contains logical drive
 11200                                  ;
 11201                                  ;	functions are dispatched through a call. On return, carry indicates
 11202                                  ;	error code in al. Note::bES:b& ds undefined on return from
 11203                                  ;	subfunctions.
 11204                                  ;
 11205                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11206                                  
 11207                                  ; 11/03/2019
 11208                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11209                                  do_generic_ioctl:			; 2C7h:0C6Bh = 70h:31DBh
 11210 00000C46 E882F8                  		call	SetDrive	; ES:DI	Points to bds for drive
 11211 00000C49 06                      		push	es
 11212 00000C4A C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	Points to request header
 11213 00000C4E 26807F0D08              		cmp	byte [es:bx+0Dh], 8 ; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 11214                                  					; RAWIO
 11215 00000C53 268A470E                		mov	al, [es:bx+0Eh]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MINORFUNCTION]
 11216 00000C57 07                      		pop	es
 11217 00000C58 7525                    		jnz	short IoctlFuncErr
 11218                                  
 11219                                  		; cas note: Could do the above two blocks in reverse order.
 11220                                  		; Would have to preserve al for SetDrive
 11221                                  
 11222                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11223 00000C5A BE[170C]                		mov	si, IoReadJumpTable
 11224                                  		;mov	si, 0C3Ch	; IoReadJumpTable
 11225                                  					; at 2C7h:0C3Ch	= 70h:31ACh
 11226 00000C5D A820                    		test	al, 20h		; GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; test of req. function
 11227 00000C5F 7503                    		jnz	short NotGenericWrite ; function is a read.
 11228                                  		; 10/12/2022
 11229 00000C61 BE[2A0C]                		mov	si, IoWriteJumpTable
 11230                                  		;mov	si, 0C4Fh	; IoWriteJumpTable
 11231                                  					; at 2C7h:0C4Fh	= 70h:31BFh
 11232                                  NotGenericWrite:			
 11233 00000C64 24DF                    		and	al, 0DFh	; ~GEN_IOCTL_FN_TST ; get rid of read/write bit
 11234 00000C66 2C40                    		sub	al, 40h		; offset for base function
 11235 00000C68 2E3A04                  		cmp	al, [cs:si]
 11236 00000C6B 7712                    		ja	short IoctlFuncErr
 11237 00000C6D 98                      		cbw
 11238 00000C6E D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11239 00000C70 46                      		inc	si
 11240 00000C71 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11241 00000C73 2EFF14                  		call	near [cs:si]
 11242                                  		;call	word ptr cs:[si]
 11243 00000C76 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 11244                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 11245                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11246 00000C7B B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Return this status in	case of	carry
 11247 00000C7D C3                      		retn			; Pass carry flag through to exit code
 11248                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11249                                  
 11250                                  		; Cmd_Error_Proc is called as a procedure and also use
 11251                                  		; as a fall through from above
 11252                                  Cmd_Error_Proc:				; 2C7h:0CA3h = 70h:3213h
 11253 00000C7E 5A                      		pop	dx

 11261                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11262                                  ;**	GetDeviceParameters:
 11263                                  ;
 11264                                  ;	GetDeviceParameters implements the generic ioctl function:
 11265                                  ;	majorcode=RAWIO, minorcode=GetDeviceParameters (60h)
 11266                                  ;
 11267                                  ;	ENTRY	(ES:di) = BDS for drive
 11268                                  ;		PtrSav = long pointer to request header
 11269                                  ;	EXIT	??? BUGBUG
 11270                                  ;	USES	??? BUGBUG
 11271                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11272                                  
 11273                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11274                                  GetDeviceParameters:
 11275                                  		; Copy info from bds to the device parameters packet
 11276                                  
 11277 00000C82 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 11278 00000C86 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 11279                                  					; (DS:BX) = return buffer
 11280 00000C89 268A4522                		mov	al, [es:di+34]	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 11281 00000C8D 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE]
 11282 00000C90 268B4523                		mov	ax, [es:di+35]	; [es:di+BDS.flags]

 11284                                  					; Mask off other bits

 11290                                  					
 11291                                  		; copy recommended bpb
 11292 00000CA6 8D7527                  		lea	si, [di+39]	; [di+BDS.rbytespersec]	= [di+BDS.R_BPB]
 11293 00000CA9 F60701                  		test	byte [bx], 1	; [bx+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_SPECIALFUNCTIONS]
 11294                                  					; BUILD_DEVICE_BPB

 11299                                  					; 2C7h:30h = 70h:25A0h
 11300                                  					; Point back to Bios_Data

 11304 00000CBB 720F                    		jb	short GetParmRet

 11306                                  					; Use this subfield of bds instead
 11307                                  UseBpbPresent:

 11313 00000CC7 06                      		push	es

 11483                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11484                                  ; FormatTrack:
 11485                                  ; if specialfunction byte is 1,then this is a status call to see if there is
 11486                                  ; rom support for the combination of sec/trk and # of cyln,and if the
 11487                                  ; combination is legal. if specialfunction byte is 0,then format the track.
 11488                                  ;
 11489                                  ; input: ES:di points to bds for drive
 11490                                  ;
 11491                                  ; output:
 11492                                  ;	for status call:
 11493                                  ;	specialfunction byte set to:
 11494                                  ;		0 - rom support + legal combination
 11495                                  ;		1 - no rom support
 11496                                  ;		2 - illegal combination
 11497                                  ;		3 - no media present
 11498                                  ;	carry cleared.
 11499                                  ;
 11500                                  ;	for format track:
 11501                                  ;		carry set if error
 11502                                  ;
 11503                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11504                                  
 11505                                  ; 16/03/2019

 11654                                  
 11655                                  		; Check specialfunctions to see if DO_FAST_FORMAT has been
 11656                                  		; specified if not we should go to the normal track verification
 11657                                  		; routine. If fast format has been specified we should get the
 11658                                  		; number of tracks to be verified and check it to see if it is
 11659                                  		; > 255. If it is then it is an error and we should go to

 11661                                  		; sectors per track to get the total number of sectors to be
 11662                                  		; verified. This should also be less than equal to 255
 11663                                  		; otherwise we go to same error exit. If everything is okay

 11665                                  		; register.

 11745                                  		; our packet. Notice that this is not the standard register
 11746                                  		; assignment for accessing packets

 11767                                  
 11768                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11769                                  
 11770                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 11771                                  
 11772                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11773                                  ;
 11774                                  ; TrackIo:
 11775                                  ;    performs track read/write/verify
 11776                                  ;
 11777                                  ;   input:
 11778                                  ;      rFlag	- 2 = read
 11779                                  ;		  3 = write
 11780                                  ;		  4 = verify
 11781                                  ;      AX	- Index into track table of first sector to io
 11782                                  ;      CX	- Number of sectors to io
 11783                                  ;      Xfer_Seg:BX - Transfer address
 11784                                  ;      ES:DI	- Pointer to bds
 11785                                  ;      CurTrk	- Current cylinder
 11786                                  ;      CurHd	- Current head
 11787                                  ;
 11788                                  ; ==========================================================================
 11789                                  
 11790                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 11791                                  		
 11792                                  		; 19/10/2022
 11793                                  TrackIo:	
 11794                                  					; Procedure `disk' will pop stack to
 11795 00000EF1 8926[3501]              		mov	[spsav], sp	; SpSav	and return if error
 11796 00000EF5 E844F9                  		call	checksingle	; Ensure correct disk is in drv
 11797 00000EF8 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 11798                                  					; See if we have already set	disk
 11799 00000EFD 7407                    		jz	short Dptalreadyset ; base table
 11800 00000EFF 50                      		push	ax		; set up tables	and variables for i/o
 11801 00000F00 51                      		push	cx
 11802 00000F01 E896FA                  		call	iosetup
 11803 00000F04 59                      		pop	cx
 11804 00000F05 58                      		pop	ax
 11805                                  Dptalreadyset:				; Point si at the table entry of the			
 11806 00000F06 BE[3B05]                		mov	si, tracktable	; first sector to be io'd
 11807 00000F09 D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11808 00000F0B D1E0                    		shl	ax, 1
 11809 00000F0D 01C6                    		add	si, ax
 11810                                  
 11811                                  		; WE WANT:
 11812                                  		; CX to	be the number of times we have to loop
 11813                                  		; DX to	be the number of sectors we read on each iteration
 11814                                  		
 11815 00000F0F BA0100                  		mov	dx, 1
 11816                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11817 00000F12 26F6452308              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 8
 11818                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 8 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11819                                  					; good_tracklayout
 11820 00000F17 7402                    		jz	short ionextsector
 11821                                  		
 11822 00000F19 87D1                    		xchg	dx, cx		; HEY! We can read all secs in one blow
 11823                                  ionextsector:				
 11824 00000F1B 51                      		push	cx
 11825 00000F1C 52                      		push	dx
 11826 00000F1D 46                      		inc	si
 11827 00000F1E 46                      		inc	si		; Skip over the	cylinder and head in
 11828                                  					; the track table
 11829 00000F1F AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector ID	from track table
 11830 00000F20 A2[3101]                		mov	[cursec], al
 11831                                  
 11832                                  		; assumptions for a fixed disk multi-track disk	i/o
 11833                                  		; 1). In the input CX (# of sectors to go) to TrackIo,
 11834                                  		;     only CL is valid.
 11835                                  		; 2). Sector size should be set	to 512 bytes.
 11836                                  		; 3). Good track layout
 11837                                  		
 11838                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11839 00000F23 26F6452301              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 1
 11840                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 1 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 11841                                  					; fnon_removable ; Fixed disk?
 11842 00000F28 7414                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No
 11843                                  		; 12/12/2022
 11844 00000F2A F606[2F05]80            		test	byte [multrk_flag], 80h
 11845                                  		;test	word [multrk_flag], 80h ; MULTI_TRK_ON
 11846                                  						; Allow multi-track operation?
 11847 00000F2F 740D                    		jz	short IoRemovable ; No,don't do that.
 11848 00000F31 8916[2201]              		mov	[seccnt], dx
 11849 00000F35 89D0                    		mov	ax, dx
 11850 00000F37 E81DFB                  		call	Disk
 11851 00000F3A 5A                      		pop	dx
 11852 00000F3B 59                      		pop	cx
 11853 00000F3C F8                      		clc
 11854 00000F3D C3                      		retn
 11855                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11856                                  
 11857                                  IoRemovable:				
 11858 00000F3E AC                      		lodsb			; Get sector size index	from track
 11859                                  					; table	and save it
 11860 00000F3F 50                      		push	ax
 11861 00000F40 56                      		push	si
 11862 00000F41 1E                      		push	ds		; Save Bios_Data
 11863 00000F42 50                      		push	ax
 11864 00000F43 8A26[2C01]              		mov	ah, [eot]	; Preserve whatever might be in	ah
 11865                                  					; Fetch	EOT while ds-> Bios_Data
 11866 00000F47 C536[2D01]              		lds	si, [dpt]
 11867 00000F4B 884403                  		mov	[si+3],	al	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_SECTOR_SIZ]
 11868 00000F4E 886404                  		mov	[si+4],	ah	; [si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 11869 00000F51 58                      		pop	ax
 11870 00000F52 1F                      		pop	ds
 11871 00000F53 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 11872 00000F55 A3[2201]                		mov	[seccnt], ax

 11875                                  					; sector size

 11893                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11894                                  
 11895                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11896                                  ;
 11897                                  ; The sector size in bytes needs to be converted to an index value for the ibm
 11898                                  ; rom. (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024). It is assumed that only these values
 11899                                  ; are permissible.
 11900                                  ;
 11901                                  ; On Input   AX contains sector size in bytes
 11902                                  ; On Output  AL Contains index
 11903                                  ; All other registers preserved
 11904                                  ;
 11905                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11906                                  
 11907                                  SectSizeToSectIndex:	
 11908 00000F72 80FC02                  		cmp	ah, 2		; (0=>128,1=>256,2=>512,3=>1024)
 11909                                  					; examine upper	byte only
 11910 00000F75 7703                    		ja	short OneK
 11911 00000F77 88E0                    		mov	al, ah		; value	in AH is the index!
 11912 00000F79 C3                      		retn
 11913                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 11914                                  
 11915                                  OneK:					
 11916 00000F7A B003                    		mov	al, 3
 11917 00000F7C C3                      		retn
 11918                                  
 11919                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 11920                                  
 11921                                  
 11922                                  SectorSizeIndexToSectorSize:

 11924 00000F7F B88000                  		mov	ax, 128
 11925 00000F82 D3E0                    		shl	ax, cl
 11926 00000F84 C3                      		retn

 11996 00000FDB CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - DISK -	SET TYPE (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS
 11997                                  					; AL = disk type AL = 03h - high-capacity disk in high-capacity	drive
 11998                                  DasdHasBeenSet:

 12000 00000FE1 8826[3701]              		mov	[formt_eot], ah

 12002                                  
 12003                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12004                                  
 12005                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12006                                  
 12007                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12008                                  ;
 12009                                  ; Set Media Type for Format
 12010                                  ; Performs the int 13 with ah = 18h to see if the medium described in the
 12011                                  ; BPB area in the BDS can be handled by the rom.
 12012                                  ; On Input, ES:DI -> current BDS.
 12013                                  ; The status of the operation is returned in AL
 12014                                  ;
 12015                                  ;	- 0 - if the support is available,and the combination is valid.
 12016                                  ;	- 1 - no rom support
 12017                                  ;	- 2 - illegal combination
 12018                                  ;	- 3 - no media present (rom support exists but cannot determine now)
 12019                                  ;
 12020                                  ; Flags also may be altered. All other registers preserved.
 12021                                  ; If the call to rom returns no error,then the current Dpt is "replaced" by
 12022                                  ; the one returned by the rom. This is Done by changing the pointer in [Dpt]
 12023                                  ; to the one returned. the original pointer to the disk base table is stored
 12024                                  ; in TempDpt, until it is restored.
 12025                                  ;
 12026                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12027                                  
 12028                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12029                                  SetMediaForFormat:	
 12030 00000FE6 51                      		push	cx
 12031 00000FE7 52                      		push	dx
 12032                                  
 12033                                  		; If we have a format error, then do not change Dpt, TempDpt.
 12034                                  		; but we need to call int 13h, ah=18h again.
 12035                                  
 12036 00000FE8 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12037 00000FED 7425                    		jz	short SkipSaveDskAdr
 12038 00000FEF 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; If already done return 0
 12039 00000FF1 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12040 00000FF6 7502                    		jnz	short DoSetMediaForFormat
 12041 00000FF8 EB7F                    		jmp	SetMediaRet	; Media	already	set
 12042                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12043                                  
 12044                                  DoSetMediaForFormat:			
 12045 00000FFA 06                      		push	es
 12046 00000FFB 56                      		push	si
 12047 00000FFC 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point to interrupt vectors
 12048 00001000 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12049                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR]
 12050                                  					; Get pointer to disk base table
 12051 00001005 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12052 00001009 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12053                                  
 12054                                  		; Initialize the head settle time to 0Fh. See the offsets
 12055                                  		; given in dskprm.inc.
 12056                                  
 12057 0000100D 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12058 00001012 5E                      		pop	si
 12059 00001013 07                      		pop	es
 12060                                  
 12061                                  SkipSaveDskAdr:				
 12062 00001014 268B4D25                		mov	cx, [es:di+25h]	; [es:di+BDS.cylinders]
 12063 00001018 49                      		dec	cx
 12064 00001019 80E503                  		and	ch, 3
 12065 0000101C D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12066 0000101E D0CD                    		ror	ch, 1
 12067 00001020 86E9                    		xchg	ch, cl
 12068 00001022 260A4D13                		or	cl, [es:di+13h]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 12069 00001026 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12070 0000102A 06                      		push	es
 12071 0000102B 1E                      		push	ds
 12072 0000102C 56                      		push	si
 12073 0000102D 57                      		push	di
 12074 0000102E B418                    		mov	ah, 18h
 12075 00001030 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - SET MEDIA TYPE	FOR FORMAT (AT model 3x9,XT2,XT286,PS)
 12076                                  					; DL = drive number, CH	= lower	8 bits of number of tracks, CL = sectors per track
 12077 00001032 7233                    		jb	short FormaStatErr
 12078 00001034 803E[3906]01            		cmp	byte [had_format_error], 1
 12079 00001039 7425                    		jz	short skip_disk_base_setting
 12080 0000103B 06                      		push	es		; Save segment returned	by the rom
 12081 0000103C 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]	; Point	to interrupt vector segment
 12082 00001040 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12083                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; [es:DSKADR] (Int 1Eh)
 12084                                  					; Get current disk base	table
 12085 00001045 8936[3A06]              		mov	[tempdpt], si
 12086 00001049 8C06[3C06]              		mov	[tempdpt+2], es ; Save it
 12087 0000104D 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12088                                  		;mov	es:78h,	di
 12089 00001051 26893E7800              		mov	[es:DSKADR], di
 12090                                  		;pop	word ptr es:7Ah	; replace with one returned by rom
 12091 00001056 268F067A00              		pop	word [es:DSKADR+2]
 12092 0000105B C606[3806]01            		mov	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12093                                  skip_disk_base_setting:			
 12094 00001060 30C0                    		xor	al, al		; Legal	combination + rom support code
 12095                                  		;mov	ds:had_format_error, al	; Reset	the flag
 12096 00001062 A2[3906]                		mov	[had_format_error], al
 12097 00001065 EB0E                    		jmp	short PopStatRet
 12098                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12099                                  
 12100                                  FormaStatErr:
 12101                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12102 00001067 B003                    		mov	al, 3
 12103                                  				
 12104 00001069 80FC0C                  		cmp	ah, 0Ch		; DSK_ILLEGAL_COMBINATION
 12105                                  					; Illegal combination =	0Ch
 12106 0000106C 7406                    		jz	short FormatStatIllegalComb
 12107 0000106E 80FC80                  		cmp	ah, 80h		; DSK_TIMEOUT_ERR

 12110                                  		;dec	al
 12111                                  		; 18/12/2022

 12113                                  		; al = 2
 12114                                  		;mov	al, 1		; Function not supported.
 12115                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet
 12116                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12117

 12120                                  		;dec	al	; 3 -> 2 or 2 -> 1
 12121                                  		; 18/12/2022
 12122 00001074 48                      		dec	ax
 12123                                  		; al = 2				
 12124                                  		;mov	al, 2		; Function supported, but
 12125                                  					; Illegal sect/trk,trk combination.
 12126                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12127                                  		;jmp	short PopStatRet

 12146                                  
 12147                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12148                                  
 12149                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12150                                  ;
 12151                                  ; RESET THE DRIVE
 12152                                  ;
 12153                                  ; we also set [Step_Drv] to -1 to force the main disk routine to use the
 12154                                  ; slow head settle time for the next operation. this is because the reset
 12155                                  ; operation moves the head to cylinder 0,so we need to do a seek the next
 12156                                  ; time around - there is a problem with 3.5" drives in that the head does
 12157                                  ; not settle down in time,even for read operations!!
 12158                                  ;
 12159                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12160                                  
 12161                                  ResetDisk:	
 12162 0000107C 50                      		push	ax
 12163 0000107D 803E[3806]01            		cmp	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12164                                  					; Reset while formatting?
 12165 00001082 7505                    		jnz	short ResetDisk_cont
 12166                                  					; Then verify operation in "fmt & vrfy"
 12167 00001084 C606[3906]01            		mov	byte [had_format_error], 1 ; Might have failed.
 12168                                  ResetDisk_cont:				
 12169 00001089 30E4                    		xor	ah, ah		; So signals that we had a format error
 12170 0000108B CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - RESET DISK SYSTEM
 12171                                  					; DL = drive (if bit 7 is set both hard	disks and floppy disks reset)
 12172 0000108D C606[7600]FF            		mov	byte [step_drv], 0FFh ; -1
 12173                                  					; Zap up the speed
 12174 00001092 58                      		pop	ax
 12175 00001093 C3                      		retn
 12176                                  
 12177                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12178                                  
 12179                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12180                                  
 12181                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12182                                  ;
 12183                                  ; This routine sets up the drive parameter table with the values needed for
 12184                                  ; format,does an int 13. values in Dpt are restored after a verify is done.
 12185                                  ;
 12186                                  ; on entry  -	ES:DI - points to bds for the drive
 12187                                  ;		Xfer_Seg:BX - points to trkbuf
 12188                                  ;		AL    - number of sectors
 12189                                  ;		AH    - int 13 function code
 12190                                  ;		CL    - sector number for verify
 12191                                  ;		DS    - Bios_Data
 12192                                  ;
 12193                                  ; ON EXIT   -	DS,DI,ES,BX remain unchanged.
 12194                                  ;		AX and flags are the results of the int 13
 12195                                  ;
 12196                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12197                                  
 12198                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12199                                  ToRom:	
 12200 00001094 53                      		push	bx
 12201 00001095 56                      		push	si
 12202                                  
 12203                                  		; Compaq bug fix - check whether we are using new ROM
 12204                                  		; functionality to set up format, not merely if it exists.
 12205                                  		; This was formerly a check against [new_rom]
 12206                                  
 12207 00001096 F606[3806]01            		test	byte [media_set_for_format], 1
 12208 0000109B 7536                    		jnz	short GotValidDpt
 12209 0000109D 50                      		push	ax
 12210 0000109E 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12211 0000109F 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 12212                                  					; ffSmall ; is it a 3.5" drive?
 12213 000010A4 9C                      		pushf			; (Save	the cmp	result)
 12214 000010A5 8E06[1A00]              		mov	es, [zeroseg]
 12215                                  		;les	si, es:78h	; Get pointer to disk base table
 12216 000010A9 26C4367800              		les	si, [es:DSKADR]
 12217                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt, si
 12218                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:dpt+2, es ;	 Save pointer to table
 12219 000010AE 8936[2D01]              		mov	[dpt], si
 12220 000010B2 8C06[2F01]              		mov	[dpt+2], es	; Save pointer to table
 12221                                  		
 12222 000010B6 A0[3701]                		mov	al, [formt_eot]
 12223 000010B9 26884404                		mov	[es:si+4], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_EOT]
 12224 000010BD A0[3B01]                		mov	al, [gap_patch]
 12225 000010C0 26884407                		mov	[es:si+7], al	; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_FORMT_GAP]
 12226                                  					; Important for	format
 12227 000010C4 26C644090F              		mov	byte [es:si+9], 0Fh ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_HEAD_STTL]
 12228                                  					; Assume we are	doing a	seek operation
 12229                                  					; Setup	motor start correctly for 3.5" drives
 12230 000010C9 9D                      		popf			; Get result of	earlier	cmp
 12231 000010CA 7505                    		jnz	short MotorStrtOK
 12232 000010CC 26C6440A04              		mov	byte [es:si+0Ah], 4 ; [es:si+DISK_PARMS.DISK_MOTOR_STRT]
 12233                                  MotorStrtOK:				
 12234 000010D1 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12235 000010D2 58                      		pop	ax
 12236                                  GotValidDpt:				
 12237 000010D3 8B16[3901]              		mov	dx, [trknum]	; Set track number
 12238 000010D7 88D5                    		mov	ch, dl		; Set low 8 bits in ch
 12239 000010D9 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; Set drive number
 12240 000010DD 8A36[3801]              		mov	dh, [hdnum]	; Set head number
 12241 000010E1 06                      		push	es		; Save bds segment
 12242 000010E2 8E06[3705]              		mov	es, [xfer_seg]
 12243 000010E6 CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK -
 12244 000010E8 07                      		pop	es		; Restore bds segment
 12245 000010E9 5E                      		pop	si
 12246 000010EA 5B                      		pop	bx
 12247 000010EB C3                      		retn

 12249                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12250                                  
 12251                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12252                                  
 12253                                  ; BIOSCODE:1124h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12254                                  
 12255                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12256                                  ;
 12257                                  ; get the owner of the physical drive represented by the logical drive in al.
 12258                                  ; the assumption is that we **always** keep track of the owner of a drive!!
 12259                                  ; if this is not the case, the system may hang, just following the linked list.
 12260                                  ;
 12261                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12262                                  
 12263                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12264                                  ioctl_getown:
 12265 000010EC E8DCF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12266 000010EF 268A4504                		mov	al, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12267                                  					; Get physical drive number
 12268 000010F3 C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds] ; Get start of bds chain
 12269                                  ownloop:				
 12270 000010F7 26384504                		cmp	[es:di+4], al	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12271 000010FB 7507                    		jnz	short getnextBDS
 12272                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12273 000010FD 26F6452320              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 20h
 12274                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 20h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12275                                  					; fi_own_physical
 12276 00001102 7515                    		jnz	short exitown
 12277                                  getnextBDS:				
 12278 00001104 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 12279 00001107 EBEE                    		jmp	short ownloop
 12280                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12281                                  
 12282                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12283                                  ;
 12284                                  ; set the ownership of the physical drive represented by the logical drive
 12285                                  ; in al to al.
 12286                                  ;
 12287                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12288                                  
 12289                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12290                                  ioctl_setown:
 12291 00001109 E8BFF3                  		call	SetDrive
 12292 0000110C C606[7A00]01            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 1
 12293                                  					; set flag for CheckSingle to look at.
 12294 00001111 E828F7                  		call	checksingle
 12295 00001114 C606[7A00]00            		mov	byte [fsetowner], 0
 12296                                  					; set ownership	of drive reset flag
 12297                                  		; Fall into ExitOwn
 12298                                  
 12299                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12300                                  ;
 12301                                  ; if there is only one logical drive assigned to this physical drive, return
 12302                                  ; 0 to user to indicate this. Enter with ES:di -> the owner's bds.
 12303                                  ;
 12304                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12305                                  
 12306                                  exitown:				
 12307 00001119 30C9                    		xor	cl, cl
 12308                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12309 0000111B 26F6452310              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 10h
 12310                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 10h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12311                                  					; fi_am_mult
 12312 00001120 7406                    		jz	short exitnomult
 12313 00001122 268A4D05                		mov	cl, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12314                                  					; Get logical drive number
 12315                                  					; Get it 1-based
 12316 00001126 FEC1                    		inc	cl
 12317                                  exitnomult:				
 12318 00001128 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 12319 0000112C 884F01                  		mov	[bx+1],	cl	; [bx+unit]
 12320                                  					; Exit normal termination
 12321                                  		; 12/12/2022

 12323                                  		;clc
