 12376                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12377                                  
 12378                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12379                                  ;	get media id
 12380                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12381                                  ;
 12382                                  ; FUNCTION: get the volume label,the system id and the serial number from
 12383                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12384                                  ;	    for the conventional media,this routine will return "unknown
 12385                                  ;	    media type" error to dos.
 12386                                  ;
 12387                                  ; INPUT :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12388                                  ;
 12389                                  ; OUTPUT:   the request packet filled with the information,if not carry.
 12390                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12391                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12392                                  ;	    register DS,DX,AX,CX,DI,SI destroyed.
 12393                                  ;
 12394                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12395                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12396                                  ;
 12397                                  ; LOGIC:
 12398                                  ;	to recognize the extended boot record,this logic will actually
 12399                                  ;	access the boot sector even if it is a hard disk.
 12400                                  ;	note:the valid extended bpb is recognized by looking at the mediabyte
 12401                                  ;	field of bpb and the extended boot signature.
 12402                                  ;
 12403                                  ; {
 12404                                  ;	get logical drive number from bds table;
 12405                                  ;	rFlag = read operation;
 12406                                  ;	BootIo;		 /*get the media boot record into the buffer
 12407                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12408                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12409                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12410                                  ;		  of the request packet to those of the boot record;
 12411                                  ;		};
 12412                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12413                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12414                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12415                                  ;		};
 12416                                  ;	else
 12417                                  ;	     ret;	/*already error code is set in the register al
 12418                                  ;
 12419                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12420                                  
 12421                                  ;size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL equ 4
 12422                                  ;;size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL equ 11
 12423                                  ;;size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID equ 8
 12424                                  
 12425                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12426                                  GetMediaId:
 12427 0000115E E89F00                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12428 00001161 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet] ; Logical drive number
 12429 00001165 C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; Read operation
 12430 0000116A E87B00                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sector into	DiskSector
 12431 0000116D 7224                    		jb	short IOCtl_If1
 12432                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12433 0000116F 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12434                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12435 00001174 721A                    		jb	short IOCtl_If2	; brif not valid (0F0h - 0FFh)
 12436                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12437 00001176 BE[7401]                		mov	si, disksector+26h
 12438 00001179 803C29                  		cmp	byte [si], 29h
 12439                                  		;cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12440                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12441 0000117C 7512                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If2	; not extended boot record
 12442 0000117E C43E[1200]              		les	di, [ptrsav]	; es:di	points to request header
 12443 00001182 26C47F13                		les	di, [es:bx+19]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12444                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12445 00001186 46                      		inc	si
 12446                                  		; si = disksector+27h 
 12447                                  		;mov	si, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12448 00001187 83C702                  		add	di, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12449 0000118A B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12450                                  					; L+size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12451                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12452 0000118D F3A4                    		rep movsb		; Move from Bios_Data into request packet
 12453                                  	
 12454                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12455                                  		; cf = 0
 12456                                  		;clc
 12457                                  
 12458 0000118F C3                      		retn
 12459                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12460                                  
 12461                                  IOCtl_If2:				
 12462 00001190 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12463 00001192 F9                      		stc
 12464                                  IOCtl_If1:				
 12465 00001193 C3                      		retn
 12466                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12467                                  
 12468                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12469                                  
 12470                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12471                                  ;  set media id
 12472                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12473                                  
 12474                                  ; function: set the volume label, the system id and the serial number of
 12475                                  ;	    the media that has the extended boot record.
 12476                                  ;	    for the conventional media, this routine will return "unknown
 12477                                  ;	    media.." error to dos.
 12478                                  ;	    this routine will also set the corresponding informations in
 12479                                  ;	    the bds table.
 12480                                  ;
 12481                                  ; input :   ES:di -> bds table for this drive.
 12482                                  ;
 12483                                  ; output:   the extended boot record in the media will be set according to
 12484                                  ;	    the request packet.
 12485                                  ;	    if carry set, then al contains the device driver error number
 12486                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12487                                  ;
 12488                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12489                                  ;	BootIo:NEAR
 12490                                  ;
 12491                                  ; logic:
 12492                                  ;
 12493                                  ; {
 12494                                  ;	get drive_number from bds;
 12495                                  ;	rFlag = "read operation";
 12496                                  ;	BootIo;
 12497                                  ;	if (no error) then
 12498                                  ;	     if (extended boot record) then
 12499                                  ;		{ set volume label,volume serial number and system id
 12500                                  ;		  of the boot record to those of the request packet;
 12501                                  ;		  rFlag = "write operation";
 12502                                  ;		  get drive number from bds;
 12503                                  ;		  BootIo;	  /*write it back*/
 12504                                  ;		};
 12505                                  ;	     else		  /*not an extended bpb */
 12506                                  ;		{ set register al to "unknown media.." error code;
 12507                                  ;		  set carry bit;
 12508                                  ;		  ret;	 /*return back to caller */
 12509                                  ;		};
 12510                                  ;	else
 12511                                  ;	     ret;		 /*already error code is set */
 12512                                  ;
 12513                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12514                                  
 12515                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12516                                  SetMediaId:
 12517 00001194 E86900                  		call	ChangeLineChk
 12518 00001197 268A4505                		mov	al, [es:di+5]	; [es:di+BDS.drivelet]
 12519                                  					; Logical drive	number
 12520 0000119B 88C2                    		mov	dl, al
 12521 0000119D C606[2001]02            		mov	byte [rflag], 2	; romread
 12522 000011A2 52                      		push	dx
 12523 000011A3 E84200                  		call	BootIo		; Read boot sec	to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12524 000011A6 5A                      		pop	dx
 12525 000011A7 723E                    		jb	short IOCtl_If6
 12526                                  					; Valid? (0F0h-0FFh?)
 12527 000011A9 803E[6301]F0            		cmp	byte [disksector+15h], 0F0h
 12528                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.MEDIADESCRIPTOR]
 12529 000011AE 7234                    		jb	short IOCtl_If7	; Brif not
 12530 000011B0 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h ; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG]
 12531                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 12532 000011B5 752D                    		jnz	short IOCtl_If7	; not extended boot record
 12533 000011B7 06                      		push	es		; Save BDS pointer
 12534 000011B8 57                      		push	di
 12535 000011B9 1E                      		push	ds		; Point	ES To boot record
 12536 000011BA 07                      		pop	es
 12537 000011BB BF[7501]                		mov	di, disksector+27h ; disksector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL
 12538 000011BE C536[1200]              		lds	si, [ptrsav]	; ds:si	points to request header.
 12539 000011C2 C57413                  		lds	si, [si+19]	; [si+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12540 000011C5 83C602                  		add	si, 2		; A_MEDIA_ID_INFO.MI_SERIAL
 12541 000011C8 B91700                  		mov	cx, 23		; size_of_EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 12542                                  					; +size_of_EXT_BOOT_VOL_LABEL
 12543                                  					; +size_of_EXT_SYSTEM_ID
 12544 000011CB F3A4                    		rep movsb
 12545 000011CD 06                      		push	es		; point	ds back	to Bios_Data
 12546 000011CE 1F                      		pop	ds
 12547 000011CF 5F                      		pop	di		; restore bds pointer
 12548 000011D0 07                      		pop	es
 12549 000011D1 E864F5                  		call	mov_media_ids	; update the bds media id info.
 12550 000011D4 88D0                    		mov	al, dl
 12551 000011D6 C606[2001]03            		mov	byte [rflag], 3	; romwrite
 12552 000011DB E80A00                  		call	BootIo		; write	it back.
 12553 000011DE C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte [tim_drv], 0FFh
 12554                                  					; make sure chk_media check the driver
 12555                                  					; return with error code from BootIo
 12556 000011E3 C3                      		retn
 12557                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12558                                  
 12559                                  IOCtl_If7:				
 12560 000011E4 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; error_unknown_media
 12561 000011E6 F9                      		stc
 12562                                  IOCtl_If6:				
 12563 000011E7 C3                      		retn
 12564                                  
 12565                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12566                                  
 12567                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12568                                  
 12569                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12570                                  ;	BootIo
 12571                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12572                                  ;
 12573                                  ; function: read/write the boot record into boot sector.
 12574                                  ;
 12575                                  ; input :
 12576                                  ;	    al=logical drive number
 12577                                  ;	    rFlag = operation (read/write)
 12578                                  ;
 12579                                  ; output:   for read operation,the boot record of the drive specified in bds
 12580                                  ;	    be read into the DiskSector buffer.
 12581                                  ;	    for write operation,the DiskSector buffer image will be written
 12582                                  ;	    to the drive specified in bds.
 12583                                  ;	    if carry set,then al contains the device driver error number
 12584                                  ;	    that will be returned to dos.
 12585                                  ;	    AX,CX,DX register destroyed.
 12586                                  ;	    if carry set,then al will contain the error code from DiskIO.
 12587                                  ;
 12588                                  ; subroutines to be called:
 12589                                  ;	DiskIO:NEAR
 12590                                  ;
 12591                                  ; logic:
 12592                                  ;
 12593                                  ; {
 12594                                  ;	first_sector = 0;	 /*logical sector 0 is the boot sector */
 12595                                  ;	sectorcount = 1;	 /*read 1 sector only */
 12596                                  ;	buffer = DiskSector;	 /*read it into the DiskSector buffer */
 12597                                  ;	call DiskIO (rFlag,drive_number,first_sector,sectorcount,buffer);
 12598                                  ; }
 12599                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12600                                  
 12601                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12602                                  BootIo:	
 12603 000011E8 06                      		push	es
 12604 000011E9 57                      		push	di
 12605 000011EA 53                      		push	bx
 12606 000011EB 1E                      		push	ds
 12607 000011EC 07                      		pop	es		; Point ES: to Bios_Data
 12608                                  
 12609                                  		; Call DiskIO to read/write the boot sec. The parameters which
 12610                                  		; need to be initialized for this subroutine out here are
 12611                                  		; - Transfer address to Bios_Data:DiskSector
 12612                                  		; - Low sector needs to be initalized to 0. this is a reg. param
 12613                                  		; - Hi sector in [Start_Sec_H] needs to be initialised to 0.
 12614                                  		; - Number of sectors <-- 1
 12615                                  
 12616 000011ED BF[4E01]                		mov	di, disksector	; es:di -> transfer address
 12617 000011F0 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx		; First	sector (h) -> 0
 12618 000011F2 8916[2B05]              		mov	[start_sec_h], dx ; Start sector (h) -> 0
 12619 000011F6 B90100                  		mov	cx, 1
 12620 000011F9 E8CEF6                  		call	diskio
 12621 000011FC 5B                      		pop	bx
 12622 000011FD 5F                      		pop	di
 12623 000011FE 07                      		pop	es
 12624 000011FF C3                      		retn
 12625                                  
 12626                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 12627                                  
 12628                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12629                                  
 12630                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12631                                  ;	ChangeLineChk
 12632                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12633                                  ;
 12634                                  ; when the user calls get/set media id call before dos establishes the media
 12635                                  ; by calling "media_chk",the change line activity of the drive is going to be
 12636                                  ; lost.	this routine will check the change line activity and will save the
 12637                                  ; history in the flags.
 12638                                  ;
 12639                                  ; FUNCTION: check the change line error activity
 12640                                  ;
 12641                                  ; INPUT :  ES:di -> bds table.
 12642                                  ;
 12643                                  ; OUTPUT:   flag in bds table will be updated if change line occurs.
 12644                                  ;
 12645                                  ; SUBROUTINES TO BE CALLED:
 12646                                  ;	Set_Changed_DL
 12647                                  ;
 12648                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12649                                  
 12650                                  ChangeLineChk:	
 12651 00001200 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12652 00001204 08D2                    		or	dl, dl		; Fixed	disk?
 12653 00001206 7821                    		js	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Yes, skip it.
 12654                                  		; 12/12/2022
 12655 00001208 26F6452304              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 4
 12656                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 4 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12657                                  					; return_fake_bpb
 12658 0000120D 751A                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12659 0000120F 803E[7700]01            		cmp	byte [fhave96], 1	; This rom support change line?
 12660 00001214 7513                    		jnz	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12661 00001216 E8F806                  		call	haschange	; This drive support change line?
 12662 00001219 740E                    		jz	short ChangeLnChkRet ; Do nothing
 12663                                  
 12664                                  		; Execute the rom disk interrupt to check changeline activity.
 12665                                  
 12666 0000121B B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 12667 0000121D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 12668                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 12669                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 12670 0000121F 7308                    		jnb	short ChangeLnChkRet
 12671 00001221 53                      		push	bx
 12672 00001222 BB4000                  		mov	bx, 40h		; fchanged
 12673                                  					; Update flag in BDS for this
 12674                                  					; physical drive
 12675 00001225 E8C206                  		call	set_changed_dl
 12676 00001228 5B                      		pop	bx
 12677                                  ChangeLnChkRet:				
 12678 00001229 C3                      		retn
 12679                                  
 12680                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12681                                  
 12682                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12683                                  
 12684                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12685                                  ;	GetAccessFlag
 12686                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12687                                  ;
 12688                                  ; FUNCTION: get the status of UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12689                                  ;
 12690                                  ; INPUT :
 12691                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12692                                  ;
 12693                                  ; OUTPUT:   a_DiskAccess_Control.dac_access_flag = 0 if disk i/o not allowed.
 12694                                  ;						 = 1 if disk i/o allowed.
 12695                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12696                                  
 12697                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12698                                  GetAccessFlag:				
 12699 0000122A C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header
 12700 0000122E C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12701                                  		;mov	al, 0		; Assume result	is unformatted
 12702                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12703 00001231 28C0                    		sub	al, al
 12704                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12705 00001233 26F6452402              		test	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12706                                  		;test	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12707                                  					; unformatted_media
 12708 00001238 7502                    		jnz	short GafDone	; Done if unformatted
 12709 0000123A FEC0                    		inc	al		; Return true for formatted
 12710                                  
 12711                                  GafDone:				
 12712 0000123C 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12713 0000123F C3                      		retn
 12714                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12715                                  
 12716                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12717                                  
 12718                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12719                                  ;	SetAccessFlag
 12720                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12721                                  ;
 12722                                  ; function: set/reset the UNFORMATTED_MEDIA bit of flags in bds table
 12723                                  ;
 12724                                  ; input :
 12725                                  ;	    ES:di -> bds table
 12726                                  ;
 12727                                  ; output:   unformtted_media bit modified according to the user request
 12728                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12729                                  
 12730                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12731                                  SetAccessFlag:				
 12732 00001240 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX	points to request header
 12733 00001244 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; [bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12734                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12735 00001247 26806524FD              		and	byte [es:di+36], 0FDh
 12736                                  		;and	word [es:di+35], 0FDFFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12737                                  					; ~unformatted_media
 12738 0000124C 807F0100                		cmp	byte [bx+1], 0	; [bx+A_DISKACCESS_CONTROL.DAC_ACCESS_FLAG]
 12739 00001250 7505                    		jnz	short saf_Done
 12740                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12741 00001252 26804D2402              		or	byte [es:di+36], 02h
 12742                                  		;or	word [es:di+35], 200h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 12743                                  					; unformatted_media
 12744                                  saf_Done:				
 12745 00001257 C3                      		retn
 12746                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12747                                  
 12748                                  ; 16/10/2022
 12749                                  
 12750                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12751                                  ; Ioctl_Support_Query
 12752                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12753                                  ;
 12754                                  ; New device command which was added in DOS 5.00 to allow a query of a 
 12755                                  ; specific GENERIC IOCtl to see if it is supported. Bit 7 in the
 12756                                  ; device attributes specifies if this function is supported.
 12757                                  ;
 12758                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12759                                  
 12760                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12761                                  ioctl_support_query:
 12762 00001258 06                      		push	es
 12763 00001259 C41E[1200]              		les	bx, [ptrsav]	; ES:BX Points to request header.
 12764 0000125D 268B470D                		mov	ax, [es:bx+13]	; [es:bx+IOCTL_REQ.MAJORFUNCTION]
 12765                                  					; AL ==	Major, AH == Minor
 12766 00001261 3C08                    		cmp	al, 8		; IOC_DC
 12767                                  					; See if major code is 8
 12768 00001263 7513                    		jnz	short nosupport
 12769 00001265 0E                      		push	cs
 12770 00001266 07                      		pop	es
 12771 00001267 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; IOC_DC_TABLE_LEN
 12772                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12773 0000126A BF[3B0C]                		mov	di, IOC_DC_Table
 12774                                  		;mov	di, 0C60h	; IOC_DC_Table
 12775                                  					; at 2C7h:0C60h	= 70h:31D0h
 12776 0000126D 86C4                    		xchg	al, ah		; Put minor code in AL
 12777 0000126F F2AE                    		repne scasb		; Scan for minor code in AL
 12778 00001271 7505                    		jnz	short nosupport	; it was not found
 12779 00001273 B80001                  		mov	ax, 100h
 12780                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12781                                  		; (jump to ioctlsupexit is not required)
 12782                                  		;jmp	short $+2	; ioctlsupexit
 12783                                  					; Signal ioctl is supported
 12784                                  		;;jmp	short ioctlsupexit
 12785                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12786                                  ioctlsupexit:				
 12787 00001276 07                      		pop	es
 12788                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12789                                  		; cf = 0
 12790                                  		;clc
 12791 00001277 C3                      		retn
 12792                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12793                                  nosupport:				
 12794 00001278 07                      		pop	es
 12795 00001279 E959EE                  		jmp	bc_cmderr
 12796                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12797                                  
 12798                                  ; 16/10/2022

 12800                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12801                                  ;	GetMediaSenseStatus
 12802                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12803                                  ;
 12804                                  ; FUNCTION: Will return the type of diskette media in the specified DOS
 12805                                  ;	    diskette drive and whether the media is the default type
 12806                                  ;	    for that drive. (default type means the max size for that
 12807                                  ;	    drive)
 12808                                  ;
 12809                                  ; INPUT :   ES:DI -> BDS table
 12810                                  ; OUTPUT:   If carry clear
 12811                                  ;	    DS:BX -> Updated IOCtlPacket
 12812                                  ;
 12813                                  ;			 Special Function at offset 0:
 12814                                  ;				0	- Media detected is not default type
 12815                                  ;				1	- Media detected is default type
 12816                                  ;
 12817                                  ;			 Device Type at offset 1:
 12818                                  ;				2       - 720K 3.5" 80 tracks
 12819                                  ;				7	- 1.44M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12820                                  ;				9	- 2.88M 3.5" 80 tracks
 12821                                  ;
 12822                                  ; Error Codes returned in AX if carry set:
 12823                                  ;
 12824                                  ; 8102 - Drive not ready	- No disk is in the drive.
 12825                                  ; 8107 - Unknown media type	- Drive doesn't support this function or
 12826                                  ;				  the media is really unkown, any error
 12827                                  ;				  other than "media not present"
 12828                                  ; 
 12829                                  ; ==========================================================================
 12830                                  
 12831                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12832                                  SenseMediaType:				
 12833 0000127C C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]	; DS:BX	points to request header.
 12834 00001280 C55F13                  		lds	bx, [bx+19]	; bx+IOCTL_REQ.GENERICIOCTL_PACKET]
 12835                                  		; 10/10/2022
 12836                                  		;mov	word [bx], 0	; Initialize the 2 packet bytes
 12837 00001283 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 12838 00001285 8917                    		mov	[bx], dx ; 0
 12839                                  		;
 12840 00001287 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 12841                                  					; Get int 13h drive number from	BDS
 12842                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12843                                  		;xor	dh, dh		; DX = physical	drive number
 12844 0000128B B420                    		mov	ah, 20h		; Get Media Type function
 12845                                  					; If no	carry media type in AL
 12846 0000128D CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - QCACHE	- DISMOUNT
 12847 0000128F 7216                    		jb	short MediaSenseEr ; error code	in AH
 12848 00001291 FE07                    		inc	byte [bx]	; Signal media type is default (bit 1)
 12849                                  DetermineMediaType:			
 12850 00001293 FEC8                    		dec	al
 12851 00001295 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; Chk for 720K ie: (3-1) = 2
 12852 00001297 740A                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12853 00001299 0404                    		add	al, 4
 12854 0000129B 3C07                    		cmp	al, 7		; Chk for 1.44M ie: (4-1+4) = 7
 12855 0000129D 7404                    		jz	short GotMediaType
 12856 0000129F 3C09                    		cmp	al, 9		; Chk for 2.88M	ie: (6-1+4) = 9
 12857 000012A1 7510                    		jnz	short UnknownMediaType ; Just didn't recognize media type
 12858                                  GotMediaType:				
 12859 000012A3 884701                  		mov	[bx+1],	al	; Save the return value
 12860                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12861                                  		; cf = 0
 12862                                  		;clc			; Signal success
 12863 000012A6 C3                      		retn
 12864                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12865                                  
 12866                                  MediaSenseEr:				
 12867 000012A7 80FC32                  		cmp	ah, 32h		; See if not default media error
 12868 000012AA 74E7                    		jz	short DetermineMediaType ; Not really an error
 12869 000012AC B002                    		mov	al, 2		; Now assume drive not ready
 12870 000012AE 80FC31                  		cmp	ah, 31h		; See if media was present
 12871 000012B1 7402                    		jz	short SenseErrExit ; Return drive not ready
 12872                                  UnknownMediaType:			
 12873 000012B3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; Just don't know the media type
 12874                                  SenseErrExit:				
 12875 000012B5 B481                    		mov	ah, 81h		; Signal error return
 12876 000012B7 F9                      		stc
 12877 000012B8 C3                      		retn
 12878                                  
 12879                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12880                                  		; 10/12/2022
 12881                                  		;db    0
 12882                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12883                                  
 12884                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 12885                                  
 12886                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12887                                  ; MSINT13.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 12888                                  ;-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12889                                  ; 16/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 12890                                  
 12891                                  ;	int 2f function 13h allows the user to change the orig13 int_13 vector
 12892                                  ;	after booting. this allows testing and implementation of custom int_13
 12893                                  ;	handlers, without giving up ms-dos error recovery
 12894                                  ;	entry:	ds:dx	== addr. of new int_13 handler
 12895                                  ;		es:bx	== addr. of new int_13 vector used by warm boot (int19)
 12896                                  ;	exit:	orig13	== address of new int_13 handler
 12897                                  ;		ds:dx	== old orig13 value
 12898                                  ;		es:bx	== old old13  value
 12899                                  ;
 12900                                  ; int 2f handler for external block drivers to communicate with the internal
 12901                                  ; block driver in msdisk. the multiplex number chosen is 8. the handler
 12902                                  ; sets up the pointer to the request packet in [ptrsav] and then jumps to
 12903                                  ; dsk_entry, the entry point for all disk requests.
 12904                                  ;
 12905                                  ; on exit from this driver, we will return to the external driver
 12906                                  ; that issued this int 2f, and can then remove the flags from the stack.
 12907                                  ; this scheme allows us to have a small external device driver, and makes
 12908                                  ; the maintainance of the various drivers (driver and msbio) much easier,
 12909                                  ; since we only need to make changes in one place (most of the time).
 12910                                  ;
 12911                                  ;   ax=800h - check for installed handler - reserved
 12912                                  ;   ax=801h - install the bds into the linked list
 12913                                  ;   ax=802h - dos request
 12914                                  ;   ax=803h - return bds table starting pointer in ds:di
 12915                                  ;	   (ems device driver hooks int 13h to handle 16kb dma overrun
 12916                                  ;	    problem. bds table is going to be used to get head/sector
 12917                                  ;	    informations without calling generic ioctl get device parm call.)
 12918                                  
 12919                                  ;BIOSSEGMENT equ 70h
 12920                                  DOSBIOSSEG equ 0070h ; 17/10/2022	
 12921                                  
 12922                                  ;;BIOSCODE:1302h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 12923                                  
 12924                                  i2f_handler:				; here is 02C7h:1302h =	0070h:3872h
 12925 000012B9 80FC13                  		cmp	ah, 13h
 12926 000012BC 7413                    		jz	short int2f_replace_int13
 12927 000012BE 80FC08                  		cmp	ah, 8
 12928 000012C1 743B                    		jz	short mine
 12929                                  
 12930                                  ; Check for WIN386 startup and return the BIOS instance data
 12931                                  
 12932 000012C3 80FC16                  		cmp	ah, 16h		; MultWin386
 12933 000012C6 7479                    		jz	short win386call
 12934 000012C8 80FC4A                  		cmp	ah, 4Ah		; multMULT
 12935 000012CB 7503                    		jnz	short i2f_handler_iret
 12936 000012CD E9A500                  		jmp	handle_multmult
 12937                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12938                                  
 12939                                  i2f_handler_iret:			
 12940 000012D0 CF                      		iret
 12941                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12942                                  
 12943                                  int2f_replace_int13:			
 12944 000012D1 50                      		push	ax	; free up a register for caller's ds
 12945 000012D2 8CD8                    		mov	ax, ds	; then we can use ds: -> Bios_Data
 12946                                  		;;mov	ds, word [cs:0030h] ; 15/10/2022	
 12947                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:0030h]
 12948                                  					; = [02C7h:0030h] = [0070h:25A0h]
 12949 000012D4 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022
 12950                                  		; 19/10/2022
 12951                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13	; save old value of old13 and
 12952                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Orig13+2	; orig13 so that we can
 12953                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13	; return them to caller
 12954                                  		;push	word ptr ds:Old13+2
 12955 000012D9 FF36[B400]              		push	word [Orig13]
 12956 000012DD FF36[B600]              		push	word [Orig13+2]
 12957 000012E1 FF36[0601]              		push	word [Old13]
 12958 000012E5 FF36[0801]              		push	word [Old13+2]
 12959                                  
 12960                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13, dx	; orig13 := addr. of new int_13
 12961                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Orig13+2, ax
 12962                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13, bx	; old13 := addr. of new boot_13
 12963                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:Old13+2, es
 12964 000012E9 8916[B400]              		mov	[Orig13], dx
 12965 000012ED A3[B600]                		mov	[Orig13+2], ax
 12966 000012F0 891E[0601]              		mov	[Old13], bx
 12967 000012F4 8C06[0801]              		mov	[Old13+2], es
 12968                                  
 12969 000012F8 07                      		pop	es			; es:bx := old old13 vector
 12970 000012F9 5B                      		pop	bx
 12971 000012FA 1F                      		pop	ds			; ds:dx := old orig13 vector
 12972 000012FB 5A                      		pop	dx
 12973 000012FC 58                      		pop	ax
 12974                                  i2f_iret:				
 12975 000012FD CF                      		iret
 12976                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12977                                  
 12978                                  mine:					
 12979 000012FE 3CF8                    		cmp	al, 0F8h 		; iret on reserved functions
 12980 00001300 73FB                    		jnb	short i2f_iret
 12981 00001302 08C0                    		or	al, al			; a get installed state request?
 12982 00001304 7504                    		jnz	short disp_func
 12983 00001306 B0FF                    		mov	al, 0FFh
 12984 00001308 EBF3                    		jmp	short i2f_iret
 12985                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 12986                                  
 12987                                  disp_func:				
 12988 0000130A 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1			; request for installing bds?
 12989 0000130C 7418                    		jz	short do_subfun_01
 12990 0000130E 3C03                    		cmp	al, 3			; get bds vector?
 12991 00001310 7424                    		jz	short do_get_bds_vector
 12992                                  
 12993                                  ; set up pointer to request packet
 12994                                  
 12995 00001312 1E                      		push	ds
 12996 00001313 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD] ; 17/10/2022	
 12997                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 12998                                  					; = [0070h:25A0h] = [02C7h:0030h]
 12999                                  		; 19/10/2022
 13000                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav, bx
 13001                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:ptrsav+2, es
 13002 00001318 891E[1200]              		mov	[ptrsav], bx
 13003 0000131C 8C06[1400]              		mov	[ptrsav+2], es
 13004 00001320 1F                      		pop	ds
 13005                                  		;jmp	far ptr	i2f_dskentry
 13006                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13007                                  		;jmp	far DOSBIOSSEG:dsk_entry		
 13008 00001321 EA[9608]7000            		jmp	DOSBIOSSEG:i2f_dskentry ; 70h:i2f_dskentry
 13009                                  					; NOTE: jump to a FAR function, not an
 13010                                  					;  IRET type function. Callers of
 13011                                  					;  this int2f subfunction will have
 13012                                  					;  to be careful to do a popf
 13013                                  
 13014                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13015                                  
 13016                                  do_subfun_01:				
 13017 00001326 06                      		push	es
 13018 00001327 1E                      		push	ds
 13019 00001328 1E                      		push	ds
 13020 00001329 07                      		pop	es
 13021                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13022 0000132A 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]	
 13023                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13024                                  					; point	ds: -> Bios_Data
 13025 0000132F E8C303                  		call	install_bds
 13026 00001332 1F                      		pop	ds
 13027 00001333 07                      		pop	es
 13028 00001334 EBC7                    		jmp	short i2f_iret
 13029                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13030                                  
 13031                                  do_get_bds_vector:
 13032                                  		; 17/10/2022
 13033 00001336 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]			
 13034                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13035 0000133B C53E[1901]              		lds	di, [start_bds]
 13036                                  		;lds	di, ds:start_bds
 13037                                  ;ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022				
 13038 0000133F EBBC                    		jmp	short i2f_iret
 13039                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13040                                  
 13041                                  ; 17/10/2022
 13042                                  ; 16/10/2022
 13043                                  
 13044                                  ; WIN386 startup stuff is done here. If starting up we set our WIN386 present
 13045                                  ; flag and return instance data. If exiting, we reset the WIN386 present flag
 13046                                  ; NOTE: We assume that the BIOS int 2fh is at the bottom of the chain.
 13047                                  
 13048                                  win386call:				
 13049 00001341 1E                      		push	ds
 13050 00001342 2E8E1E[3000]            		mov	ds, [cs:BIOSDATAWORD]
 13051                                  		;mov	ds, word ptr cs:BIOSDATAWORD ; [cs:Bios_Data_Word]
 13052                                  					; at 2C7h:30h =	70h:25A0h
 13053 00001347 3C05                    		cmp	al, 5		; Win386_Init
 13054                                  					; is it	win386 initializing?
 13055 00001349 7410                    		jz	short Win386Init
 13056 0000134B 3C06                    		cmp	al, 6		; Win386_Exit
 13057                                  					; is it	win386 exiting?
 13058 0000134D 7523                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not, continue int2f chain
 13059                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13060 0000134F F6C201                  		test	dl, 1
 13061                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it	win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13062 00001352 751E                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13063                                  		;and	ds:IsWin386, 0	; indicate that	win386 is not present  
 13064 00001354 8026[CE08]00            		and	byte [IsWin386], 0 
 13065 00001359 EB17                    		jmp	short win_iret
 13066                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13067                                  
 13068                                  Win386Init:	
 13069                                  		; 12/12/2022
 13070 0000135B F6C201                  		test	dl, 1			
 13071                                  		;test	dx, 1		; is it win386 or win286 dos extender?
 13072 0000135E 7512                    		jnz	short win_iret	; if not win386, then continue
 13073                                  		;or	ds:IsWin386, 1	; Indicate WIN386 present
 13074 00001360 800E[CE08]01            		or	byte [IsWin386], 1
 13075                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next, bx	; Hook our structure into chain
 13076                                  		;mov	word ptr ds:SI_Next+2, es
 13077 00001365 891E[9C08]              		mov	[SI_Next], bx
 13078 00001369 8C06[9E08]              		mov	[SI_Next+2], es
 13079                                  		;mov	bx, offset Win386_SI ; point ES:BX to Win386_SI
 13080 0000136D BB[9A08]                		mov	bx, Win386_SI	; 19/10/2022
 13081 00001370 1E                      		push	ds
 13082 00001371 07                      		pop	es
 13083                                  win_iret:				
 13084 00001372 1F                      		pop	ds
 13085                                  ii2f_iret:	; 10/12/2022	
 13086 00001373 EB88                    		jmp	short i2f_iret	; return back up the chain
 13087                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13088                                  
 13089                                  handle_multmult:			
 13090 00001375 3C01                    		cmp	al, 1
 13091 00001377 7515                    		jnz	short try_2
 13092 00001379 1E                      		push	ds
 13093 0000137A E84700                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13094                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13095                                  		;xor	bx, bx
 13096                                  		;dec	bx
 13097 0000137D BBFFFF                  		mov	bx, 0FFFFh
 13098 00001380 8EC3                    		mov	es, bx		; seg of HMA
 13099 00001382 89FB                    		mov	bx, di
 13100 00001384 F7D3                    		not	bx
 13101 00001386 09DB                    		or	bx, bx
 13102 00001388 7401                    		jz	short try_1
 13103 0000138A 43                      		inc	bx
 13104                                  try_1:					
 13105 0000138B 1F                      		pop	ds
 13106 0000138C EBE5                    		jmp	short ii2f_iret
 13107                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13108                                  
 13109                                  try_2:					
 13110 0000138E 3C02                    		cmp	al, 2		; multMULTALLOCHMA
 13111 00001390 7530                    		jnz	short try_3
 13112 00001392 1E                      		push	ds
 13113                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13114                                  		;xor	di, di
 13115                                  		;dec	di
 13116 00001393 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh	; assume not enough space
 13117 00001396 8EC7                    		mov	es, di
 13118 00001398 E82900                  		call	HMAPtr		; get offset of free HMA
 13119 0000139B 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 13120 0000139E 7421                    		jz	short InsuffHMA
 13121 000013A0 F7DF                    		neg	di		; free space in HMA
 13122 000013A2 39FB                    		cmp	bx, di
 13123 000013A4 7605                    		jbe	short try_4
 13124                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13125                                  		;sub	di, di
 13126                                  		;dec	di
 13127 000013A6 BFFFFF                  		mov	di, 0FFFFh
 13128 000013A9 EB16                    		jmp	short InsuffHMA
 13129                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13130                                  
 13131                                  try_4:					
 13132                                  		;mov	di, ds:FreeHMAPtr
 13133 000013AB 8B3E[F508]              		mov	di, [FreeHMAPtr]
 13134 000013AF 83C30F                  		add	bx, 15
 13135                                  		;and	bx, 0FFF0h
 13136                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13137 000013B2 80E3F0                  		and	bl, 0F0h
 13138                                  		;add	ds:FreeHMAPtr, bx ; update the free pointer	
 13139 000013B5 011E[F508]              		add	[FreeHMAPtr], bx
 13140 000013B9 7506                    		jnz	short InsuffHMA
 13141 000013BB C706[F508]FFFF          		mov	word [FreeHMAPtr], 0FFFFh ; -1
 13142                                  		;mov	ds:FreeHMAPtr, 0FFFFh
 13143                                  					; no more HMA if we have wrapped
 13144                                  InsuffHMA:				
 13145 000013C1 1F                      		pop	ds
 13146                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13147                                  try_3:		
 13148 000013C2 EBAF                    		jmp	short ii2f_iret
 13149                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 13150                                  
 13151                                  		; 10/12/2022
 13152                                  ;try_3:					
 13153                                  		;jmp	ii2f_iret
