 14192                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14193                                  
 14194                                  ; 16/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 14195                                  
 14196                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14197                                  ; include msbio.cl2 (MSDOS 6.0, 1991)
 14198                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14199                                  ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS BIOSCODE:17D5h)
 14200                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------
 14201                                  ; 17/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 14202                                  
 14203                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D38h or 02C7h:17C8h
 14204 0000176F 0D0A                    sngmsg:		db 0Dh,0Ah
 14205 00001771 496E73657274206469-     		db 'Insert diskette for drive '
 14205 0000177A 736B6574746520666F-
 14205 00001783 7220647269766520   
 14206                                  
 14207                                  		; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS offset 0070h:3D54h or 02C7h:17E4h
 14208 0000178B 413A20616E64207072-     drvlet:		db 'A: and press any key when ready',0Dh,0Ah
 14208 00001794 65737320616E79206B-
 14208 0000179D 6579207768656E2072-
 14208 000017A6 656164790D0A       
 14209 000017AC 0A00                    		db 0Ah,0
 14210                                  
 14211                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14212                                  
 14213                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14214                                  ; input : es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14215                                  ; return : zero set if no open files
 14216                                  ;	   zero reset if open files
 14217                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14218                                  
 14219                                  chkopcnt:		
 14220 000017AE 26837D2000              		cmp	word [es:di+20h], 0 ; [es:di+BDS.opcnt]
 14221 000017B3 C3                      		retn
 14222                                  
 14223                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14224                                  
 14225                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14226                                  ; at media check time, we need to really get down and check what the change is.
 14227                                  ; this is guaranteed to be expensive.
 14228                                  ;
 14229                                  ;	es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14230                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14231                                  
 14232                                  mediacheck:	
 14233 000017B4 E885F0                  		call	checksingle	; make sure correct disk is in place
 14234 000017B7 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14235 000017B9 E85501                  		call	haschange
 14236 000017BC 742F                    		jz	short mediaret
 14237 000017BE E84401                  		call	checkromchange
 14238 000017C1 752B                    		jnz	short mediadovolid
 14239 000017C3 50                      		push	ax
 14240 000017C4 52                      		push	dx
 14241 000017C5 268A5504                		mov	dl, [es:di+4]	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14242                                  					; set logical drive number
 14243 000017C9 B416                    		mov	ah, 16h
 14244 000017CB CD13                    		int	13h		; DISK - FLOPPY	DISK - CHANGE OF DISK STATUS (AT,XT2,XT286,CONV,PS)
 14245                                  					; DL = drive to	check
 14246                                  					; Return: AH = disk change status
 14247 000017CD 5A                      		pop	dx
 14248 000017CE 58                      		pop	ax
 14249 000017CF 721D                    		jb	short mediadovolid
 14250 000017D1 BE0100                  		mov	si, 1		; signal no change
 14251                                  
 14252                                  ; there are some drives with changeline that "lose" the changeline indication
 14253                                  ; if a different drive is accessed after the current one. in order to avoid
 14254                                  ; missing a media change, we return an "i don't know" to dos if the changeline
 14255                                  ; is not active and we are accessing a different drive from the last one.
 14256                                  ; if we are accessing the same drive, then we can safely rely on the changeline
 14257                                  ; status.
 14258                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14259 000017D4 8A1E[1E01]              		mov	bl, [tim_drv]	; get last drive accessed
 14260 000017D8 26385D04                		cmp	[es:di+4], bl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14261                                  					; (If the last drive accessed is not current drive
 14262                                  					; media	change status may be incorrect.	So,
 14263                                  					; "I don't now" will be returned even if it is indicated
 14264                                  					; as media is not changed.)
 14265 000017DC 740F                    		jz	short mediaret	; (same	drive,
 14266                                  					; media	changeline indication is reliable)
 14267                                  
 14268                                  ; do the 2 second twiddle. if time >= 2 seconds, do a volid check.
 14269                                  ; otherwise return "i don't know" (strictly speaking, we should return a
 14270                                  ; "not changed" here since the 2 second test said no change.)
 14271                                  
 14272 000017DE 50                      		push	ax
 14273 000017DF 51                      		push	cx
 14274 000017E0 52                      		push	dx
 14275 000017E1 E86FED                  		call	Check_Time_Of_Access
 14276 000017E4 5A                      		pop	dx
 14277 000017E5 59                      		pop	cx
 14278 000017E6 58                      		pop	ax
 14279 000017E7 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14280 000017E9 7403                    		jz	short mediadovolid ; check_time	says ">= 2 secs	passed"
 14281                                  					; (volume id will be checked)
 14282 000017EB 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; return "i don't know"
 14283                                  mediaret:				
 14284 000017ED C3                      		retn
 14285                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14286                                  
 14287                                  ; somehow the media was changed. look at vid to see. we do not look at fat
 14288                                  ; because this may be different since we only set medbyt when doing a read
 14289                                  ; or write.
 14290                                  
 14291                                  mediadovolid:				
 14292 000017EE E807EE                  		call	GetBp		; build	a new bpb in current bds
 14293 000017F1 72FA                    		jb	short mediaret
 14294 000017F3 E82D00                  		call	check_vid
 14295 000017F6 73F5                    		jnb	short mediaret
 14296 000017F8 E9D6F3                  		jmp	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14297                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14298                                  
 14299                                  ; simple, quick check of latched change. if no indication, then return
 14300                                  ; otherwise do expensive check. if the expensive test fails, pop off the
 14301                                  ; return and set al = 15 (for invalid media change) which will be returned to
 14302                                  ; dos.
 14303                                  ;
 14304                                  ; for dos 3.3, this will work only for the drive that has changeline.
 14305                                  
 14306                                  ;	call with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14307                                  ;	***** warning:  this routine will return one level up on the stack
 14308                                  ;			if an error occurs!
 14309                                  
 14310                                  checklatchio:	
 14311                                  
 14312                                  ; if returning fake bpb then assume the disk has not changed
 14313                                  			
 14314 000017FB E8B0FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14315 000017FE 741B                    		jz	short checkret	; done if zero
 14316                                  
 14317                                  ; check for past rom indications. if no rom change indicated, then return ok.
 14318                                  
 14319 00001800 E80201                  		call	checkromchange
 14320 00001803 7416                    		jz	short checkret
 14321                                  
 14322                                  ; we now see that a change line has been seen in the past. let's do the
 14323                                  ; expensive verification.
 14324                                  
 14325 00001805 E8F0ED                  		call	GetBp		; build	bpb in current bds
 14326 00001808 720F                    		jb	short ret_no_error_map ; getbp has already called maperror
 14327 0000180A E81600                  		call	check_vid
 14328 0000180D 7207                    		jb	short checklatchret ; disk error trying	to read	in.
 14329 0000180F 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14330 00001811 7908                    		jns	short checkret
 14331 00001813 E87D00                  		call	returnvid
 14332                                  checklatchret:				
 14333 00001816 E8B8F3                  		call	maperror	; fix up al for	return to dos
 14334                                  ret_no_error_map:			
 14335 00001819 F9                      		stc
 14336 0000181A 5E                      		pop	si		; pop off return address
 14337                                  checkret:				
 14338 0000181B C3                      		retn
 14339                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14340                                  
 14341                                  ; check the fat and the vid. return in di -1 or 0. return with carry set
 14342                                  ; only if there was a disk error. return that error code in ax.
 14343                                  ;
 14344                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> Bios_Data
 14345                                  
 14346                                  checkfatvid:				
 14347 0000181C E8CD01                  		call	fat_check	; check	the fat	and the	vid
 14348 0000181F 09F6                    		or	si, si
 14349 00001821 7827                    		js	short changed_drv ;
 14350                                  
 14351                                  ; the fat was the same. fall into check_vid and check volume id.
 14352                                  
 14353                                  		; fall into check_vid
 14354                                  
 14355                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14356                                  
 14357                                  ; now with the extended boot record, the logic should be enhanced.
 14358                                  ;
 14359                                  ; if it is the extended boot record, then we check the volume serial
 14360                                  ; number instead of volume id. if it is different, then set si to -1.
 14361                                  ;
 14362                                  ; if it is same, then si= 1 (no change).
 14363                                  ;
 14364                                  ; if it is not the extended boot record, then just follows the old
 14365                                  ; logic. dos 4.00 will check if the # of fat in the boot record bpb
 14366                                  ; is not 0.  if it is 0 then it must be non_fat based system and
 14367                                  ; should have already covered by extended boot structure checking.
 14368                                  ; so, we will return "i don't know" by setting si to 0.
 14369                                  ;
 14370                                  ; this routine assume the newest valid boot record is in cs:[disksector].
 14371                                  ; (this will be gauranteed by a successful getbp call right before this
 14372                                  ; routine.)
 14373                                  ;
 14374                                  ;	called with es:di -> bds, ds -> bds
 14375                                  
 14376                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14377                                  check_vid:
 14378                                  
 14379                                  ; check the disksector.EXT_BOOT_SIG variable for the extended
 14380                                  ; boot signature. if it is set then go to do the extended
 14381                                  ; id check otherwise continue with code below
 14382                                  
 14383 00001823 803E[7401]29            		cmp	byte [disksector+26h], 29h
 14384                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.SIG],
 14385                                  					; EXT_BOOT_SIGNATURE
 14386 00001828 7427                    		jz	short do_ext_check_id
 14387 0000182A E8E400                  		call	haschange
 14388 0000182D 74EC                    		jz	short checkret
 14389 0000182F 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14390 00001831 803E[5E01]00            		cmp	byte [disksector+10h], 0 
 14391                                  					; [disksector+EXT_BOOT.BPB+EBPB.NUMBEROFFATS]
 14392 00001836 7411                    		jz	short checkfatret ; don't read vol id
 14393                                  					; if not fat system
 14394 00001838 E8F600                  		call	read_volume_id
 14395 0000183B 720C                    		jb	short checkfatret
 14396 0000183D E89B01                  		call	check_volume_id
 14397 00001840 BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14398                                  					; definitely changed
 14399 00001843 7505                    		jnz	short changed_drv
 14400                                  
 14401 00001845 46                      		inc	si		; not changed
 14402                                  vid_no_changed:				
 14403 00001846 E8C200                  		call	resetchanged
 14404                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14405                                  		; cf=0 ('and' instruction in 'resetchanged' clears cf) 
 14406                                  		;clc
 14407                                  checkfatret:				
 14408 00001849 C3                      		retn
 14409                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14410                                  
 14411                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14412                                  changed_drv:
 14413 0000184A F8                      		clc			; cas -- return	no error
 14414 0000184B C606[1E01]FF            		mov	byte  [tim_drv], 0FFh 
 14415                                  					; ensure that we ask rom for media
 14416 00001850 C3                      		retn			; check	next time round
 14417                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14418                                  
 14419                                  ; extended id check
 14420                                  
 14421                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14422                                  
 14423                                  ; the code to check extended id is basically a check to see if the
 14424                                  ; volume serial number is still the same. the volume serial number
 14425                                  ; previously read is in cs:disksector.EXT_BOOT_SERIAL
 14426                                  ; ds:di points to the bds of the drive under consideration.
 14427                                  ; the bds has fields containing the high and low words 
 14428                                  ; of the volume serial number of the media in the drive.
 14429                                  ; compare these fields to the fields mentioned above. if these fields
 14430                                  ; do not match the media has changed and so we should jump to the code
 14431                                  ; starting at ext_changed else return "i don't know" status
 14432                                  ; in the register used for the changeline status and continue executing
 14433                                  ; the code given below. for temporary storage use the register which
 14434                                  ; has been saved and restored around this block.
 14435                                  ;
 14436                                  ; bds fields in inc\msbds.inc
 14437                                  
 14438                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14439                                  do_ext_check_id:			
 14440 00001851 50                      		push	ax
 14441                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr ds:disksector+27h
 14442                                  					; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL]
 14443 00001852 A1[7501]                		mov	ax, [disksector+27h]
 14444 00001855 263B4557                		cmp	ax, [es:di+57h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial]
 14445 00001859 750E                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14446 0000185B A1[7701]                		mov	ax, [disksector+29h] ; [DiskSector+EXT_BOOT.SERIAL+2]
 14447 0000185E 263B4559                		cmp	ax, [es:di+59h]	; [di+BDS.vol_serial+2]
 14448 00001862 7505                    		jnz	short ext_changed
 14449 00001864 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; 0
 14450                                  					; don't know
 14451 00001866 58                      		pop	ax
 14452 00001867 EBDD                    		jmp	short vid_no_changed
 14453                                  					; reset the flag
 14454                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14455                                  
 14456                                  ext_changed:				
 14457 00001869 58                      		pop	ax
 14458 0000186A BEFFFF                  		mov	si, 0FFFFh	; -1
 14459                                  					; disk changed!
 14460                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14461                                  		; ('changed_drv' clears cf)
 14462                                  		;clc
 14463 0000186D EBDB                    		jmp	short changed_drv
 14464                                  
 14465                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14466                                  
 14467                                  ; at i/o time, we detected the error. now we need to determine whether the
 14468                                  ; media was truly changed or not. we return normally if media change unknown.
 14469                                  ; and we pop off the call and jmp to harderr if we see an error.
 14470                                  ;
 14471                                  ; es:di -> bds
 14472                                  
 14473                                  checkio:				
 14474 0000186F 80FC06                  		cmp	ah, 6
 14475 00001872 75D5                    		jnz	short checkfatret
 14476 00001874 E837FF                  		call	chkopcnt
 14477 00001877 74D0                    		jz	short checkfatret
 14478 00001879 E87CED                  		call	GetBp
 14479 0000187C 7212                    		jb	short no_error_map
 14480 0000187E E89BFF                  		call	checkfatvid
 14481 00001881 7209                    		jb	short checkioret ; disk	error trying to	read in.
 14482 00001883 09F6                    		or	si, si		; is changed for sure?
 14483 00001885 7802                    		js	short checkioerr ; yes changed
 14484 00001887 45                      		inc	bp		; allow	a retry
 14485 00001888 C3                      		retn
 14486                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14487                                  
 14488                                  checkioerr:				
 14489 00001889 E80700                  		call	returnvid
 14490                                  
 14491                                  checkioret:				
 14492 0000188C F9                      		stc			; make sure carry gets passed through
 14493 0000188D E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr
 14494                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14495                                  
 14496                                  no_error_map:				
 14497 00001890 E9F1F2                  		jmp	harderr2
 14498                                  
 14499                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14500                                  
 14501                                  ; return vid sets up the vid for a return to dos.
 14502                                  ;  es:di -> bds, returns pointer in packet to bds_volid
 14503                                  ;  **** trashes si! ****
 14504                                  
 14505                                  returnvid:		
 14506 00001893 BE1600                  		mov	si, 22		; extra
 14507                                  					; offset into pointer to return	value
 14508 00001896 E80700                  		call	vid_into_packet
 14509 00001899 B406                    		mov	ah, 6
 14510 0000189B F9                      		stc
 14511 0000189C C3                      		retn
 14512                                  
 14513                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14514                                  
 14515                                  ; moves the pointer to the volid for the drive into the original request packet
 14516                                  ; no attempt is made to preserve registers.
 14517                                  ;
 14518                                  ; assumes es:di -> bds
 14519                                  ; **trashes si**
 14520                                  
 14521                                  media_set_vid:				
 14522 0000189D BE0F00                  		mov	si, 15		; trans+1
 14523                                  					; return the value here	in packet
 14524                                  
 14525                                  		; fall into vid_into_packet
 14526                                  
 14527                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14528                                  
 14529                                  ; return pointer to vid in bds at es:di in packet[si]
 14530                                  
 14531                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14532                                  vid_into_packet:
 14533 000018A0 1E                      		push	ds		; return pointer to vid	in bds at es:di	in packet[si]
 14534 000018A1 C51E[1200]              		lds	bx, [ptrsav]
 14535 000018A5 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14536 000018A8 8938                    		mov	[bx+si], di
 14537 000018AA 83EF4B                  		sub	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14538 000018AD 8C4002                  		mov	[bx+si+2], es
 14539 000018B0 1F                      		pop	ds
 14540                                  dofloppy:	; 18/12/2022
 14541 000018B1 C3                      		retn
 14542                                  
 14543                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14544                                  
 14545                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14546                                  ;   hidensity - examine a drive/media descriptor to set the media type. if
 14547                                  ;   the media descriptor is not f9 (not 96tpi or 3 1/2), we return and let the
 14548                                  ;   caller do the rest. otherwise, we pop off the return and jump to the tail
 14549                                  ;   of getbp. for 3.5" media, we just return.
 14550                                  ;
 14551                                  ;   inputs:	es:di point to correct bds for this drive
 14552                                  ;		ah has media byte
 14553                                  ;
 14554                                  ;   outputs:	carry clear
 14555                                  ;		    no registers modified
 14556                                  ;		carry set
 14557                                  ;		    al = sectors/fat
 14558                                  ;		    bh = number of root directory entries
 14559                                  ;		    bl = sectors per track
 14560                                  ;		    cx = number of sectors
 14561                                  ;		    dh = sectors per allocation unit
 14562                                  ;		    dl = number of heads
 14563                                  ;
 14564                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14565                                  
 14566                                  hidensity:
 14567                                  
 14568                                  ; check for correct drive
 14569                                  		
 14570                                  		; 12/12/2022
 14571 000018B2 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14572                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; is it special?	
 14573                                  					; [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline
 14574 000018B7 74F8                    		jz	short dofloppy	; no, do normal floppy test
 14575                                  
 14576                                  ; we have a media byte that is pretty complex. examine drive information
 14577                                  ; table to see what kind it is.
 14578                                  
 14579 000018B9 26807D2202              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 2 ; is it single-media?
 14580 000018BE 74F1                    		jz	short dofloppy	; [es:di+BDS.formfactor], ffSmall
 14581                                  					; yes, use fatid...
 14582                                  ; 96 tpi drive?
 14583 000018C0 80FCF9                  		cmp	ah, 0F9h
 14584 000018C3 75EC                    		jnz	short dofloppy
 14585                                  
 14586                                  ;------ If formfactor of drive = ffother or ff288 it has to be
 14587                                  ;------ a 720K diskette
 14588                                  
 14589 000018C5 26807D2207              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 7 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14590                                  					; ffOther
 14591 000018CA 7418                    		jz	short Is720K
 14592 000018CC 26807D2209              		cmp	byte [es:di+22h], 9 ; [es:di+BDS.formfactor]
 14593                                  					; ff288
 14594 000018D1 7411                    		jz	short Is720K
 14595 000018D3 B007                    		mov	al, 7		; seven	sectors	/ fat
 14596 000018D5 BB0FE0                  		mov	bx, 57359	; 224*256+0Fh
 14597                                  					; 224 root dir entries
 14598                                  					; & 0Fh sector max
 14599 000018D8 B96009                  		mov	cx, 2400	; 80*15*2
 14600                                  					; 80 tracks, 15 sectors/track,
 14601                                  					; 2 sides
 14602 000018DB BA0201                  		mov	dx, 258		; 1*256+2
 14603                                  					; sectors/allocation unit
 14604                                  					; & head max
 14605 000018DE 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14606 000018E1 E986ED                  		jmp	Has1		; return to tail of getbp
 14607                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14608                                  
 14609                                  Is720K:					
 14610 000018E4 83C402                  		add	sp, 2		; pop off return address
 14611 000018E7 E947ED                  		jmp	Has720K		; return to 720K code
 14612                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14613                                  
 14614                                  		; 18/12/2022
 14615                                  ;dofloppy:				
 14616                                  		;retn
 14617                                  
 14618                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14619                                  
 14620                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14621                                  
 14622                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14623                                  ; set_changed_dl - sets flag bits according to bits set in bx.
 14624                                  ;		   essentially used to indicate changeline, or format.
 14625                                  ;
 14626                                  ;   inputs:	dl contains physical drive number
 14627                                  ;		bx contains bits to set in the flag field in the bdss
 14628                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14629                                  ;   registers modified: flags
 14630                                  ;
 14631                                  ;	called from int13 hooker.  Must preserve ALL registers!!!
 14632                                  ;
 14633                                  ; in the virtual drive system we *must* flag the other drives as being changed
 14634                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14635                                  
 14636                                  set_changed_dl:	
 14637 000018EA 06                      		push	es
 14638 000018EB 57                      		push	di
 14639                                  		;les	di, ds:start_bds
 14640                                  		; 19/10/2022
 14641 000018EC C43E[1901]              		les	di, [start_bds]
 14642                                  
 14643                                  ; note: we assume that the list is non-empty
 14644                                  
 14645                                  scan_bds:				
 14646 000018F0 26385504                		cmp	[es:di+4], dl	; [es:di+BDS.drivenum]
 14647 000018F4 7504                    		jnz	short get_next_bds
 14648                                  
 14649                                  ; someone may complain, but this *always* must be done when a disk change is
 14650                                  ; noted. there are *no* other compromising circumstances.
 14651                                  
 14652 000018F6 26095D23                		or	[es:di+23h], bx	; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14653                                  					; signal change	on other drive
 14654                                  get_next_bds:				
 14655 000018FA 26C43D                  		les	di, [es:di]	; [es:di+BDS.link]
 14656                                  					; go to	next bds
 14657 000018FD 83FFFF                  		cmp	di, 0FFFFh
 14658 00001900 75EE                    		jnz	short scan_bds	; loop unless we hit end of chain
 14659 00001902 5F                      		pop	di
 14660 00001903 07                      		pop	es
 14661 00001904 C3                      		retn
 14662                                  
 14663                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14664                                  
 14665                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14666                                  ; checkromchange - see if external program has diddled rom change line.
 14667                                  ;
 14668                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds.
 14669                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change
 14670                                  ;		zero reset - change
 14671                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14672                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14673                                  
 14674                                  checkromchange:	
 14675                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchanged ; 40h
 14676                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14677 00001905 26F6452340              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 40h
 14678                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 40h ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14679                                  					; fchanged
 14680 0000190A C3                      		retn
 14681                                  
 14682                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14683                                  
 14684                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14685                                  ; resetchanged - restore value of change line
 14686                                  ;
 14687                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14688                                  ;   outputs:	none
 14689                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14690                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14691                                  
 14692                                  resetchanged:	
 14693                                  		;and	word [es:di+BDS.flags], ~fchanged ; 0FFBFh	
 14694                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14695 0000190B 26806523BF              		and	byte [es:di+23h], 0BFh
 14696                                  		;and	word [es:di+23h], 0FFBFh ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14697                                  					; ~fchanged
 14698 00001910 C3                      		retn
 14699                                  
 14700                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14701                                  
 14702                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14703                                  ; haschange - see if drive can supply change line
 14704                                  ;
 14705                                  ;   inputs:	es:di points to current bds
 14706                                  ;   outputs:	zero set - no change line available
 14707                                  ;		zero reset - change line available
 14708                                  ;   registers modified: none
 14709                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14710                                  
 14711                                  haschange:
 14712                                  		;test	word [es:di+BDS.flags], fchangeline ; 2
 14713                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14714 00001911 26F6452302              		test	byte [es:di+23h], 2		
 14715                                  		;test	word [es:di+23h], 2 ; [es:di+BDS.flags]
 14716                                  					; fchangeline
 14717 00001916 C3                      		retn
 14718                                  
 14719                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14720                                  
 14721                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14722                                  
 14723                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14724                                  ; set_volume_id      -	main routine, calls other routines.
 14725                                  ; read_volume_id     -	read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14726                                  ; transfer_volume_id -	copy the volume id from tmp to special drive.
 14727                                  ; check_volume_id    -	compare volume id in tmp area with one expected for drive.
 14728                                  ; fat_check          -	see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14729                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14730                                  
 14731                                  ; set_volume_id
 14732                                  ;   if drive has changeline support, read in and set the volume_id
 14733                                  ; and the last fat_id byte. if no change line support then do nothing.
 14734                                  ;
 14735                                  ;   on entry:
 14736                                  ;	es:di points to the bds for this disk.
 14737                                  ;	ah contains media byte
 14738                                  ;
 14739                                  ;   on exit:
 14740                                  ;	carry clear:
 14741                                  ;	   successful call
 14742                                  ;	carry set
 14743                                  ;	   error and ax has error code
 14744                                  
 14745                                  set_volume_id:				
 14746 00001917 52                      		push	dx		; save registers
 14747 00001918 50                      		push	ax
 14748 00001919 E8F5FF                  		call	haschange	; does drive have changeline support?
 14749 0000191C 740B                    		jz	short setvret	; no, get out
 14750 0000191E E81000                  		call	read_volume_id
 14751 00001921 7209                    		jb	short seterr
 14752 00001923 E8A200                  		call	transfer_volume_id ; copy the volume id	to special drive
 14753 00001926 E8E2FF                  		call	resetchanged	; restore value	of change line
 14754                                  setvret:				
 14755                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14756                                  		; cf = 0
 14757                                  		;clc			; no error, clear carry flag
 14758 00001929 58                      		pop	ax		; restore registers
 14759 0000192A 5A                      		pop	dx
 14760 0000192B C3                      		retn
 14761                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14762                                  
 14763                                  seterr:					
 14764 0000192C 5A                      		pop	dx		; pop stack but don't overwrite ax
 14765 0000192D 5A                      		pop	dx		; restore dx
 14766 0000192E C3                      		retn
 14767                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14768 0000192F 0000                    root_sec:	dw 0			; root sector #
 14769                                  
 14770                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14771                                  ;ROOTSEC equ root_sec - DOSBIOSEG_2C7h		
 14772                                  ; 09/12/2022
 14773                                  ROOTSEC equ root_sec
 14774                                  
 14775                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14776                                  
 14777                                  ; 16/10/2022
 14778                                  
 14779                                  ; read_volume_id read the volume id and tells if it has been changed.
 14780                                  ;
 14781                                  ;   on entry:
 14782                                  ;	es:di points to current bds for drive.
 14783                                  ;
 14784                                  ;   on exit:
 14785                                  ;	carry clear
 14786                                  ;	    si = 1  no change
 14787                                  ;	    si = 0  ?
 14788                                  ;	    si = -1 change
 14789                                  ;
 14790                                  ;	carry set:
 14791                                  ;	    error and ax has error code.
 14792                                  
 14793                                  read_volume_id:
 14794 00001931 52                      		push	dx		; preserve registers
 14795 00001932 51                      		push	cx
 14796 00001933 53                      		push	bx
 14797 00001934 50                      		push	ax
 14798 00001935 06                      		push	es		; stack the bds last
 14799 00001936 57                      		push	di
 14800 00001937 1E                      		push	ds		; point es to Bios_Data
 14801 00001938 07                      		pop	es
 14802 00001939 BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14803 0000193C BE[FE08]                		mov	si, nul_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14804 0000193F B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; initialize tmp_vid to	null vi_id
 14805 00001942 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14806 00001944 5F                      		pop	di
 14807 00001945 07                      		pop	es
 14808 00001946 268A450B                		mov	al, [es:di+11]	; [es:di+BDS.fats]
 14809                                  					; # of fats
 14810 0000194A 268B4D11                		mov	cx, [es:di+17]	; [es:di+BDS.fatsecs]
 14811                                  					; sectors / fat
 14812 0000194E F6E1                    		mul	cl		; size taken by	fats
 14813 00001950 26034509                		add	ax, [es:di+9]	; [es:di+BDS.resectors]
 14814                                  					; add on reserved sectors
 14815                                  					;
 14816                                  					; ax is	now sector # (0	based)
 14817                                  		; 17/10/2022
 14818 00001954 2EA3[2F19]              		mov	[cs:ROOTSEC], ax
 14819                                  		;mov	word ptr cs:198Fh, ax ; [cs:root_sec]
 14820                                  					; 0070h:3EFFh =	2C7h:198Fh
 14821 00001958 268B450C                		mov	ax, [es:di+12]	; [es:di+BDS.direntries]
 14822                                  					; # root dir entries
 14823 0000195C B104                    		mov	cl, 4		; 16 entries/sector
 14824 0000195E D3E8                    		shr	ax, cl		; divide by 16
 14825 00001960 89C1                    		mov	cx, ax		; cx is	# of sectors to	scan
 14826                                  next_sec:				
 14827 00001962 51                      		push	cx		; save outer loop counter
 14828 00001963 2EA1[2F19]              		mov	ax, [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14829                                  		;mov	ax, word ptr cs:198Fh ; [cs:root_sec]
 14830                                  					; get sector #
 14831 00001967 268B4D13                		mov	cx, [es:di+19]	; [es:di+BDS.secpertrack]
 14832                                  					; sectors / track
 14833 0000196B 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14834 0000196D F7F1                    		div	cx
 14835                                  
 14836                                  ; set up registers for call to read_sector
 14837                                  
 14838 0000196F 42                      		inc	dx		; dx= sectors into track
 14839                                  					; ax= track count from 0
 14840 00001970 88D1                    		mov	cl, dl		; sector to read
 14841 00001972 31D2                    		xor	dx, dx
 14842 00001974 26F77515                		div	word [es:di+21] ; [es:di+BDS.heads]
 14843                                  					; # heads on this disc
 14844 00001978 88D6                    		mov	dh, dl		; head number
 14845 0000197A 88C5                    		mov	ch, al		; track	#
 14846 0000197C E8FBED                  		call	read_sector	; get first sector of the root directory,
 14847                                  					; ds:bx	-> directory sector
 14848 0000197F 7243                    		jb	short readviderr
 14849 00001981 B91000                  		mov	cx, 16		; # of dir entries in a	block of root
 14850 00001984 B008                    		mov	al, 8		; volume label bit
 14851                                  fvid_loop:				
 14852 00001986 803F00                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0 ; end of dir?
 14853 00001989 7436                    		jz	short no_vid	; yes, no vol id
 14854 0000198B 803FE5                  		cmp	byte [bx], 0E5h ; empty entry?
 14855 0000198E 7405                    		jz	short ent_loop	; yes, skip
 14856 00001990 84470B                  		test	[bx+11], al	; is volume label bit set in fcb?
 14857 00001993 7511                    		jnz	short found_vid	; jmp yes
 14858                                  ent_loop:				
 14859 00001995 83C320                  		add	bx, 32		; add length of	directory entry
 14860 00001998 E2EC                    		loop	fvid_loop
 14861 0000199A 59                      		pop	cx		; outer loop
 14862 0000199B 2EFF06[2F19]            		inc	word [cs:ROOTSEC]
 14863                                  		;inc	word ptr cs:198Fh ; inc word [root_sec]
 14864                                  					; next sector
 14865 000019A0 E2C0                    		loop	next_sec	; continue
 14866                                  notfound:				
 14867 000019A2 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14868 000019A4 EB16                    		jmp	short fvid_ret
 14869                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14870                                  
 14871                                  found_vid:				
 14872 000019A6 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14873 000019A7 89DE                    		mov	si, bx		; point	to volume_id
 14874 000019A9 06                      		push	es		; preserve current bds
 14875 000019AA 57                      		push	di
 14876 000019AB 1E                      		push	ds
 14877 000019AC 07                      		pop	es		; point es to Bios_Data
 14878 000019AD BF[0A09]                		mov	di, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14879 000019B0 B90B00                  		mov	cx, 11		; VOLID_SIZ-1
 14880                                  					; length of string minus nul
 14881 000019B3 F3A4                    		rep movsb		; mov volume label to tmp_vid
 14882 000019B5 30C0                    		xor	al, al
 14883 000019B7 AA                      		stosb			; null terminate
 14884 000019B8 31F6                    		xor	si, si
 14885 000019BA 5F                      		pop	di		; restore current bds
 14886 000019BB 07                      		pop	es
 14887                                  fvid_ret:				
 14888 000019BC 58                      		pop	ax
 14889                                  		; 10/12/2022
 14890                                  		; cf = 0
 14891                                  		;clc
 14892                                  rvidret:				
 14893 000019BD 5B                      		pop	bx		; restore registers
 14894 000019BE 59                      		pop	cx
 14895 000019BF 5A                      		pop	dx
 14896 000019C0 C3                      		retn
 14897                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14898                                  
 14899                                  no_vid:					
 14900 000019C1 59                      		pop	cx		; clean stack of outer loop counter
 14901 000019C2 EBDE                    		jmp	short notfound	; not found
 14902                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14903                                  
 14904                                  readviderr:				
 14905 000019C4 5E                      		pop	si		; trash the outer loop counter
 14906 000019C5 5E                      		pop	si		; caller's ax, return error code instead 
 14907 000019C6 EBF5                    		jmp	short rvidret
 14908                                  
 14909                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14910                                  
 14911                                  ; transfer_volume_id - copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14912                                  ;
 14913                                  ; inputs:	es:di has current bds
 14914                                  ; outputs:	bds for drive has volume id from tmp
 14915                                  
 14916                                  transfer_volume_id:	
 14917 000019C8 57                      		push	di		; copy the volume id from tmp to special drive
 14918 000019C9 56                      		push	si
 14919 000019CA 51                      		push	cx
 14920 000019CB BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14921                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14922 000019CE 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14923                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14924 000019D1 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14925 000019D4 FC                      		cld
 14926 000019D5 F3A4                    		rep movsb
 14927 000019D7 59                      		pop	cx
 14928 000019D8 5E                      		pop	si
 14929 000019D9 5F                      		pop	di
 14930 000019DA C3                      		retn
 14931                                  
 14932                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14933                                  
 14934                                  ;  check_volume_id - compare volume id in tmp area with
 14935                                  ;		     one expected for drive
 14936                                  ;
 14937                                  ;   inputs:	es:di has current bds for drive
 14938                                  ;   outputs:	zero true means it matched
 14939                                  
 14940                                  check_volume_id:	
 14941 000019DB 57                      		push	di
 14942 000019DC 51                      		push	cx
 14943 000019DD BE[0A09]                		mov	si, tmp_vid	; "NO NAME	 "
 14944                                  		;add	di, BDS.volid
 14945 000019E0 83C74B                  		add	di, 75		; BDS.volid
 14946                                  		;mov	cx, VOLID_SIZ
 14947 000019E3 B90C00                  		mov	cx, 12		; VOLID_SIZ
 14948 000019E6 FC                      		cld
 14949 000019E7 F3A6                    		repe cmpsb		; are the 2 volume_ids the same?
 14950 000019E9 59                      		pop	cx
 14951 000019EA 5F                      		pop	di
 14952 000019EB C3                      		retn
 14953                                  
 14954                                  ; =============== S U B	R O U T	I N E =======================================
 14955                                  
 14956                                  ;   fat_check - see of the fatid has changed in the specified drive.
 14957                                  ;	      - uses the fat id obtained from the boot sector.
 14958                                  ;
 14959                                  ;   inputs:	medbyt is expected fat id
 14960                                  ;		es:di points to current bds
 14961                                  ;
 14962                                  ;   output:	si = -1 if fat id different,
 14963                                  ;		si = 0 otherwise
 14964                                  ;
 14965                                  ;   no other registers changed.
 14966                                  
 14967                                  fat_check:		
 14968 000019EC 50                      		push	ax
 14969 000019ED 31F6                    		xor	si, si		; say fat id's are same.
 14970 000019EF A0[1F01]                		mov	al, [medbyt]	; 19/10/2022
 14971 000019F2 263A4510                		cmp	al, [es:di+10h]	; [es:di+BDS.media]
 14972                                  					; compare it with the bds medbyte
 14973 000019F6 7401                    		jz	short okret1	; carry	clear
 14974 000019F8 4E                      		dec	si
 14975                                  okret1:					
 14976 000019F9 58                      		pop	ax
 14977 000019FA C3                      		retn
 14978                                  
 14979                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14980                                  
 14981                                  ; BIOSCODE:1A69h (MSDOS 6.21, IO.SYS)
 14982                                  		;times 7 db 0
 14983                                  
 14984                                  ; BIOSCODE:180Bh (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)	
 14985                                  
 14986                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14987                                  		;times 4 db 0	; 17/10/2022
 14988                                  		;db 4 dup(0)	; times 4 db 0
 14989                                  
 14990                                  ; ---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 14991                                  
 14992                                  		; 09/12/2022
 14993                                  		;db 0
 14994                                  
 14995                                  number2div	equ ($-BCode_start)
 14996                                  number2mod	equ (number2div % 16)
 14997                                  
 14998                                  %if number2mod>0 & number2mod<16
 14999 000019FB 00<rep 5h>              		times (16-number2mod) db 0
 15000                                  %endif
 15001                                  
 15002                                  ;align 16
 15003                                  
 15004                                  ; 09/12/2022
 15005                                  BCODE_END	equ $ - BCode_start
 15006                                  ;SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(BCODE_END>>4)
 15007                                  ; 13/12/2022
 15008                                  SYSINITOFFSET	equ BCODE_END
 15009                                  SYSINITSEG	equ IOSYSCODESEG+(SYSINITOFFSET>>4)
 15010

 15022                                  ;=============================================================================
 15023                                  ; (IO.SYS) SYSINIT SEGMENT 
 15024                                  ;=============================================================================
 15025                                  ; 09/12/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 15026                                  
 15027                                  section .SYSINIT vstart=0
 15028                                  
 15029                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 15030                                  ; SYSINIT.BIN (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS) - RETRO DOS v4.0 by ERDOGAN TAN - 21/10/2022
 15031                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15032                                  ; Last Update: 04/01/2023 (Modified IO.SYS)  ((Previous: 31/12/2022))
 15033                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15034                                  ; Beginning: 03/06/2018 (Retro DOS 3.0), 21/03/2019 (Retro DOS 4.0)
 15035                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15036                                  ; Assembler: NASM version 2.15
 15037                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15038                                  ;	   ((nasm sysinit5.s -l sysinit5.lst -o SYSINIT5.BIN -Z error.txt)) 	
 15039                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15040                                  ; Modified from 'sysinit2.s' (SYSINIT2.BIN) file of Retro DOS v3.0 (6/7/2018)
 15041                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15042                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT1.ASM' and 'SYSINIT2.ASM' files of MSDOS 6.0
 15043                                  ; source code by Microsoft, 1991 
 15044                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15045                                  ; Derived from 'SYSINIT.ASM' file of MSDOS 2.0 (IBM PCDOS v2.0) source code
 15046                                  ; by Microsoft, 12/10/1983
 15047                                  ; ****************************************************************************
 15048                                  ; main file: 'retrodos4.s'
 15049                                  ; incbin 'SYSINIT3.BIN' ; (SYINITSEG)
 15050                                  
 15051                                  ; 21/10/2022
 15052                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15053                                  ; This source code (version) is based on SYSINIT source code of disassembled
 15054                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS file (SYSINIT.BIN) 
 15055                                  ; Dissassembler: Hex-Rays Interactive Disassembler (IDA)
 15056                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 15057                                  ; Binary file splitter & joiner: FFSJ v3.3
 15058                                  
 15059                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 15060                                  ; SYSINIT.TXT (27/01/1983)
 15061                                  ;--------------------------------------------------------------
 15062                                  ;    SYSINIT is  a module linked behind the OEM bios.  It takes
 15063                                  ;over  the  system  initialization  after  the  OEM  bios   has
 15064                                  ;performed any  initialization  it  needs  to  do.   Control is
 15065                                  ;transfered with a long jump to the external  variable  SYSINIT
 15066                                  ;
 15067                                  ;
 15068                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared external:
 15069                                  ;
 15070                                  ;   CURRENT_DOS_LOCATION    WORD
 15071                                  ;
 15072                                  ;This word  contains  the  segment  number of the DOS before it
 15073                                  ;is relocated.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 15074                                  ;
 15075                                  ;   FINAL_DOS_LOCATION      WORD
 15076                                  ;
 15077                                  ;This word contains the segment number of the DOS after SYSINIT
 15078                                  ;moves it.  The OEM bios must set this value.
 15079                                  ;
 15080                                  ;   DEVICE_LIST             DWORD
 15081                                  ;
 15082                                  ;This  double  word  pointer  points  to  the  linked  list  of
 15083                                  ;character and block device drivers.  The  OEM  must  set  this
 15084                                  ;value.
 15085                                  ;
 15086                                  ;   MEMORY_SIZE             WORD
 15087                                  ;
 15088                                  ;This word  contains  the  number  of  RAM  paragraphs.  If the
 15089                                  ;bios doesn't set  this  variable  SYSINIT  will  automatically
 15090                                  ;calculate it.   NOTE:  systems with PARITY checked memory must
 15091                                  ;size memory in the BIOS.  SYSINITs method is to  write  memory
 15092                                  ;and read it back until it gets a mismatch.
 15093                                  ;
 15094                                  ;   DEFAULT_DRIVE           BYTE
 15095                                  ;
 15096                                  ;This is  the initial default drive when the system first comes
 15097                                  ;up.  drive a=0, drive b=1,  etc.   If  the  bios  doesn't  set
 15098                                  ;it then drive a is assumed.
 15099                                  ;
 15100                                  ;   BUFFERS                 BYTE
 15101                                  ;
 15102                                  ;This is  the  default  number of buffers for the system.  This
 15103                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15104                                  ;It is DBed to 2 in SYSINIT it should be greater than 1.
 15105                                  ;
 15106                                  ;   FILES                   BYTE
 15107                                  ;
 15108                                  ;This is  the  default  number  of  files for the system.  This
 15109                                  ;value may be overridden by the user in  the  CONFIG.SYS  file.
 15110                                  ;It is  DBed  to  8 in SYSINIT, values less than 5 are ignored.
 15111                                  ;
 15112                                  ;   SYSINIT                 FAR
 15113                                  ;
 15114                                  ;The entry  point  of  the  SYSINIT  module.  OEM BIOS jumps to
 15115                                  ;this label at the end of its INIT code.
 15116                                  ;
 15117                                  ;   The OEM  has  the  following  variables declared public:
 15118                                  ;
 15119                                  ;   RE_INIT                 FAR
 15120                                  ;
 15121                                  ;This is an entry point which allows the BIOS to do some INIT
 15122                                  ;work  after  the  DOS is initialized.  ALL REGISTERS MUST BE
 15123                                  ;PRESERVED.  On entry DS points to the first available memory
 15124                                  ;(after  the DOS).  DS:0 points to a 100H byte program header
 15125                                  ;prefix which represents  the  "program"  currently  running.
 15126                                  ;This  program  should  be  thought  of  as  the OEM BIOS and
 15127                                  ;SYSINIT taken together.  This is not  a  normal  program  in
 15128                                  ;that  no  memory  is  allocated to it, it is running in free
 15129                                  ;memory.
 15130                                  ;NOTES:
 15131                                  ;     At the time this routine is called SYSINIT occupies the
 15132                                  ;highest 10K of memory ("highest" is determined by the  value
 15133                                  ;of the MEMORY_SIZE variable), DO NOT DO WRITES THERE.
 15134                                  ;     Since this is called AFTER DOS is initialized, you can
 15135                                  ;make system calls.  This also implies that the code for this
 15136                                  ;routine    CANNOT   be   thrown   away   by   use   of   the
 15137                                  ;FINAL_DOS_LOCATION since the DOS has already been moved.
 15138                                  ;     If you don't want  anything done just set this to point
 15139                                  ;at a FAR RET instruction.
 15140                                  
 15141                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15142                                  ; TITLE   BIOS SYSTEM INITIALIZATION
 15143                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15144                                  
 15145                                  ;include version.inc
 15146                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15147                                  
 15148                                  ;FALSE   EQU     0
 15149                                  ;TRUE    EQU     0FFFFh
 15150                                  
 15151                                  ;IBMVER	    EQU     TRUE
 15152                                  ;IBMCOPYRIGHT EQU   FALSE
 15153                                  ;STACKSW    EQU	    TRUE		;Include Switchable Hardware Stacks
 15154                                  ;IBMJAPVER  EQU     FALSE		; If TRUE set KANJI true also
 15155                                  ;MSVER      EQU     FALSE
 15156                                  ;ALTVECT    EQU     FALSE		; Switch to build ALTVECT version
 15157                                  ;KANJI      EQU     FALSE
 15158                                  
 15159                                  ;(MSDOS 6.0, versiona.inc, 1991)
 15160                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15161                                  ;MAJOR_VERSION  EQU	6
 15162                                  ;;MINOR_VERSION	EQU	0	;6.00
 15163                                  ;MINOR_VERSION  EQU	21	;6.21  ; 21/03/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 15164                                  
 15165                                  ; 22/10/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0)
 15166                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15167                                  MAJOR_VERSION   EQU	5
 15168                                  MINOR_VERSION   EQU	0
 15169                                  
 15170                                  expected_version equ	(MINOR_VERSION<<8)+MAJOR_VERSION
 15171                                  
 15172                                  ;DOSREVNM equ	00000000b       ; m037 - bits 0-2 = revision number of DOS
 15173                                  				; currently 0.
 15174                                  DOSREVNM equ	00000111b	; [[[ 7 for Retro DOS v4.0 ]]] (21/03/2019)	
 15175                                  DOSINROM equ	00001000B       ; bit 3 of ver flags returned in BH
 15176                                  DOSINHMA equ	00010000B       ; bit 4 of ver flags 
 15177                                  
 15178                                  ;      if1
 15179                                  ;      %OUT  ... for DOS Version 5.00 ...
 15180                                  ;      endif
 15181                                  
 15182                                         ;******************************
 15183                                         ;Each assembler program should:
 15184                                         ;  mov ah,030h                   ;DOS Get Version function
 15185                                         ;  int 021h                      ;Version ret. in AX,minor version first
 15186                                         ;  cmp ax,expected_version       ;ALL utilities should check for an
 15187                                         ;  jne error_handler             ; EXACT version match.
 15188                                         ;******************************
 15189                                  
 15190                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15191                                  ; device definitions
 15192                                  
 15193                                  ;Attribute bit masks
 15194                                  DEVTYP  EQU     8000h           ;Bit 15 - 1  if Char, 0 if block
 15195                                  DEVIOCTL EQU    4000h           ;Bit 14 - CONTROL mode bit
 15196                                  ISFATBYDEV EQU  2000h           ;Bit 13 - Device uses FAT ID bytes, comp media.
 15197                                  ISCIN   EQU     0001h           ;Bit 0 - This device is the console input.
 15198                                  ISCOUT  EQU     0002h           ;Bit 1 - This device is the console output.
 15199                                  ISNULL  EQU     0004h           ;Bit 2 - This device is the null device.
 15200                                  ISCLOCK EQU     0008h           ;Bit 3 - This device is the clock device.
 15201                                  ISIBM   EQU     0010h           ;Bit 4 - This device is special
 15202                                  
 15203                                  ; The device table list has the form:
 15204                                  struc	SYSDEV
 15205 00000000 ????????                .NEXT:		resd 1		;Pointer to next device header
 15206 00000004 ????                    .ATT:		resw 1		;Attributes of the device
 15207 00000006 ????                    .STRAT:		resw 1		;Strategy entry point
 15208 00000008 ????                    .INT:		resw 1		;Interrupt entry point
 15209 0000000A ????????????????        .NAME:		resb 8		;Name of device (only first byte used for block)
 15210                                  .size:
 15211                                  endstruc
 15212                                  
 15213                                  ;Static Reguest Header
 15214                                  struc	SRHEAD
 15215 00000000 ??                      .REQLEN:	resb 1		;Length in bytes of request block
 15216 00000001 ??                      .REQUNIT:	resb 1		;Device unit number
 15217 00000002 ??                      .REQFUNC:	resb 1		;Type of request
 15218 00000003 ????                    .REQSTAT:	resw 1		;Status Word
 15219 00000005 ????????????????                	resb 8		;Reserved for queue links
 15220                                  .size:
 15221                                  endstruc
 15222                                  
 15223                                  ;Status word masks
 15224                                  STERR   EQU     8000H           ;Bit 15 - Error
 15225                                  STBUI   EQU     0200H           ;Bit 9 - Buisy
 15226                                  STDON   EQU     0100H           ;Bit 8 - Done
 15227                                  STECODE EQU     00FFH           ;Error code
 15228                                  WRECODE EQU     0
 15229                                  
 15230                                  ;Function codes
 15231                                  DEVINIT EQU     0               ;Initialization
 15232                                  DINITHL EQU     26              ;Size of init header
 15233                                  DEVMDCH EQU     1               ;Media check
 15234                                  DMEDHL  EQU     15              ;Size of media check header
 15235                                  DEVBPB  EQU     2               ;Get BPB
 15236                                  DEVRDIOCTL EQU  3               ;IOCTL read
 15237                                  DBPBHL  EQU     22              ;Size of Get BPB header
 15238                                  DEVRD   EQU     4               ;Read
 15239                                  DRDWRHL EQU     22              ;Size of RD/WR header
 15240                                  DEVRDND EQU     5               ;Non destructive read no wait (character devs)
 15241                                  DRDNDHL EQU     14              ;Size of non destructive read header
 15242                                  DEVIST  EQU     6               ;Input status
 15243                                  DSTATHL EQU     13              ;Size of status header
 15244                                  DEVIFL  EQU     7               ;Input flush
 15245                                  DFLSHL  EQU     15              ;Size of flush header
 15246                                  DEVWRT  EQU     8               ;Write
 15247                                  DEVWRTV EQU     9               ;Write with verify
 15248                                  DEVOST  EQU     10              ;Output status
 15249                                  DEVOFL  EQU     11              ;Output flush
 15250                                  DEVWRIOCTL EQU  12              ;IOCTL write
 15251                                  
 15252                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 15253                                  struc	SYS_FCB
 15254 00000000 ??                      .fcb_drive:	resb 1
 15255 00000001 ????????????????        .fcb_name:	resb 8
 15256 00000009 ??????                  .fcb_ext:	resb 3
 15257 0000000C ????                    .fcb_EXTENT:	resw 1
 15258 0000000E ????                    .fcb_RECSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of record (user settable)
 15259 00000010 ????                    .fcb_FILSIZ:	resw 1	; Size of file in bytes; used with the following
 15260                                                          ; word
 15261 00000012 ????                    .fcb_DRVBP:	resw 1	; BP for SEARCH FIRST and SEARCH NEXT
 15262 00000014 ????                    .fcb_FDATE:	resw 1	; Date of last writing
 15263 00000016 ????                    .fcb_FTIME:	resw 1	; Time of last writing
 15264 00000018 ??                      .fcb_DEVID:	resb 1	; Device ID number, bits 0-5 if file.
 15265                                                          ; bit 7=0 for file, bit 7=1 for I/O device
 15266                                                          ; If file, bit 6=0 if dirty
 15267                                                          ; If I/O device, bit 6=0 if EOF (input)
 15268                                                          ;               Bit 5=1 if Raw mode
 15269                                                          ;               Bit 0=1 if console input device
 15270                                                          ;               Bit 1=1 if console output device
 15271                                                          ;               Bit 2=1 if null device
 15272                                                          ;               Bit 3=1 if clock device
 15273 00000019 ????                    .fcb_FIRCLUS:	resw 1	; First cluster of file
 15274 0000001B ????                    .fcb_CLUSPOS:	resw 1	; Position of last cluster accessed
 15275 0000001D ????                    .fcb_LSTCLUS:	resw 1	; Last cluster accessed and directory
 15276 0000001F ??                                   	resb 1	; pack 2 12 bit numbers into 24 bits...
 15277 00000020 ??                      .fcb_NR:	resb 1	; Next record
 15278 00000021 ????????                .fcb_RR:	resb 4	; Random record
 15279                                  .size:
 15280                                  endstruc
