 31207                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31208                                  ;
 31209                                  ; procedure : GetUMBForDev
 31210                                  ;
 31211                                  ;	Input : DevSize
 31212                                  ;	Output : Carry set if couldn't allocate a UMB to fit the
 31213                                  ;		 the device.
 31214                                  ;		 If success carry clear
 31215                                  ;
 31216                                  ;	Allocates the biggest UMB for loading devices and updates
 31217                                  ;	DevUMBSize, DevUMBAddr & DevUMBFree if it succeeded in allocating
 31218                                  ;	UMB.
 31219                                  ;
 31220                                  ;	This routine relies on the fact that all of the low memory
 31221                                  ;	is allocated, and any DOS alloc calls should return memory
 31222                                  ;	from the UMB pool.
 31223                                  ;
 31224                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31225                                  
 31226                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31227                                  	; (SYSINIT:2BC6h)
 31228                                  
 31229                                  GetUMBForDev:
 31230                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31231                                  	; ds = cs
 31232 0000286F BBFFFF                  	mov	bx,0FFFFh
 31233 00002872 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31234 00002875 CD21                    	int	21h
 31235                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ALLOCATE MEMORY
 31236                                  		; BX = number of 16-byte paragraphs desired
 31237                                  
 31238 00002877 09DB                    	or	bx,bx
 31239 00002879 742C                    	jz	short gufd_err
 31240                                  
 31241 0000287B 4B                      	dec	bx
 31242                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31243                                  	; ds = cs
 31244 0000287C 391E[EA1E]              	cmp	[DevSize],bx
 31245                                  	;cmp	[cs:DevSize],bx
 31246 00002880 7725                    	ja	short gufd_err
 31247 00002882 43                      	inc	bx
 31248                                  
 31249 00002883 B80048                  	mov	ax,4800h
 31250 00002886 CD21                    	int	21h
 31251 00002888 721D                    	jc	short gufd_err
 31252                                  
 31253                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31254                                  	;dec	ax
 31255                                  	;call	PrepareMark
 31256                                  	;
 31257                                  PrepareMark:
 31258 0000288A 1E                      	push	ds
 31259 0000288B 48                      	dec	ax
 31260 0000288C 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 31261 0000288E C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8
 31262 00002894 C70608005344            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SD' ; 4453h
 31263 0000289A 40                      	inc	ax
 31264 0000289B 1F                      	pop	ds
 31265                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31266                                  	; ds = cs
 31267                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],bx	; update the UMB Variables
 31268                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31269                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31270 0000289C 891E[FB1E]              	mov	[DevUMBSize],bx		; update the UMB Variables
 31271 000028A0 A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31272 000028A3 A3[FD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31273                                  	;
 31274                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31275                                  	; cf=0
 31276                                  	;clc				; mark no error
 31277 000028A6 C3                      	retn
 31278                                  gufd_err:
 31279 000028A7 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax ; 0
 31280                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31281                                  	; ds = cs
 31282                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBSize],ax	; erase the previous values
 31283                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBAddr],ax
 31284                                  	;mov	[cs:DevUMBFree],ax
 31285 000028A9 A3[FB1E]                	mov	[DevUMBSize],ax		; erase the previous values
 31286 000028AC A3[F91E]                	mov	[DevUMBAddr],ax
 31287 000028AF A3[FD1E]                	mov	[DevUMBFree],ax
 31288 000028B2 F9                      	stc
 31289 000028B3 C3                      	retn

 31291                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31292                                  ;
 31293                                  ; procedure : DevSetMark
 31294                                  ;
 31295                                  ;	Input : AX - Free segment were device is going to be loaded
 31296                                  ;	Output : AX - Segment at which device can be loaded (AX=AX+1)
 31297                                  ;
 31298                                  ;	Creates a sub-arena for the device driver
 31299                                  ;	puts 'D' marker in the sub-arena
 31300                                  ;	Put the owner of the sub-arena as (AX+1)
 31301                                  ;	Copies the file name into sub-arena name field
 31302                                  ;
 31303                                  ;	Size field of the sub-arena will be set only at succesful
 31304                                  ;	completion of Device load.
 31305                                  ;
 31306                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31307                                  
 31308                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31309                                  	; (SYSINIT:2C13h)
 31310                                  
 31311                                  DevSetMark:
 31312 000028B4 06                      	push	es
 31313 000028B5 57                      	push	di
 31314 000028B6 1E                      	push	ds
 31315 000028B7 56                      	push	si
 31316 000028B8 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 31317 000028BA 26C606000044            	mov	byte [es:devmark.id],devmark_device ; 'D'
 31318 000028C0 40                      	inc	ax
 31319 000028C1 26A30100                	mov	[es:devmark.seg],ax
 31320                                  
 31321                                  ;-------------- Copy file name
 31322                                  
 31323 000028C5 50                      	push	ax			; save load addr
 31324 000028C6 2EC536[F803]            	lds	si,[cs:bpb_addr]	; command line is still there
 31325                                  
 31326 000028CB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31327 000028CD FC                      	cld
 31328                                  dsm_again:
 31329 000028CE AC                      	lodsb
 31330 000028CF 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 31331 000028D1 7504                    	jne	short isit_slash
 31332 000028D3 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31333 000028D5 EBF7                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31334                                  isit_slash:
 31335 000028D7 3C5C                    	cmp	al, '\'
 31336 000028D9 7504                    	jne	short isit_null
 31337 000028DB 89F7                    	mov	di,si
 31338 000028DD EBEF                    	jmp	short dsm_again
 31339                                  isit_null:
 31340 000028DF 08C0                    	or	al,al
 31341 000028E1 75EB                    	jnz	short dsm_again
 31342 000028E3 89FE                    	mov	si,di
 31343                                  
 31344 000028E5 BF0800                  	mov	di,devmark.filename ; 8
 31345 000028E8 B90800                  	mov	cx,8			; maximum 8 characters
 31346                                  dsm_next_char:
 31347 000028EB AC                      	lodsb
 31348 000028EC 08C0                    	or	al, al
 31349 000028EE 7407                    	jz	short blankout
 31350 000028F0 3C2E                    	cmp	al, '.'
 31351 000028F2 7403                    	je	short blankout
 31352 000028F4 AA                      	stosb
 31353 000028F5 E2F4                    	loop	dsm_next_char
 31354                                  blankout:
 31355 000028F7 E304                    	jcxz	dsm_exit
 31356 000028F9 B020                    	mov	al, ' '
 31357 000028FB F3AA                    	rep	stosb			; blank out the rest
 31358                                  dsm_exit:
 31359 000028FD 58                      	pop	ax			; restore load addr
 31360 000028FE 5E                      	pop	si
 31361 000028FF 1F                      	pop	ds
 31362 00002900 5F                      	pop	di
 31363 00002901 07                      	pop	es
 31364 00002902 C3                      	retn

 31367                                  ;
 31368                                  ; procedure : SizeDevice
 31369                                  ;
 31370                                  ;	Input : ES:SI - points to device file to be sized
 31371                                  ;
 31372                                  ;	Output : Carry set if file cannot be opened or if it is an OS2EXE file
 31373                                  ;
 31374                                  ;	Calculates the size of the device file in paras and stores it
 31375                                  ;	in DevSize
 31376                                  ;
 31377                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31378                                  
 31379                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31380                                  SizeDevice:
 31381                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31382                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31383 00002903 1E                      	push	ds ; *
 31384 00002904 06                      	push	es
 31385 00002905 1F                      	pop	ds
 31386 00002906 89F2                    	mov	dx,si			; ds:dx -> file name
 31387 00002908 B8003D                  	mov	ax,3D00h		; open
 31388 0000290B CD21                    	int	21h
 31389 0000290D 7243                    	jc	short sd_err		; open failed
 31390                                  
 31391 0000290F 89C3                    	mov	bx,ax			; BX - file handle
 31392 00002911 B80242                  	mov	ax,4202h		; seek
 31393 00002914 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 31394 00002916 89CA                    	mov	dx,cx			; to end of file
 31395 00002918 CD21                    	int	21h
 31396 0000291A 722F                    	jc	short sd_close		; did seek fail (impossible)
 31397 0000291C 83C00F                  	add	ax,15			; para convert
 31398 0000291F 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31399 00002922 F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h		; size > 0ffff paras ?
 31400 00002926 7409                    	jz	short szdev1		; no
 31401 00002928 2EC706[EA1E]FFFF        	mov	word [cs:DevSize],0FFFFh ; invalid device size
 31402                                  					; assuming that we fail later
 31403 0000292F EB1A                    	jmp	short sd_close
 31404                                  szdev1:
 31405 00002931 B104                    	mov	cl,4			; convert it to paras
 31406 00002933 D3E8                    	shr	ax,cl
 31407 00002935 B10C                    	mov	cl,12
 31408 00002937 D3E2                    	shl	dx,cl
 31409 00002939 09D0                    	or	ax,dx
 31410                                  	;
 31411                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31412 0000293B 2E3B06[081F]            	cmp     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31413                                  	;ja	short szdev2
 31414                                  	; 14/08/2023
 31415 00002940 7305                    	jnb	short szdev2
 31416 00002942 2EA1[081F]              	mov     ax,[cs:DevSizeOption]
 31417                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31418 00002946 F8                      	clc
 31419                                  szdev2:
 31420 00002947 2EA3[EA1E]              	mov	[cs:DevSize],ax		; save file size
 31421                                  
 31422                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31423                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31424                                  	; cf=0
 31425                                  	;clc
 31426                                  sd_close:
 31427 0000294B 9C                      	pushf				; let close not spoil our
 31428                                  					;  carry flag
 31429 0000294C B8003E                  	mov	ax,3E00h		; close
 31430 0000294F CD21                    	int	21h			; we are not checking for err
 31431 00002951 9D                      	popf
 31432                                  sd_err:
 31433                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 31434                                  	; 11/12/2022 ; *
 31435 00002952 1F                      	pop     ds ; *
 31436 00002953 C3                      	retn

 31594                                  ;
 31595                                  ; procedure : DevBreak
 31596                                  ;
 31597                                  ;	Input : DevLoadAddr & DevBrkAddr
 31598                                  ;	Output : none
 31599                                  ;
 31600                                  ;	Marks a succesful install of a device driver
 31601                                  ;	Sets device size field in sub-arena &
 31602                                  ;	Updates Free ptr in UMB or adjusts memhi
 31603                                  ;
 31604                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31605

 31747                                  ;
 31748                                  ; procedure : GetHexNum
 31749                                  ;
 31750                                  ;	Converts an ascii string terminated by a delimiter into binary.
 31751                                  ;	Assumes that the ES:SI points to a Hexadecimal string
 31752                                  ;
 31753                                  ;	Returns in AX the number number of paras equivalent to the
 31754                                  ;	hex number of bytes specified by the hexadecimal string.
 31755                                  ;
 31756                                  ;	Returns carry in case it encountered a non-hex character or
 31757                                  ;	if it encountered crlf
 31758                                  ;
 31759                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31760                                  
 31761                                  ; 13/05/2019
 31762                                  
 31763                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 31764                                  	; (SYSINIT:2DA5h)
 31765                                  GetHexNum:
 31766 00002A37 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax
 31767 00002A39 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 31768                                  ghn_next:
 31769 00002A3B 268A1C                  	mov	bl,[es:si]
 31770 00002A3E 80FB0D                  	cmp	bl,cr  ; 0Dh
 31771 00002A41 7436                    	je	short ghn_err
 31772 00002A43 80FB0A                  	cmp	bl,lf  ; 0Ah
 31773 00002A46 7431                    	je	short ghn_err
 31774 00002A48 50                      	push	ax
 31775 00002A49 88D8                    	mov	al,bl
 31776 00002A4B E83706                  	call	delim
 31777 00002A4E 58                      	pop	ax
 31778                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31779 00002A4F B90400                  	mov	cx, 4
 31780 00002A52 7410                    	jz	short ghn_into_paras
 31781 00002A54 E82400                  	call	GetNibble
 31782                                  	;jc	short ghn_err
 31783                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31784 00002A57 7221                    	jc	short ghn_ret ; cf=1
 31785                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31786                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31787                                  ghn_shift1:
 31788 00002A59 D1E0                    	shl	ax,1
 31789 00002A5B D1D2                    	rcl	dx,1
 31790 00002A5D E2FA                    	loop	ghn_shift1
 31791 00002A5F 08D8                    	or	al,bl
 31792 00002A61 46                      	inc	si
 31793 00002A62 EBD7                    	jmp	short ghn_next
 31794                                  ghn_into_paras:
 31795 00002A64 83C00F                  	add	ax,15
 31796 00002A67 83D200                  	adc	dx,0
 31797 00002A6A F7C2F0FF                	test	dx,0FFF0h
 31798 00002A6E 7509                    	jnz	short ghn_err
 31799                                  	; 04/01/2023
 31800                                  	;mov	cx,4
 31801                                  ghn_shift2:
 31802 00002A70 F8                      	clc
 31803 00002A71 D1DA                    	rcr	dx,1
 31804 00002A73 D1D8                    	rcr	ax,1
 31805 00002A75 E2F9                    	loop	ghn_shift2
 31806 00002A77 F8                      	clc
 31807 00002A78 C3                      	retn
 31808                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31809                                  ghn_err:
 31810                                  gnib_err:
 31811 00002A79 F9                      	stc
 31812                                  ghn_ret:
 31813                                  gnib_ret:
 31814 00002A7A C3                      	retn

 31818                                  ; procedure : GetNibble
 31819                                  ;
 31820                                  ;	Convert one nibble (hex digit) in BL into binary
 31821                                  ;
 31822                                  ;	Retruns binary value in BL
 31823                                  ;
 31824                                  ;	Returns carry if BL contains non-hex digit
 31825                                  ;
 31826                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31827                                  
 31828                                  GetNibble:
 31829 00002A7B 80FB30                  	cmp	bl,'0'
 31830                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 31831                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31832 00002A7E 72FA                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 31833 00002A80 80FB39                  	cmp	bl,'9'
 31834 00002A83 7704                    	ja	short is_it_hex
 31835 00002A85 80EB30                  	sub	bl,'0'		; clc
 31836 00002A88 C3                      	retn
 31837                                  is_it_hex:
 31838 00002A89 80FB41                  	cmp	bl,'A'
 31839                                  	;jb	short gnib_err
 31840                                  	; 11/12/2022
 31841 00002A8C 72EC                    	jb	short gnib_ret ; cf=1
 31842 00002A8E 80FB46                  	cmp	bl,'F'
 31843 00002A91 77E6                    	ja	short gnib_err ; 11/12/2022
 31844 00002A93 80EB37                  	sub	bl,'A'- 10	; clc
 31845 00002A96 C3                      	retn
 31846                                  	; 11/12/2022

 31848                                  ;	stc
 31849                                  ;gnib_ret:

 31935                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31936                                  ;
 31937                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_allocate
 31938                                  ;
 31939                                  ; Inputs		: DS = data
 31940                                  ;
 31941                                  ; Outputs		: if UMB available
 31942                                  ;				Allocates the largest available UMB and 
 31943                                  ;			  	BX = segment of allocated block
 31944                                  ;				DX = size of allocated block
 31945                                  ;				NC
 31946                                  ;			  else 
 31947                                  ;				CY
 31948                                  ;
 31949                                  ; Uses			: BX, DX
 31950                                  ;
 31951                                  ;-------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31952                                  
 31953                                  umb_allocate:
 31954                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31955                                  	; ds = cs
 31956 00002AD8 50                      	push	ax

 31959                                  					;   possible
 31960                                  	; 31/12/2022

 31962                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 31963                                  					; dx now contains the size of
 31964                                  					; the largest UMB
 31965 00002AE2 09D2                    	or	dx,dx
 31966 00002AE4 740D                    	jz	short ua_err
 31967

 31969                                  
 31970                                  	; 31/12/2022
 31971 00002AE8 FF1E[FF1E]              	call	far [DevXMSAddr]
 31972                                  	;call	far [cs:DevXMSAddr]
 31973

 31975 00002AEF 7502                    	jne	short ua_err		; N: error
 31976                                  	;clc

 31978                                  	; 12/12/2022
 31979                                  	; cf=0
 31980                                  	;clc

 31988                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 31989                                  ;
 31990                                  ; Procedure Name	: umb_insert
 31991                                  ;
 31992                                  ; Inputs		: DOSDATA:UMB_HEAD = start of umb chain
 31993                                  ;			: BX = seg address of UMB to be linked in
 31994                                  ;			: DX = size of UMB to be linked in paras
 31995                                  ;			; DS = data
 31996                                  ;
 31997                                  ; Outputs		: links the UMB into the arena chain
 31998                                  ;
 31999                                  ; Uses			: AX, CX, ES, DX, BX
 32000                                  ;
 32001                                  ;---------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32002                                  
 32003                                  umb_insert:
 32004 00002AF6 1E                      	push	ds
 32005                                  
 32006                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32007                                  	; ds = cs
 32008                                  
 32009                                  	;mov	ds,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32010 00002AF7 8E1E[161F]              	mov	ds,[DevDOSData] ; 31/12/2022 
 32011                                  	;mov	ds,[8Ch]
 32012 00002AFB 8E1E8C00                	mov	ds,[UMB_ARENA]		; es = UMB_HEAD
 32013 00002AFF 8CD8                    	mov	ax,ds
 32014 00002B01 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32015                                  ui_next:
 32016 00002B03 39D8                    	cmp	ax,bx			; Q: is current block above
 32017                                  					;    new block
 32018 00002B05 770F                    	ja	short ui_insert		; Y: insert it
 32019                                  					; Q: is current block the
 32020                                  					;    last
 32021 00002B07 26803E00005A            	cmp	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32022 00002B0D 745C                    	je	short ui_append		; Y: append new block to chain
 32023                                  					; N: get next block
 32024 00002B0F 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax			; M005
 32025                                  	;call	get_next		; ax = es = next block
 32026 00002B11 E8E200                  	call	_get_next_ ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32027 00002B14 EBED                    	jmp	short ui_next
 32028                                  
 32029                                  ui_insert:
 32030 00002B16 8CD9                    	mov	cx,ds			; ds = previous arena
 32031 00002B18 41                      	inc	cx			; top of previous block
 32032                                  
 32033 00002B19 29D9                    	sub	cx,bx
 32034 00002B1B F7D9                    	neg	cx			; cx = size of used block
 32035                                  	;mov	byte [0],'M'
 32036 00002B1D C60600004D              	mov	byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32037                                  	;mov	word [1],8
 32038 00002B22 C70601000800            	mov	word [ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32039                                  	;mov	[3],cx
 32040 00002B28 890E0300                	mov	[ARENA.SIZE],cx	
 32041                                  	;mov	word [8],4353h ; 'SC'
 32042 00002B2C C70608005343            	mov	word [ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32043                                  
 32044                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32045                                  
 32046 00002B32 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32047 00002B34 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32048 00002B3A 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0
 32049                                  					; mark as free

 32051                                  					; start & end of new block

 32054                                  ; prepare arena at end of new block
 32055

 32059 00002B4E 43                      	inc	bx			; bx=top of new block
 32060                                  
 32061                                  					; ax contains arena just above
 32062                                  					; this block
 32063 00002B4F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = size of used block
 32064

 32066 00002B57 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32067 00002B5E 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32068 00002B62 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h

 32071                                  
 32072                                  ui_append:
 32073                                  					; es = arena of last block	
 32074 00002B6B 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]	; ax=top of last block-1 para
 32075 00002B70 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1	; reflect the space we are
 32076                                  					; going to rsrv on top of this 
 32077                                  					; block for the next arena.
 32078                                  	; 13/05/2019
 32079 00002B76 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32080                                  
 32081 00002B7C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx=top of prev block-1
 32082 00002B7E 40                      	inc	ax
 32083 00002B7F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax=top of prev block - 
 32084                                  					;    seg. address of new block
 32085 00002B81 F7D8                    	neg	ax

 32087 00002B83 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; ds = arena of unused block

 32089 00002B85 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal
 32090 00002B8B 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32091 00002B92 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32092 00002B96 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC'
 32093                                  
 32094                                  ; prepare the arena at start of new block
 32095 00002B9D 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx
 32096 00002B9F 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end
 32097 00002BA5 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system
 32098                                  					; mark as free

 32100 00002BAD 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32101                                  ui_done:
 32102                                  uc_done: ; 31/12/2022 ; *!
 32103 00002BB2 1F                      	pop	ds
 32104                                  	; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32105                                  ;uc_done:	; 18/12/2022
 32106 00002BB3 C3                      	retn
 32107                                  
 32108                                  ; 13/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32109                                  
 32110                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32111                                  ;
 32112                                  ;**	umb_coalesce - Combine free blocks ahead with current block
 32113                                  ;
 32114                                  ;	Coalesce adds the block following the argument to the argument block,
 32115                                  ;	iff it's free.  Coalesce is usually used to join free blocks, but
 32116                                  ;	some callers (such as $setblock) use it to join a free block to it's
 32117                                  ;	preceeding allocated block.
 32118                                  ;
 32119                                  ;	EXIT	'C' clear if OK
 32120                                  ;		  (ds) unchanged, this block updated
 32121                                  ;		  (ax) = address of next block, IFF not at end
 32122                                  ;		'C' set if arena trashed
 32123                                  ;	USES	cx, di, ds, es
 32124                                  ;
 32125                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32126                                  
 32127                                  umb_coalesce:
 32128                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32129                                  	; ds = cs
 32130 00002BB4 1E                      	push	ds ; *!
 32131                                  
 32132 00002BB5 31FF                    	xor	di, di
 32133                                  
 32134                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32135                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32136 00002BB7 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32137 00002BBB 268E068C00              	mov	es,[es:UMB_ARENA]	; es = UMB_HEAD
 32138                                  uc_nextfree:
 32139 00002BC0 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32140 00002BC2 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32141                                  	;cmp	[es:1],di
 32142 00002BC4 26393E0100              	cmp	[es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is current arena free
 32143 00002BC9 7407                    	je	short uc_again		; Y: try to coalesce with next block
 32144                                  					; N: get next arena
 32145 00002BCB E82100                  	call	get_next		; es, ax = next arena
 32146 00002BCE 72E2                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32147 00002BD0 EBEE                    	jmp	short uc_nextfree
 32148                                  uc_again:
 32149 00002BD2 E81A00                  	call	get_next		; ES, AX <- next block
 32150 00002BD5 72DB                    	jc	short uc_done	; *!
 32151                                  uc_check:
 32152 00002BD7 26393E0100              	cmp     [es:ARENA.OWNER],di	; Q: is arena free
 32153 00002BDC 75E2                    	jne	short uc_nextfree	; N: get next free arena
 32154                                  					; Y: coalesce
 32155 00002BDE 268B0E0300              	mov     cx,[es:ARENA.SIZE]      ; cx <- next block size
 32156 00002BE3 41                      	inc     cx                      ; cx <- cx + 1 (for header size)
 32157                                  	;add	[3],cx
 32158 00002BE4 010E0300                	add     [ARENA.SIZE],cx		; current size <- current size + cx
 32159 00002BE8 268A0D                  	mov     cl,[es:di]              ; move up signature
 32160 00002BEB 880D                    	mov     [di],cl
 32161 00002BED EBE3                    	jmp     short uc_again		; try again
 32162                                  
 32163                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32164                                  ;uc_done:
 32165                                  	;retn
 32166                                  
 32167                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32168                                  ;
 32169                                  ;**	get_next - Find Next item in Arena
 32170                                  ;
 32171                                  ;	ENTRY	dS - pointer to block head
 32172                                  ;	EXIT	AX,ES - pointers to next head
 32173                                  ;		'C' set if arena damaged
 32174                                  ;
 32175                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32176                                  
 32177                                  	; 01/11/2022
 32178                                  get_next:
 32179 00002BEF 803E00005A              	cmp	byte [0],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32180 00002BF4 740A                    	je	short gn_err
 32181                                  _get_next_:
 32182 00002BF6 8CD8                    	mov     ax,ds                   ; ax=current block
 32183 00002BF8 03060300                	add     ax,[ARENA.SIZE]		; ax=ax + current block length
 32184 00002BFC 40                      	inc     ax                      ; remember that header!
 32185 00002BFD 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32186                                  	;clc
 32187                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32188                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32189                                  	; cf=0
 32190                                  	;clc
 32191 00002BFF C3                      	retn
 32192                                  gn_err:
 32193 00002C00 F9                      	stc
 32194                                  	; 11/12/2022	
 32195                                  lfu_err:	 ; cf=1
 32196 00002C01 C3                      	retn

 32198                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32199                                  ;
 32200                                  ; procedure : LinkFirstUMB
 32201                                  ;
 32202                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32203                                  
 32204                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32205                                  	; (SYSINIT:2F81h)
 32206                                  LinkFirstUMB:
 32207                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32208                                  	; ds = cs
 32209 00002C02 E8D3FE                  	call	umb_allocate
 32210 00002C05 72FA                    	jc	short lfu_err  ; ds = cs ; 31/12/2022
 32211                                  
 32212                                  ; bx = segment of allocated UMB
 32213                                  ; dx = size of UMB
 32214                                  
 32215                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32216                                  	; ds = cs
 32217                                  
 32218 00002C07 CD12                    	int	12h			; ax = size of memory
 32219 00002C09 B106                    	mov	cl,6
 32220 00002C0B D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; ax = size in paragraphs
 32221                                  
 32222 00002C0D 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax			; cx = size in paras
 32223 00002C0F 29D8                    	sub	ax,bx			; ax = - size of unused block
 32224                                  
 32225 00002C11 F7D8                    	neg	ax
 32226                                  
 32227 00002C13 83E901                  	sub	cx,1			; cx = first umb_arena
 32228 00002C16 8EC1                    	mov	es,cx			; es = first umb_arena
 32229                                  	
 32230 00002C18 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32231 00002C1E 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8	; mark as system owned
 32232                                  					
 32233 00002C25 26A30300                	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],ax	
 32234 00002C29 26C70608005343          	mov	word [es:ARENA.NAME],'SC' ; 4353h
 32235                                  
 32236                                  ; put in the arena for the first UMB
 32237                                  
 32238 00002C30 8EC3                    	mov	es,bx			; es has first free umb seg
 32239 00002C32 26C60600005A            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32240 00002C38 26C70601000000          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],arena_owner_system ; 0	
 32241                                  					; mark as free 
 32242 00002C3F 4A                      	dec	dx			; make room for arena
 32243 00002C40 2689160300              	mov	[es:ARENA.SIZE],dx	
 32244                                  
 32245                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]
 32246                                  	; 31/12/2022
 32247 00002C45 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData] ; ds = cs
 32248 00002C49 BF8C00                  	mov	di,UMB_ARENA ; 8Ch
 32249 00002C4C 26890D                  	mov	[es:di],cx		; initialize umb_head in DOS
 32250                                  					;  data segment with the arena
 32251                                  					;  just below Top of Mem
 32252                                  
 32253                                  ; we must now scan the arena chain and update the size of the last arena
 32254                                  
 32255 00002C4F BF2400                  	mov	di,DOS_ARENA ; 24h
 32256 00002C52 268E05                  	mov	es,[es:di]		; es = start arena
 32257 00002C55 31FF                    	xor	di,di
 32258                                  ;scan_next
 32259                                  ; 09/12/2022
 32260                                  scannext:
 32261 00002C57 26803D5A                	cmp	byte [es:di],arena_signature_end  ; 'Z'
 32262 00002C5B 740C                    	je	short got_last
 32263                                  	
 32264 00002C5D 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32265 00002C5F 2603060300              	add	ax,[es:ARENA.SIZE]
 32266 00002C64 40                      	inc	ax
 32267 00002C65 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32268                                  	;jmp	short scan_next
 32269                                  	; 09/12/2022
 32270 00002C67 EBEE                    	jmp	short scannext
 32271                                  got_last:
 32272 00002C69 26832E030001            	sub	word [es:ARENA.SIZE],1
 32273 00002C6F 26C60600004D            	mov	byte [es:ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_normal ; 'M'
 32274                                  	;clc
 32275                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32276                                  	; 11/12/2022
 32277                                  	; cf=0
 32278                                  	;clc
 32279 00002C75 C3                      	retn
 32280                                  
 32281                                  ; 11/12/2022
 32282                                  ;;lfu_err:
 32283                                  ;	;stc
 32284                                  ;	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32285                                  ;	; 11/12/2022
 32286                                  ;	; cf=1
 32287                                  ;	;stc
 32288                                  ;	retn

 32290                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32291                                  ;
 32292                                  ; procedure : ShrinkUMB
 32293                                  ;
 32294                                  ;	Shrinks the current UMB in use, so that the unused portions
 32295                                  ;	of the UMB is given back to the DOS free mem pool
 32296                                  ;
 32297                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32298                                  
 32299                                  ShrinkUMB:
 32300                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32301                                  	; ds = cs
 32302 00002C76 833E[F91E]00            	cmp	word [DevUMBAddr],0
 32303                                  	;cmp	word [cs:DevUMBAddr],0
 32304 00002C7B 7421                    	je	short su_exit
 32305 00002C7D 06                      	push	es
 32306 00002C7E 53                      	push	bx
 32307                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32308                                  	;mov	bx,[cs:DevUMBFree]
 32309                                  	;sub	bx,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32310                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevUMBAddr]
 32311 00002C7F 8B1E[FD1E]              	mov	bx,[DevUMBFree]
 32312 00002C83 2B1E[F91E]              	sub	bx,[DevUMBAddr]
 32313 00002C87 8E06[F91E]              	mov	es,[DevUMBAddr]
 32314                                  	
 32315 00002C8B B8004A                  	mov	ax,4A00h
 32316 00002C8E CD21                    	int	21h
 32317                                  		; DOS - 2+ - ADJUST MEMORY BLOCK SIZE (SETBLOCK)
 32318                                  		; ES = segment address of block to change
 32319                                  		; BX = new size in paragraphs
 32320 00002C90 8CC0                    	mov	ax,es
 32321 00002C92 48                      	dec	ax
 32322 00002C93 8EC0                    	mov	es,ax
 32323 00002C95 26C70601000800          	mov	word [es:ARENA.OWNER],8
 32324 00002C9C 5B                      	pop	bx
 32325 00002C9D 07                      	pop	es
 32326                                  su_exit:
 32327 00002C9E C3                      	retn

 32334                                  ;
 32335                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32336                                  
 32337                                  UnlinkUMB:
 32338                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32339                                  	; ds = cs
 32340 00002C9F 1E                      	push	ds
 32341 00002CA0 06                      	push	es
 32342                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32343 00002CA1 803E[151F]00            	cmp	byte [FirstUMBLinked],0
 32344                                  	;cmp	byte [cs:FirstUMBLinked],0
 32345 00002CA6 7420                    	je	short ulu_x		; nothing to unlink
 32346                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32347 00002CA8 8E06[161F]              	mov	es,[DevDOSData]
 32348                                  	;mov	es,[cs:DevDOSData]	; get DOS data seg
 32349 00002CAC 268E1E2400              	mov	ds,[es:DOS_ARENA]
 32350 00002CB1 268B3E8C00              	mov	di,[es:UMB_ARENA]
 32351                                  ulu_next:
 32352 00002CB6 E836FF                  	call	get_next
 32353 00002CB9 720D                    	jc	short ulu_x
 32354 00002CBB 39C7                    	cmp	di,ax			; is the next one UMB ?
 32355 00002CBD 7404                    	je	short ulu_found
 32356 00002CBF 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax
 32357 00002CC1 EBF3                    	jmp	short ulu_next
 32358                                  ulu_found:
 32359                                  	;mov	byte [0],'Z'
 32360 00002CC3 C60600005A              	mov     byte [ARENA.SIGNATURE],arena_signature_end ; 'Z'
 32361                                  ulu_x:
 32362 00002CC8 07                      	pop	es
 32363 00002CC9 1F                      	pop	ds
 32364 00002CCA C3                      	retn

 32366                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32367                                  ; SYSINIT2.ASM - MSDOS 6.0 - 1991
 32368                                  ; ----------------------------------------------------------------------
 32369                                  ; 14/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32370                                  
 32371                                  ; Multiple configuration block support  Created 16-Mar-1992 by JeffPar
 32372                                  ;
 32373                                  ; Summary:
 32374                                  ;
 32375                                  ;   The procedure "organize" crunches the in-memory copy of config.sys
 32376                                  ;   into lines delimited by CR/LF (sometimes no CR, but *always* an LF)
 32377                                  ;   with the leading "keyword=" replaced by single character codes (eg, B
 32378                                  ;   for BUFFERS, D for DEVICE, Z for any unrecognized keyword); see comtab
 32379                                  ;   and/or config.inc for the full list.
 32380                                  ;
 32381                                  ;   [blockname] and INCLUDE are the major syntactical additions for multi-
 32382                                  ;   configuration support. blockname is either MENU, which contains one
 32383                                  ;   or more MENUITEM lines, an optional MENUDEFAULT (which includes optional
 32384                                  ;   time-out), or any user-defined keyword, such as NETWORK, CD-ROM, etc.
 32385                                  ;   INCLUDE allows the current block to name another block for inclusion
 32386                                  ;   during the processing phase of CONFIG.SYS. An INCLUDE is only honored
 32387                                  ;   once, precluding nasty infinite-loop scenarios. If blocks are present
 32388                                  ;   without a MENU block, then only lines inside COMMON blocks are processed.
 32389                                  ;
 32390                                  ; Example:
 32391                                  ;
 32392                                  ;   [menu]
 32393                                  ;   menuitem=misc,Miscellaneous
 32394                                  ;   menuitem=network,Network Configuration
 32395                                  ;   menudefault=network,15
 32396                                  ;
 32397                                  ;   [network]
 32398                                  ;   include misc
 32399                                  ;   device=foo
 32400                                  ;
 32401                                  ;   [misc]
 32402                                  ;   device=bar
 32403                                  ;   include alternate
 32404                                  ;
 32405                                  ;   [alternate]
 32406                                  ;   device=tar
 32407                                  ;
 32408                                  ;
 32409                                  ;   When the menu is displayed
 32410                                  ;
 32411                                  ;    1. Miscellaneous
 32412                                  ;    2. Network Configuration
 32413                                  ;
 32414                                  ;   #2 is highlighted as the default option, and will be automatically
 32415                                  ;   selected after 15 seconds. It will invoke the following lines in the
 32416                                  ;   following order:
 32417                                  ;
 32418                                  ;       DEVICE=BAR
 32419                                  ;       DEVICE=TAR
 32420                                  ;       DEVICE=FOO
 32421                                  ;
 32422                                  
 32423                                  ;MULTI_CONFIG equ 1
 32424                                  
 32425                                  ; the following depend on the positions of the various letters in switchlist
 32426                                  
 32427                                  switchnum	equ 11111000b ; 0F8h	; which switches require number
 32428                                  
 32429                                  flagec35	equ 00000100b ; 4	; electrically compatible 3.5 inch disk drive
 32430                                  flagdrive	equ 00001000b ; 8 
 32431                                  flagcyln	equ 00010000b ; 16
 32432                                  flagseclim	equ 00100000b ; 32
 32433                                  flagheads	equ 01000000b ; 64
 32434                                  flagff		equ 10000000b ; 128
 32435                                  
 32436                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32437                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32438                                  
 32439                                  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3E78h
 32440                                  
 32441                                  ; 01/11/2022 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32442                                  ; MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:3054h
 32443                                  
 32444 00002CCB 00                      insert_blank:	db 	0
 32445

 32448                                  ; procedure : setparms
 32449                                  ;
 32450                                  ; the following set of routines is used to parse the drivparm = command in
 32451                                  ; the config.sys file to change the default drive parameters.
 32452                                  ;
 32453                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32454                                  
 32455                                  setparms:
 32456 00002CCC 1E                      	push	ds
 32457 00002CCD 50                      	push	ax
 32458 00002CCE 53                      	push	bx
 32459 00002CCF 51                      	push	cx
 32460 00002CD0 52                      	push	dx
 32461                                  
 32462 00002CD1 0E                      	push	cs
 32463 00002CD2 1F                      	pop	ds
 32464                                  
 32465 00002CD3 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx
 32466 00002CD5 8A1E[0E37]              	mov	bl,[drive]
 32467                                  	; 18/12/2022
 32468 00002CD9 43                      	inc	bx
 32469                                  	;inc	bl			; get it correct for ioctl call
 32470                                  					; (1=a,2=b...)
 32471 00002CDA BA[E635]                	mov	dx,deviceparameters
 32472 00002CDD B444                    	mov	ah,IOCTL ; 44h
 32473 00002CDF B00D                    	mov	al,GENERIC_IOCTL ; 0Dh
 32474 00002CE1 B508                    	mov	ch,RAWIO ; 8
 32475 00002CE3 B140                    	mov	cl,SET_DEVICE_PARAMETERS ; 40h
 32476 00002CE5 CD21                    	int	21h
 32477                                  
 32478                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32479                                  ;
 32480                                  ;	;;mov	ax,Bios_Data		; get Bios_Data segment
 32481                                  ;	;mov	ax,KERNEL_SEGMENT ; 70h
 32482                                  ;	; 21/10/2022
 32483                                  ;	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 32484                                  ;	mov	ds,ax			; set Bios_Data segment
 32485                                  ;
 32486                                  ;	test	word [cs:switches],flagec35 ; 4
 32487                                  ;	jz	short not_ec35
 32488                                  
 32489                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32490                                  	;test	word [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 32491                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32492 00002CE7 F606[0F37]04            	test	byte [switches],flagec35 ; 4
 32493 00002CEC 7411                    	jz	short eot_ok
 32494                                  
 32495                                  	;mov	cl,[cs:drive]		; which drive was this for?
 32496                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32497 00002CEE 8A0E[0E37]              	mov	cl,[drive]
 32498 00002CF2 B87000                  	mov	ax,DOSBIODATASEG ; 0070h	
 32499 00002CF5 8ED8                    	mov	ds,ax	
 32500                                  
 32501 00002CF7 B001                    	mov	al,1			; assume drive 0
 32502 00002CF9 D2E0                    	shl	al,cl			; set proper bit depending on drive
 32503                                  	;or	[531h],al ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EACh)
 32504 00002CFB 0806[3105]              	or	[ec35_flag],al		; set the bit in the permanent flags
 32505                                  
 32506                                  ; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32507                                  ;
 32508                                  ;not_ec35:
 32509                                  ;;	Now adjust the BIOS's EOT variable if our new drive has more
 32510                                  ;;	sectors per track than any old ones.
 32511                                  ;
 32512                                  ;	;mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+20]
 32513                                  ;	mov	al,[cs:deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_BPB+A_BPB.BPB_SECTORSPERTRACK]
 32514                                  ;	;cmp	al,[12Ch] ; (MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS Offset SYINIT:3EB4h)
 32515                                  ;	cmp	al,[EOT]
 32516                                  ;	jbe	short eot_ok
 32517                                  ;	mov	[EOT],al
 32518                                  
 32519                                  eot_ok:
 32520 00002CFF 5A                      	pop	dx			; fix up all the registers
 32521 00002D00 59                      	pop	cx
 32522 00002D01 5B                      	pop	bx
 32523 00002D02 58                      	pop	ax
 32524 00002D03 1F                      	pop	ds ; 13/05/2019
 32525 00002D04 C3                      	retn

 32541                                  	;mov	byte [deviceparameters+1],2

 32543                                  	;mov	word [deviceparameters+2],0
 32544 00002D13 C706[E835]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],0

 32554                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32555                                  ;
 32556                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32557                                  ;
 32558                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32559                                  ;
 32560                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32561                                  
 32562                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32563                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32564                                  
 32565                                  parseline:
 32566                                  	push	ds
 32567                                  
 32568                                  	push	cs
 32569                                  	pop	ds
 32570                                  
 32571                                  nextswtch:
 32572                                  	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32573                                  	je	short done_line
 32574                                  	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32575                                  	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32576                                  
 32577                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32578                                  
 32579                                  	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32580                                  	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32581                                  	cmp	al,'/'
 32582                                  	je	short getparm
 32583                                  	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32584                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32585                                  
 32586                                  getparm:
 32587                                  	call	check_switch
 32588                                  	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32589                                  	jc	short swterr
 32590                                  getnext:
 32591                                  	call	getchr
 32592                                  	jc	short done_line
 32593                                  	jmp	short nextswtch
 32594                                  swterr:
 32595                                  	jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32596                                  
 32597                                  done_line:
 32598                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32599                                  	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32600                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32601                                  	jnz	short okay
 32602                                  	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32603                                  	jmp	short exitpl
 32604                                  
 32605                                  okay:
 32606                                  	mov	ax,[switches]
 32607                                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32608                                  	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32609                                  	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32610                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32611                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32612                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32613                                  	; cf=0
 32614                                  	;clc
 32615                                  	call	setdeviceparameters
 32616                                  exitpl:
 32617                                  	pop	ds
 32618                                  	retn
 32619                                  put_back:
 32620                                  	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32621                                  	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32622                                  	jmp	short done_line
 32623                                  
 32624                                  %endif
 32625                                  
 32626                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32627                                  ;
 32628                                  ; procedure : check_switch
 32629                                  ;
 32630                                  ; processes a switch in the input. it ensures that the switch is valid, and
 32631                                  ; gets the number, if any required, following the switch. the switch and the
 32632                                  ; number *must* be separated by a colon. carry is set if there is any kind of
 32633                                  ; error.
 32634                                  ;
 32635                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32636                                  
 32637                                  check_switch:
 32638 00002D21 E817FA                  	call	getchr
 32639                                  	;jc	short err_check
 32640 00002D24 724E                    	jc	short err_chk
 32641 00002D26 24DF                            and     al,0DFh                 ; convert it to upper case
 32642 00002D28 3C41                    	cmp	al,'A'
 32643                                  	;jb	short err_check
 32644 00002D2A 7248                    	jb	short err_chk ; 15/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 32645 00002D2C 3C5A                    	cmp	al,'Z'
 32646 00002D2E 7743                    	ja	short err_check
 32647                                  
 32648 00002D30 06                      	push	es
 32649                                  
 32650 00002D31 0E                      	push	cs
 32651 00002D32 07                      	pop	es
 32652                                  
 32653 00002D33 8A0E[A237]              	mov	cl,[switchlist]		; get number of valid switches
 32654 00002D37 B500                    	mov	ch,0
 32655 00002D39 BF[A337]                	mov	di,1+switchlist		; point to string of valid switches
 32656 00002D3C F2AE                    	repne	scasb
 32657                                  
 32658 00002D3E 07                      	pop	es
 32659 00002D3F 7532                    	jnz	short err_check
 32660                                  
 32661 00002D41 B80100                  	mov	ax,1
 32662 00002D44 D3E0                    	shl	ax,cl			; set bit to indicate switch
 32663 00002D46 8B1E[0F37]              	mov	bx,[switches]		; get switches so far
 32664 00002D4A 09C3                    	or	bx,ax			; save this with other switches
 32665 00002D4C 89C1                    	mov	cx,ax
 32666                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32667 00002D4E A8F8                    	test	al,switchnum ; 0F8h
 32668                                  	;test	ax,switchnum ; 0F8h	; test against switches that require number to follow
 32669 00002D50 741E                    	jz	short done_swtch
 32670                                  
 32671 00002D52 E8E6F9                  	call	getchr
 32672 00002D55 721A                    	jc	short err_swtch
 32673                                  
 32674 00002D57 3C3A                    	cmp	al,':'
 32675 00002D59 7516                    	jne	short err_swtch
 32676                                  
 32677 00002D5B E8DDF9                  	call	getchr
 32678 00002D5E 53                      	push	bx			; preserve switches
 32679                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32680                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],' '	; allow space separators
 32681                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32682                                  	; ds = cs
 32683 00002D5F C606[2A03]20            	mov	byte [sepchr],' '
 32684 00002D64 E8D803                  	call	getnum
 32685                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 32686                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32687 00002D67 C606[2A03]00            	mov	byte [sepchr],0
 32688 00002D6C 5B                      	pop	bx			; restore switches
 32689                                  
 32690                                  ; because getnum does not consider carriage-return or line-feed as ok, we do
 32691                                  ; not check for carry set here. if there is an error, it will be detected
 32692                                  ; further on (hopefully).
 32693                                  
 32694 00002D6D E80500                  	call	process_num
 32695                                  
 32696                                  done_swtch:
 32697                                  	;clc
 32698                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32699                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32700                                  	; cf=0
 32701                                  	;clc
 32702 00002D70 C3                      	retn
 32703                                  
 32704                                  err_swtch:
 32705 00002D71 31CB                    	xor	bx,cx			; remove this switch from the records
 32706                                  err_check:
 32707 00002D73 F9                      	stc
 32708                                  err_chk:
 32709 00002D74 C3                      	retn

 32711                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32712                                  ;
 32713                                  ; procedure : process_num
 32714                                  ;
 32715                                  ; this routine takes the switch just input, and the number following (if any),
 32716                                  ; and sets the value in the appropriate variable. if the number input is zero
 32717                                  ; then it does nothing - it assumes the default value that is present in the
 32718                                  ; variable at the beginning. zero is ok for form factor and drive, however.
 32719                                  ;
 32720                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32721                                  
 32722                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32723                                  	; (SYSINIT:3156h)
 32724                                  process_num:
 32725 00002D75 850E[0F37]              	test	[switches],cx		; if this switch has been done before,
 32726 00002D79 752B                    	jnz	short done_ret		; ignore this one.
 32727                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32728 00002D7B F6C108                  	test	cl,flagdrive ; 8
 32729                                  	;test	cx,flagdrive ; 8
 32730 00002D7E 7404                    	jz	short try_f
 32731 00002D80 A2[0E37]                	mov	byte [drive],al
 32732                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32733                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32734                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32735                                  	; cf=0
 32736 00002D83 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32737                                  try_f:
 32738                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32739 00002D84 F6C180                  	test	cl,flagff ; 80h
 32740                                  	;test	cx,flagff ; 80h
 32741 00002D87 7404                    	jz	short try_t
 32742                                  
 32743                                  ; ensure that we do not get bogus form factors that are not supported
 32744                                  
 32745                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+1],al
 32746 00002D89 A2[E735]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICETYPE],al
 32747                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32748                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32749                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32750                                  	; cf=0
 32751 00002D8C C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32752                                  try_t:
 32753 00002D8D 09C0                    	or	ax,ax
 32754 00002D8F 7415                    	jz	short done_ret		; if number entered was 0, assume default value
 32755                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32756 00002D91 F6C110                  	test	cl,flagcyln ; 10h
 32757                                  	;test	cx,flagcyln ; 10h
 32758 00002D94 7404                    	jz	short try_s
 32759                                  
 32760                                  	;mov	[deviceparameters+4],ax
 32761 00002D96 A3[EA35]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_CYLINDERS],ax
 32762                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32763                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32764                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32765                                  	; cf=0
 32766 00002D99 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32767                                  try_s:
 32768                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32769 00002D9A F6C120                  	test	cl,flagseclim ; 20h
 32770                                  	;test	cx,flagseclim ; 20h
 32771 00002D9D 7404                    	jz	short try_h
 32772 00002D9F A3[0C37]                	mov	[slim],ax
 32773                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32774                                  	;jmp	short done_ret
 32775                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32776                                  	; cf=0
 32777 00002DA2 C3                      	retn	; 13/05/2019
 32778                                  
 32779                                  ; must be for number of heads
 32780                                  
 32781                                  try_h:
 32782 00002DA3 A3[0A37]                	mov	[hlim],ax
 32783                                  done_ret:
 32784                                  	;clc
 32785                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32786                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32787                                  	; cf=0 (test instruction resets cf)
 32788                                  	;clc
 32789 00002DA6 C3                      	retn
 32790                                  
 32791                                  ; 04/01/2023 - Retro DOS v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32792                                  %if 1

 32797                                  ;
 32798                                  ; procedure : parseline
 32799                                  ;
 32800                                  ; entry point is parseline. al contains the first character in command line.
 32801                                  ;
 32802                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 32803                                  
 32804                                  	; 01/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 32805                                  	; (SYSINIT:30ACh)
 32806                                  parseline:
 32807                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32808                                  	; ds = cs ; *
 32809                                  
 32810                                  	;push	ds ; *
 32811                                  
 32812                                  	;push	cs ; *
 32813                                  	;pop	ds ; *
 32814                                  
 32815                                  nextswtch:
 32816 00002DA7 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 32817 00002DA9 741C                    	je	short done_line
 32818 00002DAB 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; linefeed?
 32819 00002DAD 7421                    	je	short put_back		; put it back and done
 32820                                  
 32821                                  ; anything less or equal to a space is ignored.
 32822                                  
 32823 00002DAF 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '                  ; space?
 32824 00002DB1 760F                    	jbe	short getnext		; skip over space
 32825 00002DB3 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'
 32826 00002DB5 7402                    	je	short getparm
 32827 00002DB7 F9                      	stc				; mark error invalid-character-in-input
 32828                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32829                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32830                                  swterr:
 32831 00002DB8 C3                      	retn
 32832                                  
 32833                                  getparm:
 32834 00002DB9 E865FF                  	call	check_switch
 32835 00002DBC 891E[0F37]              	mov	[switches],bx		; save switches read so far
 32836 00002DC0 72F6                    	jc	short swterr
 32837                                  getnext:
 32838 00002DC2 E876F9                  	call	getchr
 32839                                  	;jc	short done_line
 32840                                  	;jmp	short nextswtch
 32841                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32842 00002DC5 73E0                    	jnc	short nextswtch
 32843                                  ;swterr:
 32844                                  	;jmp	short exitpl		; exit if error
 32845                                  
 32846                                  done_line:
 32847                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32848 00002DC7 F606[0F37]08            	test	byte [switches],flagdrive ; 8
 32849                                  	;test	word [switches],flagdrive ; 8 ; see if drive specified
 32850 00002DCC 750C                    	jnz	short okay
 32851 00002DCE F9                      	stc				; mark error no-drive-specified
 32852                                  	;jmp	short exitpl
 32853                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32854 00002DCF C3                      	retn
 32855                                  
 32856                                  ;exitpl:
 32857                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32858                                  	; ds = cs
 32859                                  	;;pop	ds ; *
 32860                                  	;retn
 32861                                  
 32862                                  put_back:
 32863 00002DD0 FF06[D203]              	inc	word [count]		; one more char to scan
 32864 00002DD4 FF0E[D603]              	dec	word [chrptr]		; back up over linefeed
 32865 00002DD8 EBED                    	jmp	short done_line
 32866                                  
 32867                                  okay:
 32868 00002DDA A1[0F37]                	mov	ax,[switches]
 32869 00002DDD 83E003                  	and	ax,0003h	    ; get flag bits for changeline and non-rem
 32870 00002DE0 A3[E835]                	mov	[deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_DEVICEATTRIBUTES],ax
 32871 00002DE3 C706[0C36]0000          	mov	word [deviceparameters+A_DEVICEPARAMETERS.DP_TRACKTABLEENTRIES],0
 32872                                  	;clc			    ; everything is fine
 32873                                  	; 01/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 32874                                  	; 12/12/2022
 32875                                  	; cf=0
 32876                                  	;clc
 32877                                  	;call	setdeviceparameters
 32878                                  	; 04/01/2023
 32879                                  	;jmp	short setdeviceparameters
 32880
