 35504                                  print_error:
 35505                                          push    ax
 35506                                          push    bx
 35507                                          push    cx
 35508                                          push    dx
 35509                                          push    ds
 35510                                          push    cs
 35511                                          pop     ds
 35512                                          pushf
 35513                                          call    get_linenum
 35514                                          mov     [linecount],bx
 35515                                          call    error_line
 35516                                          popf
 35517                                          jnc	short pe_ret
 35518                                          mov     dx,_$PauseMsg
 35519                                          call    print
 35520                                          mov     ax,0C07h		; flush input buffer, then wait for key
 35521                                          int     21h			; wait for a key
 35522                                          or      al,al			; extended key?
 35523                                          jnz	short pe_1		; no
 35524                                          mov     ah,07h			; yes
 35525                                          int     21h			; eat it too
 35526                                  pe_1:     
 35527                                  	mov     dx,crlfm
 35528                                          call    print
 35529                                  pe_ret: 
 35530                                  	pop     ds
 35531                                          pop     dx
 35532                                          pop     cx
 35533                                          pop     bx
 35534                                          pop     ax
 35535                                  	retn
 35536                                  
 35537                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35538                                  
 35539                                  ;   This function is very simple:  it merely prepends a "/D" to the
 35540                                  ;   command-line for the shell;  this (undocumented) switch disables
 35541                                  ;   AUTOEXEC.BAT processing and the date/time prompt that is usually
 35542                                  ;   displayed when there's no AUTOEXEC.BAT.
 35543                                  
 35544                                  disable_autoexec:
 35545                                  	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS -  SYSINIT:4BE2h
 35546                                  	; 17/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0
 35547                                  
 35548                                  	test	byte [bQueryOpt],4
 35549                                  	jz	short disable_exit
 35550                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],1
 35551                                  	jnz	short disable_exit
 35552                                  	or	byte [dae_flag],1
 35553                                          ;or	byte [bQueryOpt],2 ; MSDOS 6.0 
 35554                                  	or      word [bQueryOpt],102h	; [bDefBlock] = 1
 35555                                  	mov     dx,'D ' ; 2044h
 35556                                  dae_1:
 35557                                          ;mov	al,[def_swchr]
 35558                                  	mov     al,[command_line-1]     ; get default switchchar
 35559                                          or      al,al                   ; anything there?
 35560                                          jz	short disable_exit	; no, disable_autoexec already called
 35561                                          mov     bl,[command_line]       ;
 35562                                          mov     bh,0                    ; BX == command-line length
 35563                                          mov     cx,bx                   ;
 35564                                          add     bl,3                    ;
 35565                                          cmp     bl,126                  ;
 35566                                          ja	short disable_exit	;
 35567                                          mov     [command_line],bl       ; update length
 35568                                          add     bx,command_line+1	; make sure we move the NULL too
 35569                                          inc     cx                      ; (just for consistency sake)
 35570                                  disable_loop:                           ;
 35571                                          mov     ah,[bx-3]               ;
 35572                                          mov     [bx],ah                 ;
 35573                                          dec     bx                      ;
 35574                                          loop    disable_loop            ;
 35575                                          mov     [bx-2],al               ;
 35576                                  	;mov	word [bx-1],'D ' ; 2044h ; /D is stuffed into place now
 35577                                  	mov	[bx-1],dx  ; MSDOS 6.21 IO.SYS - SYSINIT:4C29h		
 35578                                          ;mov	byte [command_line-1],0 ;
 35579                                  disable_exit:                           ;
 35580                                          retn
 35581                                  
 35582                                  CheckQueryOpt:	; MSDOS 6.21 IO.YSYS - SYSINIT:4C2Dh
 35583                                  	cmp     byte [bQueryOpt],1
 35584                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35585                                  	test	byte [dae_flag],2
 35586                                  	jnz     short disable_exit
 35587                                  	or      byte [dae_flag],2
 35588                                  	mov     dx,'Y ' ; 2059h ; 11/09/2023
 35589                                  	jmp     short dae_1
 35590                                  
 35591                                  ;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35592                                  
 35593                                  %endif	; 02/11/2022
 35594                                  
 35595                                  
 35596                                  ; 19/04/2019 - Retro DOS v4.0

 35599                                  ;
 35600                                  ; procedure : delim
 35601                                  ;
 35602                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35603                                  
 35604                                  ;	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35605                                  ;
 35606                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35607                                  ;
 35608                                  ;any_delim:
 35609                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35610                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35611                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35612                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35613                                  ;       cmp     al,'['
 35614                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35615                                  ;       cmp     al,']'
 35616                                  ;       je	short delim_ret
 35617                                  ;
 35618                                  ;;endif  ;MULTI_CONFIG
 35619                                  
 35620                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retrodos v4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35621                                  	; (SYSINIT:3450h)	
 35622                                  delim:
 35623 00003085 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'		; ibm will assume "/" as an delimeter.
 35624 00003087 7416                    	je	short delim_ret
 35625                                  
 35626 00003089 3C00                    	cmp	al,0		; special case for sysinit!!!
 35627 0000308B 7412                    	je	short delim_ret
 35628                                  
 35629                                  org_delim:			; used by organize routine except for getting
 35630 0000308D 3C20                    	cmp	al,' '          ; the filename.
 35631 0000308F 740E                    	je	short delim_ret
 35632 00003091 3C09                            cmp     al,tab ; 9
 35633 00003093 740A                    	je	short delim_ret
 35634 00003095 3C3D                    	cmp	al,'='
 35635 00003097 7406                    	je	short delim_ret
 35636 00003099 3C2C                    	cmp	al,','
 35637 0000309B 7402                    	je	short delim_ret
 35638 0000309D 3C3B                    	cmp	al,';'
 35639                                  
 35640                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35641                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35642                                  ;;   Make sure there's no chance of a false EOF indication
 35643                                  ;	clc
 35644                                  ;;endif
 35645                                  
 35646                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35647                                  delim_ret:
 35648 0000309F C3                      	retn
 35649

 35653                                  ;
 35654                                  ;  newline returns with first character of next line
 35655                                  ;
 35656                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35657                                  
 35658                                  newline:
 35659 000030A0 E898F6                  	call	getchr			;skip non-control characters
 35660 000030A3 7207                    	jc	short nl_ret
 35661 000030A5 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			;look for line feed
 35662 000030A7 75F7                    	jne	short newline
 35663 000030A9 E88FF6                  	call	getchr
 35664                                  nl_ret:
 35665 000030AC C3                      	retn

 35669                                  ; procedure : mapcase
 35670                                  ;
 35671                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35672                                  
 35673                                  	; 02/11/2022 - Retro DOS 4.0 (Modified MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS)
 35674                                  mapcase:
 35675 000030AD 51                      	push	cx
 35676 000030AE 56                      	push	si
 35677 000030AF 1E                      	push	ds
 35678                                  
 35679 000030B0 06                      	push	es
 35680 000030B1 1F                      	pop	ds
 35681                                  
 35682                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35683                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35684                                  ;
 35685                                  ;	mov	bl,al                   ; same cmd code this line
 35686                                  ;;else
 35687                                  ;;	xor	si,si
 35688                                  ;;endif
 35689                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35690 000030B2 31F6                    	xor	si, si
 35691                                  
 35692                                  convloop:
 35693 000030B4 AC                      	lodsb
 35694 000030B5 3C61                    	cmp	al,'a'
 35695 000030B7 7209                    	jb	short noconv
 35696 000030B9 3C7A                    	cmp	al,'z'
 35697 000030BB 7705                    	ja	short noconv
 35698 000030BD 2C20                    	sub	al,20h
 35699 000030BF 8844FF                  	mov	[si-1],al
 35700                                  noconv:
 35701                                  
 35702                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35703                                  ;;ifdef	MULTI_CONFIG
 35704                                  ;;
 35705                                  ;;   When MULTI_CONFIG enabled, "mapcase" is used to map everything to
 35706                                  ;;   upper-case a line at a time, after we've been able to figure out whether
 35707                                  ;;   the line is a SET command or not (since we don't want to upper-case
 35708                                  ;;   anything after the "=" in a SET)
 35709                                  ;;
 35710                                  ;       cmp     bl,CONFIG_SET  ; 'V'	; preserve case for part of the line?
 35711                                  ;       jne	short check_eol		; no, just check for end-of-line
 35712                                  ;       cmp     al,'='                  ; separator between SET var and value?
 35713                                  ;       je	short convdone		; yes
 35714                                  ;check_eol:
 35715                                  ;       cmp     al,cr
 35716                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35717                                  ;       cmp     al,lf
 35718                                  ;       je	short convdone
 35719                                  ;;endif
 35720                                  	
 35721                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35722 000030C2 E2F0                    	loop	convloop
 35723                                  convdone:
 35724 000030C4 1F                      	pop	ds
 35725 000030C5 5E                      	pop	si
 35726 000030C6 59                      	pop	cx
 35727 000030C7 C3                      	retn
 35728                                  
 35729                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35730                                  ;
 35731                                  ; procedure : round
 35732                                  ;
 35733                                  ; round the values in memlo and memhi to paragraph boundary.
 35734                                  ; perform bounds check.
 35735                                  ;
 35736                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35737                                  
 35738                                  round:
 35739 000030C8 50                      	push	ax
 35740 000030C9 2EA1[DE03]              	mov	ax,[cs:memlo]
 35741                                  
 35742 000030CD E8F1DF                  	call	ParaRound		; para round up
 35743                                  
 35744 000030D0 2E0106[E003]            	add	[cs:memhi],ax
 35745 000030D5 2EC706[DE03]0000        	mov	word [cs:memlo],0
 35746 000030DC 2EA1[E003]              	mov	ax,[cs:memhi]		; ax = new memhi
 35747 000030E0 2E3B06[A302]            	cmp	ax,[cs:ALLOCLIM]	; if new memhi >= alloclim, error
 35748 000030E5 7322                    	jae	short mem_err
 35749 000030E7 2EF606[3614]02          	test	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],for_devmark ; 2
 35750 000030ED 7418                    	jz	short skip_set_devmarksize
 35751 000030EF 06                      	push	es
 35752 000030F0 56                      	push	si
 35753 000030F1 2E8B36[3414]            	mov	si,[cs:devmark_addr]
 35754 000030F6 8EC6                    	mov	es,si
 35755 000030F8 29F0                    	sub	ax,si
 35756 000030FA 48                      	dec	ax
 35757                                  	;mov	[es:3],ax
 35758 000030FB 26A30300                	mov	[es:devmark.size],ax	; paragraph
 35759 000030FF 2E8026[3614]FD          	and	byte [cs:setdevmarkflag],not_for_devmark ; 0FDh
 35760 00003105 5E                      	pop	si
 35761 00003106 07                      	pop	es
 35762                                  skip_set_devmarksize:
 35763 00003107 58                      	pop	ax
 35764                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35765                                  	; cf = 0
 35766                                  	; 02/11/2022
 35767                                  	;clc	; ? (not needed here)	; clear carry
 35768 00003108 C3                      	retn
 35769                                  
 35770                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35771                                  
 35772                                  mem_err:
 35773                                  	; 11/12/2022
 35774 00003109 0E                      	push	cs
 35775 0000310A 1F                      	pop	ds
 35776                                  mem_err2:
 35777 0000310B BA[A938]                	mov	dx,badmem
 35778                                  	;push	cs
 35779                                  	;pop	ds
 35780 0000310E E87602                  	call	print
 35781 00003111 E940D7                  	jmp	stall

 35814                                  	;cmp	al,9

 35826                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35827                                  ;
 35828                                  ; procedure : getnum
 35829                                  ;
 35830                                  ; getnum parses a decimal number.
 35831                                  ; returns it in ax, sets zero flag if ax = 0 (may be considered an
 35832                                  ; error), if number is bad carry is set, zero is set, ax=0.
 35833                                  ;
 35834                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35835                                  
 35836                                  getnum:
 35837 0000313F 53                      	push	bx
 35838 00003140 31DB                    	xor	bx,bx			; running count is zero
 35839                                  b2:
 35840 00003142 E8F2FF                  	call	todigit 		; do we have a digit ?
 35841 00003145 7247                    	jc	short badnum		; no, bomb
 35842                                  
 35843 00003147 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; put total in ax
 35844 00003148 53                      	push	bx			; save digit (0 to 9)
 35845                                  	;mov	bx,10			; base of arithmetic
 35846                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35847 00003149 B30A                    	mov	bl,10
 35848 0000314B F7E3                    	mul	bx			; shift by one decimal digit
 35849 0000314D 5B                      	pop	bx			; get back digit (0 to 9)
 35850 0000314E 00D8                    	add	al,bl			; get total
 35851 00003150 80D400                  	adc	ah,0			; make that 16 bits
 35852 00003153 7239                    	jc	short badnum		; too big a number
 35853                                  
 35854 00003155 93                      	xchg	ax,bx			; stash total
 35855                                  
 35856 00003156 E8E2F5                  	call	getchr			;get next digit
 35857 00003159 722D                    	jc	short b1		; no more characters
 35858 0000315B 3C20                    	cmp	al,' ' 			; space?
 35859 0000315D 741F                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits
 35860 0000315F 3C2C                    	cmp	al,',' 			; ',' is a seperator!!!
 35861 00003161 741B                    	je	short b15		; then end of digits.
 35862 00003163 3C09                    	cmp	al, tab ; 9		; tab
 35863 00003165 7417                    	je	short b15
 35864 00003167 2E3A06[2A03]            	cmp	al,[cs:sepchr]		; allow 0 or special separators
 35865 0000316C 7410                    	je	short b15
 35866 0000316E 3C2F                    	cmp	al,'/'			; see if another switch follows
 35867                                  	;nop				; cas - remnant of old bad code
 35868                                  	;nop
 35869                                  	; 12/12/2022
 35870                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35871                                  	;nop
 35872                                  	;nop
 35873 00003170 740C                    	je	short b15
 35874 00003172 3C0A                    	cmp	al,lf			; line-feed?
 35875 00003174 7408                    	je	short b15
 35876 00003176 3C0D                    	cmp	al,cr			; carriage return?
 35877 00003178 7404                    	je	short b15
 35878 0000317A 08C0                    	or	al,al			; end of line separator?
 35879 0000317C 75C4                    	jnz	short b2		; no, try as a valid char...
 35880                                  b15:
 35881 0000317E 2EFF06[D203]            	inc	word [cs:count]		; one more character to s...
 35882 00003183 2EFF0E[D603]            	dec	word [cs:chrptr]	; back up over separator
 35883                                  b1:
 35884 00003188 89D8                    	mov	ax,bx			; get proper count
 35885 0000318A 09C0                    	or	ax,ax			; clears carry, sets zero accordingly
 35886 0000318C 5B                      	pop	bx
 35887 0000318D C3                      	retn
 35888                                  badnum:
 35889                                  	; 02/11/2022 (MSDOS 5.0 IO.SYS SYSINIT compatibility)
 35890                                  	;mov	byte [cs:sepchr],0
 35891 0000318E 31C0                    	xor	ax,ax			; set zero flag, and ax = 0
 35892                                  	; 12 /12/2022
 35893 00003190 2EA2[2A03]              	mov	[cs:sepchr],al ; 0
 35894 00003194 5B                      	pop	bx
 35895 00003195 F9                      	stc				; and carry set
 35896 00003196 C3                      	retn

 35900                                  setdoscountryinfo:
 35901                                  
 35902                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35903                                  ;input: es:di -> pointer to dos_country_cdpg_info
 35904                                  ;	ds:0  -> buffer.
 35905                                  ;	si = 0
 35906                                  ;	ax = country id
 35907                                  ;	dx = code page id. (if 0, then use ccsyscodepage as a default.)
 35908                                  ;	bx = file handle
 35909                                  ;	this routine can handle maximum 438 country_data entries.
 35910                                  ;
 35911                                  ;output: dos_country_cdpg_info set.
 35912                                  ;	 carry set if any file read failure or wrong information in the file.
 35913                                  ;	 carry set and cx = -1 if cannot find the matching country_id, 
 35914                                  ;	 codepage_id in the file.
 35915                                  ;----------------------------------------------------------------------------
 35916                                  
 35917 00003197 57                      	push	di
 35918 00003198 50                      	push	ax
 35919 00003199 52                      	push	dx
 35920                                  
 35921 0000319A 31C9                    	xor	cx,cx
 35922 0000319C 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx
 35923 0000319E B80002                  	mov	ax,512			;read 512 bytes
 35924 000031A1 E84F01                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read the file header
 35925 000031A4 724D                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35926                                  
 35927 000031A6 06                      	push	es
 35928 000031A7 56                      	push	si
 35929                                  
 35930 000031A8 0E                      	push	cs
 35931 000031A9 07                      	pop	es
 35932                                  
 35933 000031AA BF[CB34]                	mov	di,country_file_signature ; db 0FFh,'COUNTRY'
 35934 000031AD B90800                  	mov	cx,8			;length of the signature
 35935 000031B0 F3A6                    	repz	cmpsb
 35936                                  
 35937 000031B2 5E                      	pop	si
 35938 000031B3 07                      	pop	es
 35939 000031B4 753D                    	jnz	short setdosdata_fail 	;signature mismatch
 35940                                  
 35941 000031B6 83C612                  	add	si,18			;si -> county info type
 35942 000031B9 803C01                  	cmp	byte [si],1		;only accept type 1 (currently only 1 header type)
 35943 000031BC 7535                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail 	;cannot proceed. error return
 35944                                  
 35945 000031BE 46                      	inc	si			;si -> file offset
 35946 000031BF 8B14                    	mov	dx,[si]			;get the info file offset.
 35947 000031C1 8B4C02                  	mov	cx,[si+2]
 35948 000031C4 B80018                  	mov	ax,6144			;read 6144 bytes.
 35949 000031C7 E82901                  	call	readincontrolbuffer	;read info
 35950 000031CA 7227                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 35951                                  
 35952 000031CC 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the # of country, codepage combination entries
 35953 000031CE 81F9B601                	cmp	cx, 438			;cannot handle more than 438 entries.
 35954 000031D2 771F                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail
 35955                                  
 35956 000031D4 46                      	inc	si
 35957 000031D5 46                      	inc	si			;si -> entry information packet
 35958 000031D6 5A                      	pop	dx			;restore code page id
 35959 000031D7 58                      	pop	ax			;restore country id
 35960 000031D8 5F                      	pop	di
 35961                                  
 35962                                  setdoscntry_find:			;search for desired country_id,codepage_id.
 35963 000031D9 3B4402                  	cmp	ax,[si+2]		;compare country_id
 35964 000031DC 750A                    	jne	short setdoscntry_next
 35965                                  
 35966 000031DE 83FA00                  	cmp	dx,0			;no user specified code page ?
 35967 000031E1 7415                    	je	short setdoscntry_any_codepage ;then no need to match code page id.
 35968 000031E3 3B5404                  	cmp	dx,[si+4]		;compare code page id
 35969 000031E6 7413                    	je	short setdoscntry_got_it
 35970                                  
 35971                                  setdoscntry_next:
 35972 000031E8 0334                    	add	si,[si]			;next entry
 35973 000031EA 46                      	inc	si
 35974 000031EB 46                      	inc	si			;take a word for size of entry itself
 35975 000031EC E2EB                    	loop	setdoscntry_find
 35976                                  
 35977 000031EE B9FFFF                  	mov	cx,-1			;signals that bad country id entered.
 35978                                  setdoscntry_fail:
 35979 000031F1 F9                      	stc
 35980 000031F2 C3                      	retn
 35981                                  
 35982                                  setdosdata_fail:
 35983 000031F3 5E                      	pop	si
 35984 000031F4 59                      	pop	cx
 35985 000031F5 5F                      	pop	di
 35986 000031F6 EBF9                    	jmp	short setdoscntry_fail
 35987                                  
 35988                                  setdoscntry_any_codepage:		;use the code_page_id of the country_id found.
 35989 000031F8 8B5404                  	mov	dx,[si+4]
 35990                                  
 35991                                  setdoscntry_got_it:			;found the matching entry
 35992 000031FB 2E8916[D334]            	mov	[cs:cntrycodepage_id],dx ;save code page id for this country.
 35993 00003200 8B540A                  	mov	dx,[si+10]		;get the file offset of country data
 35994 00003203 8B4C0C                  	mov	cx,[si+12]
 35995 00003206 B80002                  	mov	ax,512 			;read 512 bytes
 35996 00003209 E8E700                  	call	readincontrolbuffer
 35997 0000320C 72E3                    	jc	short setdoscntry_fail
 35998

 36000 00003210 46                      	inc	si

 36002                                  
 36003                                  setdoscntry_data:
 36004 00003212 57                      	push	di			;es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36005 00003213 51                      	push	cx			;save # of entry left

 36017 00003229 72C8                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail

 36020 0000322E B91400                  	mov	cx,20			;read 20 bytes only. we only need to

 36022 00003233 F9                      	stc

 36024 00003236 72BB                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail 	;read failure
 36025                                  
 36026 00003238 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx

 36028

 36034 00003248 72A9                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail

 36043 00003259 F9                      	stc
 36044 0000325A CD21                    	int	21h
 36045 0000325C 7295                    	jc	short setdosdata_fail
 36046                                  
 36047 0000325E 39C8                    	cmp	ax,cx
 36048 00003260 7591                    	jne	short setdosdata_fail
 36049

 36051 00003265 BE0802                  	mov	si,(512+8)		;si-> data buffer + id tag field
 36052 00003268 8B0C                    	mov	cx,[si]			;get the length of the file
 36053 0000326A 41                      	inc	cx			;take care of a word for lenght of tab
 36054 0000326B 41                      	inc	cx			;itself.
 36055 0000326C 81F9F805                	cmp	cx,(2048-512-8)	; 1528	;fit into the buffer?
 36056 00003270 7781                    	ja	short setdosdata_fail

 36059 00003272 E83500                  	call	setdbcs_before_copy
 36060                                  	;endif

 36062 00003275 3C01                    	cmp	al,SetCountryInfo ; 1	;is the data for setcountryinfo table?
 36063 00003277 7512                    	jne	short setdoscntry_mov 	;no, don't worry
 36064

 36067 0000327D 26FF751A                	push	word [es:di+country_cdpg_info.ccMono_Ptr-country_cdpg_info.ccCountryInfoLen+2]

 36069

 36098 000032A7 E968FF                  	jmp	setdoscntry_data

 36132                                  getcountrydestination:
 36133                                  
 36134                                  ;get the destination address in the dos country info table.
 36135                                  ;input: al - data id
 36136                                  ;	es:di -> dos_country_cdpg_info
 36137                                  ;on return:
 36138                                  ;	es:di -> destination address of the matching data id
 36139                                  ;	carry set if no matching data id found in dos.
 36140                                  
 36141 000032C5 51                      	push	cx
 36142                                  	;add	di,74
 36143 000032C6 83C74A                  	add	di,country_cdpg_info.ccNumber_of_entries	
 36144                                  					;skip the reserved area, syscodepage etc.

 36146 000032CC 47                      	inc	di

 36182                                  readincontrolbuffer:
 36183                                  
 36184                                  ;move file pointer to cx:dx
 36185                                  ;read ax bytes into the control buffer. (should be less than 2 kb)
 36186                                  ;si will be set to 0 hence ds:si points to the control buffer.
 36187                                  ;entry:  cx,dx offset from the start of the file where the read/write pointer
 36188                                  ;	 be moved.
 36189                                  ;	 ax - # of bytes to read
 36190                                  ;	 bx - file handle
 36191                                  ;	 ds - buffer seg.
 36192                                  ;return: the control data information is read into ds:0 - ds:0200.
 36193                                  ;	 cx,dx value destroyed.
 36194                                  ;	 carry set if error in reading file.
 36195                                  
 36196 000032F3 50                      	push	ax			;# of bytes to read
 36197 000032F4 B80042                  	mov	ax,4200h
 36198 000032F7 F9                      	stc
 36199 000032F8 CD21                    	int	21h			;move pointer
 36200 000032FA 59                      	pop	cx			;# of bytes to read
 36201 000032FB 7209                    	jc	short ricb_exit
 36202                                  
 36203 000032FD 31D2                    	xor	dx,dx			;ds:dx -> control buffer
 36204 000032FF 31F6                    	xor	si,si
 36205 00003301 B43F                    	mov	ah,3Fh			;read into the buffer
 36206 00003303 F9                      	stc
 36207 00003304 CD21                    	int	21h			;should be less than 1024 bytes.
 36208                                  ricb_exit:
 36209 00003306 C3                      	retn

 36213                                  set_country_path:
 36214                                  
 36215                                  ;in:  ds - sysinitseg, es - confbot, si -> start of the asciiz path string
 36216                                  ;     dosinfo_ext, cntry_drv, cntry_root, cntry_path
 36217                                  ;     assumes current directory is the root directory.
 36218                                  ;out: ds:di -> full path (cntry_drv).
 36219                                  ;     set the cntry_drv string from the country=,,path command.
 36220                                  ;     ds, es, si value saved.
 36221                                  
 36222 00003307 56                      	push	si
 36223                                  
 36224 00003308 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36225 00003309 06                      	push	es

 36228                                  
 36229 0000330C E82E00                  	call	chk_drive_letter	;current ds:[si] is a drive letter?

 36231                                  
 36232 00003311 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36233 00003313 46                      	inc	si

 36235 00003315 EB06                    	jmp	short scp_setdrv
 36236                                  
 36237                                  scp_default_drv:
 36238 00003317 B419                    	mov	ah,19h
 36239 00003319 CD21                    	int	21h
 36240 0000331B 0441                    	add	al,"A"			;convert it to a character.
 36241                                  
 36242                                  scp_setdrv:
 36243 0000331D 2EA2[8834]              	mov	[cs:cntry_drv],al	;set the drive letter.
 36244 00003321 BF[8B34]                	mov	di,cntry_path
 36245 00003324 8A04                    	mov	al,[si]
 36246 00003326 3C5C                    	cmp	al, "\"
 36247 00003328 7406                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36248                                  
 36249 0000332A 3C2F                    	cmp	al,"/"			;let's accept "/" as an directory delim
 36250 0000332C 7402                    	je	short scp_root_dir
 36251                                  
 36252 0000332E EB01                    	jmp	short scp_path
 36253                                  
 36254                                  scp_root_dir:

 36256                                  scp_path:

 36258                                  
 36259 00003334 BF[8834]                	mov	di,cntry_drv
 36260                                  scpath_exit:
 36261                                  
 36262 00003337 1E                      	push	ds			;switch ds, es
 36263 00003338 06                      	push	es
 36264 00003339 1F                      	pop	ds
 36265 0000333A 07                      	pop	es			;ds, es value restored
 36266                                  
 36267 0000333B 5E                      	pop	si
 36268 0000333C C3                      	retn

 36275                                  ;assume that every alpha character is already converted to upper case.
 36276                                  ;carry set if not.

 36278 0000333D 50                      	push	ax

 36280                                  	;jb	short cdletter_no
